review: 一般是一個最好的  這篇評論混凝料多航班多年來使用CX。 這是我第一次選擇的航空公司。 我覺得他們有些比在空氣比修業期（票務,官僚作風,費用）但是總的來說他們瞭解他們的系統,食物很好,員工都很友好而且令人愉快,而且他們通常得到的要去哪。  如果我要抱怨的是經常娛樂系統劃分,要麼在個別通道或整個事情； 並且可以弄清楚如何使用起來卻有些繁瑣。 這是一個小抱怨的全盤計劃中。 國泰的網絡（尤其是如果一個包括什麼叫做港龍航空）的種類很豐富。 不過馬可波羅常客計劃似乎越來越多的和更具限制性的,並且沒關係我飛到一年多少次。 我失去了所有的休息室。

review: 空姐超級貼心!  這次的家族旅遊,帶有未滿2歲的小孩,因自知小孩的身高及體重已超標,就未提出掛籃需求.但是空姐看到小孩已入睡,主動幫忙安裝掛籃,為使孩子能更舒適的搭乘. 整個航程中,空服員的態度也都很周全及貼心.另外加分的是餐點好好吃!

However, the flight attendant saw that the child had fallen asleep and took the initiative to help install the hanging basket. In order to allow children to ride more comfortably. The flight attendants' attitudes are also very thorough and intimate throughout the voyage. Another plus point is that the meals are delicious!

review: 在每個方面都非常棒  極致奢華！  哇！ 真的不是有足夠的最高級來向這家酒店的經歷是多麼迷人的讀者！ 我們在機場受到了酒店代表拿了行李後立即給我們提供了水的旅程和我們的出租車司機不等  每個家庭都有自己的奔馳車在旅行中！ 登記入住是一個很小的令人愉快的體驗和一杯迎賓香檳和冷毛巾。 我們的房間很棒有成對的單人牀以及你想要的一切  每天補充的迷你吧,咖啡機,浴袍,拖鞋,吹風機,豪華的衛浴用品  智能電視和dvd播放機  甚至還有一組可擴展到確認... 是的... 我把我們的10磅上在7晚住宿！ 這裏的食物真的很美味  這種對細節的關注和監督米其林廚師的一切都準備好了。 我是過敏的和我在到酒店之前就通知  每個餐廳都毫無例外地告訴（不知情的情況下）所以我不要強調它的  我只知道我看見它的牀單上寫的其中一家餐廳預訂  這是一流的服務就像我在任何其他酒店從來沒有遇到過！ 美味的雞尾酒和飲料都是高品質的品牌！ 我們不是最廣泛的葡萄酒清單和不能真的因爲我知道了一些關於葡萄酒的建議  但它其實是在和豐富的應該提供你希望！ 似乎每個餐廳都有一個不同的葡萄酒可供選擇。 所有的餐廳供應美味的食物都是新鮮準備的&顯示對細節的關注以及品嚐美味看起來讓人胃口大開！ 自助餐廳的口味甚至是我見過的最不像其他的自助  這就像是我們在天堂裏去睡覺和醒來！ 他們甚至還有泥乾酪蛋糕模與食物的嬰兒！ 沒有在這裏胡亂猜測  所有的食物都在一個元件列表和自助餐廳的菜單具有相同的。 最大限度地利用所提供的各種餐館希臘,法國和自助餐廳是開放的早餐和午餐還有晚餐毫無保留地  並且每個人都提供了不同的經驗以及客房服務的早餐和午餐都在陽臺上！ 他們有很多泳池  所有都是加熱和都很棒。 無論您是在海灘或泳池邊給你送上飲料帶着微笑和如此專業
Eng: It’s great in every way. Extreme luxury! Wow! There really isn't enough superlatives to come to this charming reader of the experience of this hotel! We received the hotel representative at the airport after taking the luggage and immediately provided us with a water journey and our taxi driver did not wait. Every family has their own Mercedes-Benz on the trip! Checking in was a small pleasant experience and a welcome glass of champagne and cold towels. Our room is great. Due to street goods. There is an electronic product street, children's street, "garbage" on the street, etc. There are many fake brand project names. review: 這是運動鞋的地方  忘了還有購物商場和特色商店。 這個地方你可以找到許多不同種類的運動鞋,你想要的任何品牌名稱可以讓他們在這裏便宜！ 我發現了一雙新的平衡爲HK$399。 不可以這麼做除了運動鞋美街。 這個地方很擁擠的週末,但是這是一個很好的經驗。

I found a new balance of HK$399. You can't do this except sports shoes. This place is crowded on weekends, but this is a good experience.

review: 熱鬧、價格實惠  多部電影的拍攝地，售賣各類男性用品，馬路旁大排檔眾多，是個美食熱門地，超多吃的，強烈建議買當地水果！！！牛奶草莓很便宜
Eng: Lively and affordable Many filming locations, selling all kinds of men’s supplies, and many stalls by the road, is a popular place for food, super eating, it is strongly recommended to buy local fruits! ! ! Milk strawberry is very cheap

review: 好玩  特意去海港城看大黃鴨，人可真是多啊，圍在欄杆旁照相，我們也擠進去拍了幾張趕緊撤。海港城裡各種大牌名牌，純粹去逛逛，小朋友最喜歡玩具反斗城，琳琅滿目的玩具，連大人看了都忍不住要玩。海港城裡空調很冷，要帶長袖衣。
Eng: It's fun. I went to Harbour City to see the big yellow duck. There are so many people. We took pictures by the railing. We squeezed in and took a few photos to quickly withdraw. All kinds of big-name famous brands in the harbor city are purely to go shopping. Children's favorite toys are R Us. The dazzling array of toys, even adults can't help but want to play. The air conditioning in the harbor city is very cold, so wear long sleeves.

review: 魚骨型座位很舒適，飛機餐非常普通  這次搭乘商務艙，魚骨型的座位很舒適，若是長途旅行，可以平躺更是享受，電視與遙控器都很新穎，空服員也很親切，不過機上餐食方面很普通，味道不怎麼樣，建議出發前在貴賓室享用比較能滿足到。
Eng: The fish-bone seat is very comfortable, the flight meal is very common. This time I take the business class, the fish-bone seat is very comfortable, if you are traveling for a long distance, you can lie flat and enjoy it, the TV and the remote control are very new, and the flight attendants are also very friendly. However, the meals on board are very common and the taste is not very good. It is recommended to enjoy it in the VIP room before departure.

review: 買買買  如果你是準備大買特買並且不怎麼介意價格的話，來這邊還是非常適合的。品牌無敵齊全從高端到中端到低端都有，但是真心不便宜。  如果你想找折扣或者淘一些便宜的東西還是去其他商城比較划算
Eng: Buy, buy, buy If you are planning to buy a big deal and don't mind the price, it is still very suitable for you. The brand is invincible and complete, from high-end to mid-end to low-end, but it is not cheap. If you want to find discounts or buy some cheap things, it is more cost-effective to go to other malls

review: 舒適特選經濟艙  第一次坐A350特選經濟艙 還有迎賓香檳 空間很濶 準時起飛準時到達 12小時機程很舒適 晚餐和早餐也很好 中間還吃了杯麵 空中服務員很友善
Eng: Comfortable Economy Class for the first time in A350 Economy Class for the first time and welcome champagne. Space is very good. Departure on time. Arrival on time. 12-hour flight is very comfortable. Dinner and breakfast are also very good.

review: 座位舒適,髚班時間佳  座位空間舒適,視聽設備佳,另外有飛機下方與後方攝影機可全程觀看,讓不看影片的老人和小孩一同參與飛行十分開心
Eng: Comfortable seats and good shift time Seat space is comfortable, audio-visual equipment is good, and there are cameras under the aircraft and rear cameras to watch the whole journey, so that the elderly and children who are not watching the video are very happy to participate in the flight together

review: 空服員很細心  這是我第一次做國泰 印象很不錯 帶著一歲多的女兒一起 原本座位是和一位先生坐兩個的位置 後來空服員看狀問我要不要去坐原本是留給組員的位置  後來就跟女兒坐四人的位置 女兒睡覺也睡的舒服 真的是很感謝。 轉機時也有空服員帶領直接到另一個登機口 不要一直找 或是怕走錯登機門 很貼心
Eng: The flight attendant was very attentive. This was my first time doing Cathay. I had a good impression. I took my one-year-old daughter. The original seat was two places with a gentleman. Later, the flight attendant asked me if I wanted to sit. The position reserved for the team members would later sit with the daughter in a four-person position. The daughter slept comfortably. I really appreciate it. During flight transfer, there is also a flight attendant who leads directly to another boarding gate. Don’t look for it all the time, or be afraid of going to the wrong boarding gate.

review: 服務、整潔、質感有水準搭乘體驗十分舒服  第一次搭乘國泰航空，本來抱持的觀察的態度，但從休息室開始到上飛機，一切都讓人感到很舒適，的確是家優質的航空公司，會令人期待下次旅行
Eng: The service, cleanliness, quality and quality of the ride experience are very comfortable. The first time I took Cathay Pacific, I had the attitude of observation, but from the lounge to the plane, everything feels very comfortable. It is indeed a quality airline. And will look forward to the next trip

review: 很喜歡這裏  一定要記得砍價！   我的妻子和兩個兒子（7和3）去了兩次香港和廟街夜市的時候真的很喜歡它。 它讓我想起了在曼谷帕蓬夜市的但是在一個更大的規模。   許多店鋪賣同樣的商品我猜  小飾品, t  襯衫,佛像,手機配件等。 所以買家,你有很多的選擇和電源充電傻錢店大約如果任何供應商都是他們的東西。 我的建議是一開始總是討價還價因爲他們貴得離譜但是如果你不急着去買,特別是當你知道其他攤位賣的都是相同的東西,得到一個圖你腦袋裏讓你願意花多少錢,玩球和  如果需要的話  因爲走的廠商往往會給追着說還可以接受以前的提供他們就拒絕了。
Eng: I really like it here, remember to bargain! My wife and two sons (7 and 3) really liked it when they went to Hong Kong and Temple Street Night Market twice. It reminds me of the Patpong Night Market in Bangkok but on a larger scale. Many shops sell the same goods, I guess small accessories, t shirts, Buddha statues, mobile phone accessories, etc. So buyers, you have a lot of choices and power charging silly money stores about if any supplier is their stuff. My suggestion is to always bargain because they are ridiculously expensive, but if you are not in a hurry to buy, especially when you know that other stalls are selling the same thing, get a picture of how much money in your head you are willing to spend , Playing ball and if necessary, because the walking manufacturers tend to chase and say that they can accept the previous offer, they refused.

review: 很棒的家庭假期  這是我們第二次去的時候ikos度假村,我們很喜歡以前住在大洋洲和olivia這次我們就想去試試,沒有讓我們失望。 我們一家人去的6個大人和直接跟酒店預訂的,所以他們從機場接他們的私人班車服務,還有很酷的遇到了瓶水旅途最受歡迎的酒店在辦理入住的時候有一杯香檳  一個好的開始！  房間（在主酒店）非常可愛而且很寬敞,牀很大很舒適而且都有很好的海景。 我們吃遍了所有的按菜單點菜的餐廳都很喜歡我們的住宿和佩徳羅託雷斯酒店,我們最喜歡的是希臘飯後酒福斯科餐廳和意大利餐廳,我們最喜歡的不僅是因爲令人驚歎的食物而且sommelliers的專業技能在餐館和友善的工作人員,我們最喜歡的是一個特定的喬治飯後酒！ 我們當中的一個生日的第21度假期間我們很高興和一個生日蛋糕時意外地到達我們的桌子來結束我們的晚上。  我們用了酒店的健身房每天都很享受和參與鍛鍊課程,瑜伽和普拉提的露臺上溫泉是一個很好的方式來開始新的一天和的aquafit真得非常好玩。  讓我們驚訝的是晚上的娛樂活動很專業,這家酒店非常棒和設置一個可愛的露天劇場。 正如所有的酒店裏的酒吧,員工都很細心,定期檢查我們是否需要飲料和服務很快很有效率。 酒吧是一個可愛的太陽神的地方在海灘上舉行露天晚餐前飲料和經常在晚上也有音樂。  度假村的團隊應該得到很好的評價他們接收,他們努力工作確保每個人都有一個很棒的假期,這家度假村特別精心設計的,而且都很乾淨,打理得很好的花園都是很好但是這真的就是態度和樂於助人的工作人員在這裏感覺特別的添加！
Eng: Great family holiday This is the second time we went to the ikos resort. We loved staying in Oceania and olivia before. This time we wanted to try it and did not disappoint us. The 6 adults that our family went to and booked directly with the hotel, so they picked up their private shuttle service from the airport, and had a cool encounter with a bottle of water. The most popular hotel on the journey had a glass of champagne at check-in Good start! The room (at the main hotel) is very cute and spacious, the bed is large and comfortable and all have good sea views. We have eaten all the a la carte restaurants and liked our accommodation and the Pedro Torres Hotel, our favorite is the Greek after-dinner Fosco restaurant and Italian restaurant, our favorite is not only Because of the amazing food and the professional skills of the sommelliers in the restaurant and the friendly staff, our favorite is a specific George after dinner! During the 21st holiday of one of our birthdays we were very happy with a birthday cake when we accidentally arrived at our table to end our evening. We used the hotel's gym to enjoy and participate in exercise classes every day. Yoga and Pilates spa on the terrace is a good way to start the day and the aquafit is really fun. What surprised us was that the entertainment at night was very professional, this hotel was great and set a lovely amphitheatre. As with all the bars in the hotel, the staff are very attentive and regularly check if we need drinks and service quickly and efficiently. The bar is a lovely sun god's place on the beach with open-air drinks before dinner and often there is music in the evening. The resort team deserves a good rating from them, they work hard to make sure everyone has a great vacation, this resort is specially designed, and they are very clean, well-maintained gardens are good But this is really the attitude and the helpful staff feels particularly added here!

review: 在網上訂房，未到住宿日前4天酒店巳自行在我 Credit Card 扣錢 (我訂的是到付酒店價格）！
Eng: Booking online, the hotel will deduct money from my Credit Card 4 days before the arrival date (I booked the hotel to pay the price)!

review: 最愛的航司 沒有之一  國泰航空是我的最愛。飛機舒適，餐食也不錯。一直搞不懂為什麼有人說國泰飛機餐難吃。我吃了覺得還不錯啊，比好多航空公司的都好吃。喜歡椅背上的娛樂設施。還有飛機上的免稅商品也很划算。每次只要條件允許，我都訂國泰的飛機。
Eng: No favorite airline company Cathay Pacific is my favorite. The plane is comfortable and the meals are not bad. I haven't figured out why some people say that Cathay Pacific's meals are unpalatable. I eat it and think it's not bad, it's better than many airlines. Love the entertainment facilities on the back of the chair. Also, the duty-free goods on the plane are very cost-effective. Whenever conditions permit, I book Cathay Pacific's plane.

review: 旅遊市場,女人街不  這是一個旅遊市場,所有的小販在賣同樣的東西 t恤,電話涵蓋了磁鐵和廚房。 如果你去過任何一家其他的市場,沒有必要來這裏,即使你沒有我大概還會考慮來這裏兩次...
Eng: Tourist market, women's street is not a tourist market, all hawkers are selling the same t-shirts, the phone covers the magnet and the kitchen. If you have been to any other market, there is no need to come here, even if you don't have it, I will probably consider coming here twice...

review: 驚喜的長途飛行  最近坐飛機往返香港和我不期待在16小時經濟。 我很滿意服務上都長時間飛行以及更短的腿我訂的也很好。 航班準時離開基本上, 12小時也許已經很晚了但我們始終最準時到達我們的目的地。 主板上的一個很大的娛樂場所有很多電影,電視和音樂個人屏幕上選擇一個。 這裏的食物比其他航空公司的食物和杯子的拉麵都有很棒的小吃。 座位也很一般,我不是非常高的（5 ' 5 ）但不至於不舒服。 總之,是個不錯的選擇國泰航空的亞洲。
Eng: Surprised long-distance flight I recently flew to and from Hong Kong and I do not expect the economy in 16 hours. I am satisfied with the long flight time and shorter legs on the service. I booked very well. The flight departed on time. Basically, 12 hours may have been late but we always arrived at our destination on time. A large casino on the motherboard with many movies, TV and music on your personal screen to choose one. The food here has great snacks than the food from other airlines and cup ramen. The seating is also average, I am not very tall (5'5) but not uncomfortable. In short, it is a good choice for Cathay Pacific Asia.

review: Ikos 天堂  我們去過很多次我們想試試olivia ikos大洋洲和四月。 這裏的服務,乾淨程度和超過所有的客戶服務是一流的,就是因爲它在大洋洲巴黎波特凡爾賽酒店,他們真的讓你覺得自己很特別。   酒店的庭院很大而且這裏的海灘有一個更好的視野。   這裏的食物和飲料都很棒,可供選擇的數量和食物的質量讓我們期待下個星期。 飲料服務是悠閒的,像往常一樣,但是我真的不介意,我寧願等待一段時間而不是喝醉酒的白癡的周圍都是一些全包的地方似乎吸引。   房間一塵不染和每一個很大的場地和酒店的一部分而且永遠都在打掃。 員工真的使這個地方很特別。   但第二天我們只能在我們離開之前一定會再預訂  非常感謝  Nik和寶拉
Eng: Ikos Paradise We have been there many times and we want to try olivia ikos Oceania and April. The service here, cleanliness and more than all customer service are first class, just because it is at the Oceania Paris Porte de Versailles, they really make you feel special. The hotel's courtyard is large and the beach here has a better view. The food and drinks here are great, the quantity available and the quality of the food make us look forward to next week. The beverage service is laid back, as usual, but I really don't mind, I would rather wait for a while instead of drunken idiots. Some all-inclusive places seem to attract all around. The rooms were spotless and every large venue and part of the hotel were always cleaned. The staff really made this place special. But the next day we can only book again before we leave, thank you Nik and Paula

review: 貴賓室内中式茶點區可選擇二十多款中式茶，沖茶技巧和茶具不錯  提早到達香港國際機場，順利地花了不用五分鐘把原先早上十時往台北的航班改到八時五十五分，櫃台非常有效率。登機前還有剩餘的時間往玉衡堂商務貴賓室，貴賓室内中式茶點區可選擇二十多款中式茶，沖茶技巧和茶具不錯。登機入口剛好在貴賓室旁，省卻很多時間。
Eng: VIP indoor Chinese refreshment area can choose more than 20 kinds of Chinese tea, tea making skills and tea sets are good to arrive at Hong Kong International Airport early, it took no more than five minutes to change the original flight from 10am to Taipei to 8:55 in the morning The counter is very efficient. Before boarding, there is still time left to go to Yuhengtang Business VIP Room. The VIP indoor Chinese refreshment area can choose from more than 20 types of Chinese tea. The boarding entrance is right next to the VIP room, saving a lot of time.

review: 經濟艙座位空間大, 小孩喜歡皃童餐. 且票價適中!且對台灣留學生友善票價.CI及BR則沒有,票價貴.  經濟艙座位空間大,餐食此回程餐食較不美味, 因坐位較後面, 沒得選擇, 海鮮咖哩飯較不好吃, 去程吃牛肉咖哩較好吃, 但下次要是會選擇CX, 因他對台灣留學生, 有學生價票且便宜,  非常友善,台灣的CI及BR的學生票不友善, 很貴, 選擇CX. CP值高.!!!
Eng: The economy class seats are large, children like to eat children's meals. And the fare is moderate! And the fares are friendly to Taiwanese students. CI and BR are not, the fares are expensive. The economy class seats are large, and the return meal is less delicious. , Because there is no choice behind the seat, seafood curry rice is not good, go to Cheng to eat beef curry is better, but next time I will choose CX, because he is a student student in Taiwan, he has a student ticket and it is cheap, very friendly The student tickets of CI and BR in Taiwan are not friendly and expensive. Choose CX. The CP value is high.!!!

review: 很棒！  我們從來沒見過這麼好的服務。 非常細心,博學的工作人員,問他們要了一瓶酒和他們知道推薦,香檳與我們的午飯和飲料再加滿。 食物真的很美味... 都不敢相信我們的運氣。 我們的房間有泳池如果你有孩子我強烈推薦了一個最輕鬆的一個假期。 他們可以先回房間自己的游泳池裏玩耍的時候適合用來放鬆休閒或讀一本書。 迷你酒吧每天都會有人來整理房間着品牌的產品有時每天兩次。 你不需要動一根手指,完全的放鬆和豪華。 Pedlos, 皮划艇都包含在內。 我們找不出這家5星級全包的酒店,真是棒極了。
Eng: Great! We have never seen such a good service. Very attentive, knowledgeable staff, asked them to ask for a bottle of wine and they knew the recommendation, champagne and our lunch and drinks were topped up. The food is really delicious...can't believe our luck. Our room has a pool. If you have children, I highly recommend one of the most relaxing holidays. They can go back to the room and play in their own swimming pool, which is suitable for relaxing or reading a book. Everyday the mini bar has someone to tidy up the room with branded products, sometimes twice a day. You don't need to move a finger, completely relaxed and luxurious. Pedlos, kayaking are included. We couldn't find this 5-star all-inclusive hotel, which was amazing.

review: 瑜伽  棒極了。 很舒服。 優質的服務。 空姐甜美,打理得很好和在頂上的客戶服務。
Eng: Yoga is great. Very comfortable. Excellent service. The stewardess was sweet, well maintained and customer service on top.

review: 換一個離廟街夜市  我更喜歡女人街廟街市場,它有更多的品種和一些很棒的吃東西的地方。 所有常見的手提包和t恤衫,買紀念品的好地方。 這是很容易從旺角地鐵站。 朗豪酒店不遠。 它會開始下午的所以不要去得太早的。 不要害怕和討價還價的路程如果你得不到你想要的價格。 這並不意味着它就是女人街的女士。 去享受一個小時左右徘徊,即使你不買任何東西是很有趣的。 站在一個很棒的印度小姐便宜的飯菜。
Eng: Change to a night market away from Temple Street. I prefer Ladies Street Temple Street Market. It has more varieties and some great places to eat. All common handbags and t-shirts, a great place to buy souvenirs. It is easy from Mong Kok MRT station. The Langham Place is not far away. It will start in the afternoon, so don't go too early. Don't be afraid and bargain for the distance if you don't get the price you want. This does not mean that it is the lady of Ladies' Street. It's fun to enjoy wandering for about an hour, even if you don't buy anything. Stand for a great Indian lady with cheap meals.

review: 失望  這裏曾經是世界上最好的航空公司。 過去我用過他們兩次（一個長途在英國  香港,這家中國國內航班）我讓我們失望過。 舊的飛機,飛機晚點,吃清淡的食物和差勁的服務。 遺憾的是二十年前我會熱烈地談論着這托架。
Eng: Disappointed This was once the best airline in the world. I have used them twice in the past (one long distance in Hong Kong, UK, this domestic Chinese flight) and I have let us down. The old plane, the plane was late, eating light food and poor service. It is a pity that I will talk about this bracket enthusiastically twenty years ago.

review: 不值得一去  此處的外觀和優秀的那樣大量的員工由於每個人都一直在這裏告訴我的鞋子是竊取的。   什麼垃圾玩意兒的載荷！  大致相同的鞋子的價格在澳大利亞和一些甚至還被貨物損壞。  幾個員工但沒什麼值得在隔壁房間。   它的房間從美洲到在綫購買。

review: 美妙的假期   這是我們第二次來olivia再一次和我們真的很喜歡它。 我們去的大羣今年18歲與混合年齡範圍從2  60左右。 酒店的房間非常奢華和保持着絕對的一塵不染。 食物方面有很多選擇的自助還有餐廳的菜單。 我腸胃不好所以不能吃任何谷蛋白的或小麥所以一般情況下這是一場噩夢國外貼上了但是他們去找食物每道菜的自助每頓飯都讓我來說還是很方便的。 也提供無麩質菜單點菜餐廳都有所以我那裏也沒有任何問題。  有一家希臘餐廳是我們最喜歡的一家,這裏的食物很棒很棒所以餐廳經理喬治和一個巨大的感謝他們！  我和丈夫還有我們2歲的兒子在一間房裏他們還提供了一張嬰兒牀對我們來說真是太好了。  有很多可以選擇的食物適合孩子在所有的餐廳。  酒很好喝,我從來沒有見過這麼多的選擇提供優質品牌的全包套餐的一部分。  還要說的是我們對我們的照顧非常感謝Timos我們住的時候是不是經常去酒店和經理看到走在客人聊天但是他讓我們的住宿和一個非常完美的一個。  總之我們度過了一個完美的時間和我真的挑不出這家酒店的。  我們期待着再回來
Eng: Wonderful holiday This is our second visit to olivia again and we really like it. The large group we went to was 18 years old this year and the mixed age ranged from about 2 to 60. The hotel rooms are very luxurious and kept absolutely spotless. There are a lot of choices in the food buffet and the restaurant menu. I have a bad stomach, so I can't eat any gluten or wheat, so under normal circumstances it is a nightmare. But it's convenient for them to look for food. Every dish buffet and every meal. Gluten-free menus are also available in à la carte restaurants, so I have no problems there. There is a Greek restaurant that is our favorite, the food here is great and great, so the restaurant manager George and a huge thank you! My husband and I and our 2-year-old son were in a room and they also provided a cot which was really good for us. There are a lot of food choices suitable for kids in all restaurants. The wine is delicious and I have never seen so many choices as part of an all-inclusive package that offers premium brands. What's more, we are very grateful for our care of Timos. When we stayed, we often went to the hotel and the manager saw the guests chatting while walking but he made our stay and a very perfect one. All in all we spent a perfect time and I really can't pick this hotel. We look forward to coming back

review: 很棒的家庭度假村  這是一個一流的家庭的全包式度假村。 可能是歐洲最好的和很難挑出毛病。 酒店（植莢英畝的橄欖樹花園）是非常好的。 我們的漂亮的兩臥室豪華套房開門就對着沙灘... 四十英尺就到海邊。 絕對的東西都包括在裏面。 所有的食物都不只&亞歷山德森,但還有迷你酒吧,客房服務,冰沙泳池邊的雞尾酒。 員工也會每天散步有冷毛巾,一碗一碗的水果,或提供給你清潔你的太陽鏡！   豪華套房給了我們免費的機場接送服務,豪華泳池訪問（詹尼森比主游泳池更安靜  你可以到的很晚早上下午能很容易地找到牀）,免費的按摩溫泉（非常好的）,和海灘上的晚餐（基本上從菜單上享用希臘餐廳前面的海灘）。 我們沒有遇到任何問題在任何餐廳預訂晚餐。 我們的孩子還得到了一個好的房間他們似乎很喜歡4遊戲機！ 我們還會再來因爲豪華的客人在未來沃沃克。  因爲是典型的在這些度假村,您可以選擇在一個或多個按菜單點菜的餐廳吃晚餐自助。 所有的食物都是非常好的（雖然不很棒的）食物,還有令人驚訝的酒單很不錯。 麝香味是法國和意大利餐廳。 早餐也是在法國餐廳要比自助餐更文明。  我們的兩個孩子在這家託兒所和兒童俱樂部的員工我們印象非常深刻。 事實上所有的酒店員工的素質是真正突出的功能。 他們是100％提交到度假村和他們的客人,和所有的豪華酒店,它的服務從根本上定義了經驗。  我們還會再來這家很棒的酒店在最早的時機。
Eng: Great family resort This is an all-inclusive resort for a first-class family. Probably the best in Europe and it is difficult to pick out faults. The hotel (a garden of olive trees planted in acres of pods) is very nice. Our beautiful two-bedroom luxury suite opens to the beach... 40 feet to the beach. Absolute things are included. All the food is not only & Alexanderson, but there is also a mini bar, room service, smoothies and cocktails by the pool. Staff will also take a walk every day with cold towels, bowls of fruit, or provide you with clean sunglasses! The deluxe suites gave us free airport shuttle service, luxury pool access (Jenison is quieter than the main pool you can arrive late in the morning and you can easily find the bed), free massage spa (very good), and the beach Dinner (basically enjoy the beach in front of the Greek restaurant from the menu). We did not encounter any problems booking dinner in any restaurant. Our kids also got a good room and they seem to like 4 game consoles! We will come again because of the luxurious guests in the future Warwalk. Because it is typical in these resorts, you can choose to have dinner buffet in one or more a la carte restaurants. All food is very good (although not great) and the surprising wine list is very good. Musk is a French and Italian restaurant. Breakfast is also more civilized than a buffet in a French restaurant. We were very impressed by the staff of our two children in this nursery and children's club. In fact the qualities of all hotel employees are truly outstanding functions. review: 美好的假期  我們住在ikos olivia 2016年6月中,我們一家三口帶着一個小孩。 總之我們很喜歡這裏,很棒的食物,很棒的住宿和整個地方都是一個年輕的孩子的家庭來說是個工程。 東西種類繁多的葡萄酒就像一個真正的好處列表  因爲不是所有的全包式酒店做到這一點。   最好的一片： 意大利和希臘餐廳  無論是在海灘上可愛 游泳池  兒童遊樂場和俱樂部（我們沒有把女兒但是這裏真的很棒） 所有餐廳的早餐  客房服務  包括  工作人員  他們都很可愛  對孩子的態度  總是很受歡迎... 彩色的桌椅等在餐廳足以讓他們有事可幹  飲料和酒  可愛的選擇希臘的酒和知識豐富的員工,總是很熱心地爲我們推薦一些東西（法國菜等也有）但我們嘗試了當地的東西。 雞尾酒  我們很喜歡這裏的莫吉托雞尾酒是最好的  我們很高興的發現和aperol spritz之類的東西包括   可以改進的地方的：  主樓裏的房間  一些在較低的樓層的海景房看不到大海的美景。 我們向工作人員投訴管理和處理給了我們一個可愛的房間但我們會建議出去的主建築感覺不那麼狹窄的多  海灘  這就是事實但不是最好的海灘。 沙子和岩石才能得到相當不平靜過去在你來之前就在海里的沙子（孩子們需要果凍鞋）。 泳池很棒所以不是一個問題但也值得提醒的 預訂系統預訂飲食  你去之前預定！ 你可以在你到達之前預訂第一次住了三個晚上就會盡最大努力儘快和你到達那裏。 這裏的餐廳似乎很空很是討厭當你不能得到你想要的桌子。 餐廳的員工很有幫助更改預訂團隊比在電話裏所以進去詢問 亞洲餐廳  我們最不喜歡的。 壽司很糟糕。 這裏的食物是一個這麼高的標準但是亞洲不是很相同的。 但也許是更難以實現願望的能力超過這裏的廚師  超級可愛的氣泡酒！  其他的東西

review: 一次很棒的週末假期  我剛從一段短暫的電尼。 一價全包的5星級的體驗不同。 香檳和新鮮果汁的時候有一個友好的接待員向我們解釋了所有的細節（irini）關於這家酒店的。 然後他們帶我們去我們的房子有一個高爾夫球場。 新郎就讓我們感覺很受歡迎（東港）與他的笑話。 我們都覺得有些受寵若驚了。 移動到其他的酒店,那裏有各種各樣的餐館可供選擇,從意大利到亞洲和所有的東西都是包含在房費裏的（請注意這裏的大多數餐廳都是按菜單點菜!）。 食物的質量非常非常喜歡這裏的大和種類繁多的葡萄酒。 沒有收取額外的費用 法國和意大利葡萄酒。 有很多的酒吧,泳池,海灘服務,活動,兒童俱樂部,健身...簡單的說,我們覺得這家酒店是因爲在每一個55 各個方面。 感謝會館前臺經理一直問我們是否需要什麼東西每次從酒店或者格拉克尼。 來之前,我們讀了很多關於這家酒店的評論。 這次短暫的假期後,我們離開的時候最好的回憶。 如果你去了一些小細節,當然,還有這裏那裏的都是小事情。 例如； 大堂酒吧服務有時有點慢（不總是）。 也是同樣的高質量的咖啡。 需要改進的地方。 不過,這些小錯誤完全迷失和吸收到結束的時候。  Yiannis Misthos

review: 1星期Olivia Ikos在2015年5月  我們到達第2周2015年5月酒店是在它的第2周的打開。 一切都是新的和未使用,套房給我們新的無可挑剔,食物和服務都是首屈一指的,從客房服務,到餐廳工作人員到海灘服務員到酒吧員工,泳池的員工； 確定！ 所有的酒店員工！ 他們對細節的關注和對我們周到讓我們感覺很特別,你有很有禮貌的年輕男子和婦女工作您和我們聊了一個下午雷雨酒吧非常有趣而且很有趣,希望經濟危機來的可愛的國家不會讓人望而卻步。 我們很喜歡這裏和度過了美妙的時光。 今年我們將會看到你的好運氣和第1特雷列斯,等不及。
Eng: 1 week Olivia Ikos in May 2015 We arrived in the 2nd week May 2015 The hotel was opened in its 2nd week. Everything is new and unused, the suites give us new impeccable, food and service are second to none, from room service, to restaurant staff to beach staff to bar staff, pool staff; OK! All hotel employees! Their attention to detail and being attentive to us made us feel special. You have very polite young men and women working. You chatted with us in the afternoon. The thunderstorm bar is very interesting and very interesting. Hope that the lovely country coming from the economic crisis will not Deterring. We loved it and had a wonderful time. This year we will see your good luck and 1st Treles, can't wait.

review: 香港特色的一條街  廟街是佐郭和油麻地之間,每天的黃昏，數百的攤子開始在馬路上做生意,這個地方曾有不小電影在這裡取景,裡面有粵曲迷作即興演出,還有人表演唱粵語流行曲,相士睇相,還有很多不同種類的貨物,食肆和大排擋給遊客選擇。
Eng: A street with temples in Hong Kong is between Zuoguo and Yau Ma Tei. Every evening, hundreds of stalls start to do business on the road. This place used to have a lot of movies filmed here. There are Cantonese fans performing impromptu performances. There are people who sing Cantonese pop songs, lovers look at each other, there are many different kinds of goods, restaurants and food stalls for tourists to choose.

review: 超級經濟艙免費升級為商務艙，但服務態度一般  之前乘坐英國曼徹斯特途徑香港飛往上海的航班，預定的超級經濟艙被意外升級為商務艙，商務艙非常舒服，但是乘務人員的服務態度非常一般，飛機餐味道也一般，但是被免費升級了還是非常開心。
Eng: Super economy class is upgraded to business class free of charge, but the service attitude is generally taken from Manchester, UK to Hong Kong to Shanghai, the scheduled super economy class was accidentally upgraded to business class, business class is very comfortable, but the service attitude of the crew is very general The taste of aircraft meals is average, but I am very happy to be upgraded for free.

review: 可一可再入住酒店系列  靠近地鐵站，靜中帶旺，服務周到，唯一建議是恆溫遊泳池水溫如果再高一點就更好了，早餐是半自助，這樣不會浪費食物，挺不錯的。房間內設施也非常體貼，整體都不錯。
Eng: Can stay again in the hotel series Close to the subway station, quiet and prosperous, good service, the only suggestion is that if the temperature of the heated swimming pool is a little higher, the breakfast is semi-buffet, so it will not waste food, it is very good. The facilities in the room are also very considerate and overall are good.

review: 美好的方式來度過一個星期  住在這裏是因爲我們一家四口在五月下旬半學期和這是一個很棒的假期。 主要的積分：    這裏的員工簡直不能爲你做的。 他們是令人難以置信和不知疲倦的工作。    房間保持的一塵不染,我們住的是一間臥室的套房很適合我們四個人的房間也很寬敞。 如果我們再去那裏。 我想試試一個面朝大海的小屋看起來棒極了。    食物很美味而且量很足。    整個周圍的環境都很漂亮而且維護得很好,這是一個示例顯示使用的香草花園度假村的餐廳   家庭活動都非常好。    免費無綫上網很棒有很好的帶寬和你將很難找到一個地方它是不可訪問的包括海灘。  幾點有助於爲您的住宿：    你可以提前預訂餐廳如果你打算嘗試一個按菜單點菜的餐廳。 可以理解這些很忙但是你可以提前通過電子郵件預訂3餐廳和我會推薦這家。    如果這家酒店會很迷你  活動（迪斯科, pygama方,電影院晚上,等）可能有點晚於7下午  8下午。 它會給我一個機會提前吃好家庭  我的很多工作人員是需要吃東西狼吞虎咽的通常由7下午和！  但這些都是小問題和秋天的路程。 這家酒店是完美的和你在這裏的時候都會爲將來的假期和被寵壞了  我們都在努力找一家比較明年的假期。
Eng: Wonderful way to spend a week staying here because our family of four was in the second half of May and it was a great holiday. Main points: The staff here can hardly do it for you. They are an incredible and tireless job. The room was kept spotlessly clean, we stayed in a one bedroom suite which was very suitable for the four of us and the room was very spacious. If we go there again. I want to try a cabin facing the sea that looks great. The food is delicious and generous. The surrounding environment is beautiful and well maintained. This is an example showing the use of the Vanilla Garden Resort restaurant. Family activities are very good. Free wireless internet is great with good bandwidth and you will have a hard time finding a place which is inaccessible including the beach. A few points are helpful for your stay: You can book a restaurant in advance if you plan to try an a la carte restaurant. Understandably these are busy but you can book 3 restaurants in advance by email and I will recommend this. If this hotel will be very mini events (disco, pygama party, cinema evening, etc.) may be a little later than 7pm to 8pm. It will give me a chance to eat a good family in advance. Many of my staff are in need of food to gobble up usually by 7pm and! But these are minor problems and the journey of autumn. This hotel is perfect and you will be spoilt for future vacations when you are here. We are all trying to find a vacation that compares next year.

review: 豪華經濟艙  這是我第一次在pe,外面就試試吧。 優點辦理入住手續,座位,室內游泳池,食物（我喜歡飛機食物）缺點歇腳的地方,服務（我覺得這應該是一個更好一點,沒想到公務艙,但一些比是什麼）。  國泰的飛機很少幾次。 我發現他們有一個很棒的航空公司使用。 我想我不會再做pe,不值得額外的價格
Eng: Premium Economy Class This is my first time on PE, just try it out. Pros Check-in, seats, indoor pool, food (I like airplane food), shortcomings, service (I think this should be a little better, I didn't expect business class, but some are better than what). Cathay Pacific’s planes are rare. I found that they have a great airline use. I don't think I will do pe again, it is not worth the extra price

review: 下午2時許Chick in 時人多，有些混亂。
Eng: At 2 pm, Chick in was crowded and a little confused.

review: 有選擇下不會再坐國泰  選搭豪華經濟艙,但checkin 時無晒位! 最後都是坐普通經濟。飛機餐飲非常難吃。說實話, 很多廉航的餐飲比國泰好。如非必要, 不會再坐物非所價的國泰。
Eng: If you have a choice, you will not sit in Cathay Pacific to choose the premium economy class, but there is no place to check in when you checkin! In the end, you will sit in the ordinary economy. Airplane meals are very unpalatable. To be honest, many low-cost airlines have better catering than Cathay Pacific. If it is not necessary, Cathay Pacific will no longer sit at the price.

review: 實惠便捷又不寒酸三經半夜搭機的最佳選擇  1.班級時段好,不是三更半夜 2.搭機時間便捷 3.飛機服務品質都OK! 4.唯一的是有時香港機場停的位置會比較遠,不過都有接駁還好

review: 會再次選擇  由德國飛香港，再由香港飛德國的兩次飛行都讓我覺得很值得推薦。餐點美味、服務也很不錯。 國泰航班（FRAHKG航段所提供的素食餐茄汁義式焗筆管麵，非常美味！（大推～） CX288,（30.June特別謝謝服務我的座位區的韓籍空服組員。整趟旅程都非常親切服務。 此航段在餐後還會提供知名品牌的冰淇淋。 下一次旅行，我仍然會選擇國泰航空。
Eng: Will choose again to fly from Germany to Hong Kong, and then two flights from Hong Kong to Germany made me feel very recommendable. The food was delicious and the service was very good. Cathay Pacific flight (FRAHKG segment provides vegetarian meal tomato sauce Italian-style pen noodle tube, very delicious! (big push ~) CX288, (30.June special thanks to the Korean flight attendant who served my seating area. The whole trip The journey is very kind service. This segment will also provide ice cream of well-known brands after the meal. On the next trip, I will still choose Cathay Pacific.

review: 品嚐當地的氛圍  廟街夜市保留其原來的氛圍時年代的大部分香港有因爲得更改。 樓有各種類型的但在其豎立帳篷晚上只打開, 銷售的各種與商店以更低的價格。 望月附近卡住, 物美價廉的食物。 有趣的是現在的老外很多訪問者（他們可能像是本地的）。 如果您來香港要看到正宗的和本地內容, 則您應看到的廟街, 而不是高檔的商場倫敦和巴黎類似。
Eng: Taste the local vibe The Temple Street Night Market retains its original vibe when most of Hong Kong had to change it. There are various types of buildings but only open at night when their tents are erected, and all kinds of shops are sold at lower prices. Stuck near Mochizuki, good quality and cheap food. What is interesting is that many foreigners are now visitors (they may seem to be local). If you come to Hong Kong to see authentic and local content, you should see Temple Street, not upscale malls like London and Paris.

review: 冷氣熱水足夠
Eng: Enough cold air and hot water

review: 座位舒服，空中服務員有禮，樂意幫助乘客  國泰航空的機艙座位空間足夠，感覺舒適。 座位有娛樂設備，有很多不同類型的電影選擇。 機艙服務員樂意幫助乘客，非常有禮。 國泰航空提供的餐飲，雖然選擇不多，但味道不錯。 有一缺點，就是機艙的走廊通道窄，只可一人通過，當機艙服務員派餐時，乘客不能通過去洗手間。
Eng: The seats are comfortable and the flight attendants are polite and willing to help passengers. Cathay Pacific’s cabin seats have enough space and feel comfortable. The seats have entertainment equipment and there are many different types of movies to choose from. The cabin attendant was very courteous to help passengers. Cathay Pacific's food and beverage, although not many choices, but tastes good. One drawback is that the corridor of the cabin is narrow and can only be passed by one person. When the cabin attendant dispatches a meal, passengers cannot pass to the toilet.

review: 個人護理用品希望可以增加梳 不足基本無乜
Eng: Personal care products hope to increase combing

review: 很棒的服務  這是我們第一次住在這家酒店住過之後大洋洲olivia去年的這個時候。 再說一次,一個很棒的住和不能更加強烈的推薦和預訂ikos點準備明年再來。   我們有一個可愛的歡迎我們下了出租車和接待處。 當我們走進我們的房間裏有一個可愛的蛋糕因爲我們是慶祝我們的結婚紀念日香檳  謝謝你。 我們晚上很晚纔到點了客房送餐服務和你有一個很大的冰箱的飲料。   住在一間全景海景套房是我們兩個人來說足夠寬敞也還有我們十幾歲的女兒。 房間設施非常棒而且非常舒適。   服務和員工都很友善很棒和一個信譽ikos這也是你爲什麼要在這樣一個巨大的因素也會再來  他們所以要確保在您入住期間的一切都很完美。 無論它是海灘前的團隊,客房清潔人員,前臺,客戶關係,餐廳的管理和他們的員工,水療員工等等,他們都做一個了不起的工作和想得到它適合你。   餐廳,食物和酒很好而且我很喜歡這裏的海灘前的方面的口味,酒和福斯科。 我們最喜歡的是亞洲的菜,那裏的經理非常熱情和周到。 她的推薦很棒的食物和酒都很值得讚賞。 我們還很喜歡這裏的意大利和很幸運的在那裏吃過兩次。 我們的服務員,喬治,總是面帶微笑而且非常樂於助人。 我們在一家希臘餐廳午餐和那裏的工作人員也非常細心和樂於助人而且總是一個很好的自助選擇在午餐時間。 我很高興再次來聽他的新角色和很棒的雞尾酒吧  他總是可見對面來確保和顯示不同的餐廳和一切都很好很熱情好客。   我強烈推薦你訂了3晚上你都能夠提前爲客人提供點菜服務的到之前避免失望。   使用水療和非常安靜。 很棒的設計與室內去室外游泳池和日光浴牀外面來這裏放鬆如果想找一個非常安靜。 我再次預定了我之前的待遇我出來了。 任何疑問之前或期間進行的酒店住的都是快速和高效的解決和對我們很有幫助。   沙灘和海水很乾淨,很棒的水上運動設施。 很棒的運動活動娛樂健身中心。
Eng: Great service This is the first time we stayed in this hotel after staying in Oceania olivia this time last year. Again, a great stay and can't recommend it more strongly and book ikos points ready to come again next year. We had a lovely welcome as we got off the taxi and the reception. When we walked into our room there was a lovely cake because we are celebrating our wedding anniversary with champagne. Thank you. We arrived late in the evening and ordered room service and you have a large fridge for drinks. Living in a panoramic sea view suite is spacious enough for both of us and also our teenage daughter. The room facilities are excellent and very comfortable. The service and staff are very friendly and great and a credible ikos which is why you should come back in such a huge factor so they must make sure everything is perfect during your stay. Whether it's a beach front team, room cleaning staff, front desk, customer relations, restaurant management and their employees, spa staff, etc., they all do an amazing job and want to get it for you. The restaurant, food and wine are good and I love the taste of the beach front, wine and Fosco. Our favorite is Asian cuisine, where the manager is very enthusiastic and attentive. Her recommendation of great food and wine is commendable. We also love the Italian here and were lucky to have eaten there twice. Our waiter, George, is always smiling and very helpful. We had lunch in a Greek restaurant and the staff there were also very attentive and helpful and always a good buffet choice at lunch time. I am very happy to come to listen to his new role and great cocktail bar again. He is always visible opposite to ensure and display different restaurants and everything is good and hospitable. I highly recommend that you book for 3 nights and you will be able to provide a la carte service in advance to avoid disappointment before arrival. Use spa and very quiet. Great design with indoor go to outdoor swimming pool and sunbed outside to relax here if you want to find a very quiet. I booked my previous treatment again and I came out. Any questions before or during the hotel stay are resolved quickly and efficiently and are very helpful to us. The beach and sea water are very clean and great water sports facilities. Great sports activities entertainment fitness center.

review: 另一次美妙的旅程ikos olivia   来这家酒店住了一个星期之后在今年六月我在那的时候我又定了10天的另一个令我印象深刻的是酒店和餐馆。 工作人员都不能为你做足够让我们感觉自己就像是那里唯一的客人。 我要特别感谢timos获取我同样的平房里有泳池正如我以前真是太令人惊异了,还要感谢酒店的经理乔治的意大利餐厅让我们海滩上的晚餐是世界上绝无仅有的。 我会推荐这家预订当你住在那里。 豪华的游泳池和酒吧都很好的服务也是首屈一指的你点了饮料和食物的时候一整天都在太阳床完全放松,一定会再去的和已经有朋友在我的推荐下也去那里过得非常愉快。 再次感谢所有的工作人员看到你明年
Eng: Another wonderful trip ikos olivia came to this hotel for a week and then in June of this year I was there for another 10 days. Another thing that impressed me was the hotel and restaurant. The staff can't do enough for you to make us feel like the only guests there. I especially want to thank Timos for getting my same bungalow with a swimming pool as I used to be so amazing, and also thank the hotel manager George's Italian restaurant for making our dinner on the beach unique in the world. I would recommend this reservation when you live there. The luxurious swimming pool and bar are very good and the service is second to none. When you order drinks and food, you are completely relaxed on the sun bed all day. You will definitely go again and have friends who have gone there on my recommendation. very happy. Thanks again to all the staff for seeing you next year

review: 很棒的家庭酒店全包！  我和我女兒,女婿和兩個孫女一個星期作爲我們的珍珠婚紀念日慶祝活動的一部分。 一切都很好你讀過之前的評論是完全準確的！ 這是一家漂亮的酒店,華麗的花園和庭院都很棒而且保持的非常乾淨整潔。 都是質量很好的餐廳,我們最喜歡的是普羅旺斯和酒和食物真是令人難以置信的！ 住宿我相信一切都很好,我們住的是'豪華區域'在一間臥室別墅有一個私人游泳池和俯瞰大海的我們一家人在一個兩間臥室的別墅。 兩個都很卓越的品質和很棒的客房清潔人員每天都維護得很好。 我們的泳池是一個很好的大小,比一個跌水池,你可以在裏面游泳！ 所有的員工都很棒,很有禮貌,友好,專業和genuinley似乎不管他們願意爲你提供幫助。 特別要感謝喬治（這裏的總管）在茴香和安娜,喬治毫無疑問是最好的度假村裏的總管, iliana在豪華泳池酒吧,在普羅旺斯和stella giorgis在酒和福斯科。 特別還要感謝客戶關係經理tasos。 尤其是在豪華海灘區域很可愛和所有的非機動水上活動都是免費的。 有一個很好的選擇的本地和國際葡萄酒烈酒和,房費裏包含了所有！ 這是一個真正的天堂的家庭來說,也許不是最好的選擇因爲它主要是爲家庭和幾個周圍有很多小孩子在我們在那裏的時候居住。 在說,我們不會再回到我們的孫子沒有！ 娛樂節目也不錯種類很多。 這家酒店的位置絕對ikos有適當的級別,他們的產品爲具有卓越的整體！ 一個較高的級別,全包,適合全家度假。 如果我有任何批評,可用性的餐廳在一個按菜單點菜的餐廳很難預定。 沒有優先的豪華住宿的客人和我們好不容易纔得到我們所想要的。 然而,這家迷人的經理我跟他向我保證說這裏的客人提到過很多次和該公司正研究如何改善這一點。 客戶服務很棒！  不便宜但是真的去這裏的貨幣卓越的價值。 如果你有一個家庭,這家酒店一定會把您的列表去遊覽的地方的。 我不是容易印象深刻但這個度假村真的很特別！
Eng: Great family hotel all inclusive! My daughter, son-in-law and two granddaughters and I spent a week as part of our pearl wedding anniversary celebration. Everything is fine. The comments you have read before are completely accurate! This is a beautiful hotel with gorgeous gardens and courtyards that are great and kept very clean and tidy. All are good quality restaurants, our favorite is Provence and the wine and food are incredible! Accommodation I believe everything is fine, we stayed in a'luxury area' in a one bedroom villa with a private pool and our family overlooking the sea in a two bedroom villa. Both are of excellent quality and the room cleaning staff are well maintained every day. Our swimming pool is a good size, than a plunge pool where you can swim! All the staff are great, polite, friendly, professional and genuinley seem to help you no matter what they are willing to do. Special thanks to George (headmaster here) at Fennel and Anna, George is undoubtedly the best headmaster at the resort, iliana at the luxury pool bar, Provence and stella giorgis at the wine and Fosco. Special thanks to customer relationship manager tasos. Especially in the luxury beach area is cute and all non-motorized water activities are free. There is a good selection of local and international wines and spirits, all included in the room rate! This is a true paradise for the family, maybe not the best choice because it is mainly for the family and a few children living around when we are there. Saying that we will not return to our grandson again! There are also many types of entertainment. The location of this hotel is absolutely ikos with the appropriate level, and their products have an excellent overall! A higher level, all inclusive, suitable for a family vacation. If I have any criticism, the availability of the restaurant is difficult to book in an a la carte restaurant. Guests without priority luxury accommodation and we finally got what we wanted. However, the charming manager and I assured him that the guests here mentioned it many times and the company was studying how to improve this. Customer service is great! Not cheap but really worth the money to go here. If you have a family, this hotel will definitely take your list of places to visit. I am not easily impressed but this resort is really special!

review: 4隔音欠佳

review: 興奮！  剛從Ikos Olivia和我所能說的就是這是目前爲止最好的酒店我去過！ 獨特的體繫結構裝修非常漂亮！ 舒適的房間有非常讓人放鬆的牀！ 高品質的食物和各種葡萄酒的大考慮到這是一個全包酒店而！ 留下了非常深刻的熱情和專業人員。 等不及要再來這家酒店明年夏天！
Eng: Excited! All I can say from Ikos Olivia and this is that this is by far the best hotel I have been to! The unique architecture decoration is very beautiful! Comfortable room with very relaxing bed! Great quality food and great variety of wines considering that this is an all inclusive hotel! Leave a very deep enthusiasm and professionals. Can't wait to visit this hotel again next summer!

review: 座位寬敞，飛機餐不錯  端午連假從台灣去名古屋，半年前購買，票價落在9800，機位空間大，飛機餐也不錯，但唯有回程的飛機餐沒有不是牛肉的餐點，有點不方便。
Eng: The seats are spacious, the plane meal is good, and the Dragon Boat Festival is going to Nagoya from Taiwan. I bought it half a year ago. The ticket price is 9800. The space is large. The plane meal is also good, but the only return flight meal is not a beef meal. Convenience.

review: 行李意外地在轉機卸下，要在機場呆等了三個多小時才領回  同一班飛機從香港經台北往大阪，在香港櫃枱寄存行李行李牌說明直達大阪。不幸地到達大阪，地勤人員告知行李意外地在台北卸下，要在機場呆等了三個多小時才領回行李。
Eng: The luggage was accidentally unloaded at the transfer, and it took more than three hours to stay at the airport before it was retrieved. The same flight went from Hong Kong to Taipei via Osaka to Osaka, and the luggage luggage tag was stored at the Hong Kong counter to direct it to Osaka. Unfortunately, when arriving in Osaka, the ground staff informed that the luggage was accidentally unloaded in Taipei and had to stay at the airport for more than three hours before receiving the luggage.

review: 不錯  於雙十連續假日搭乘國泰航空至香港，總體來說中規中矩還不錯。機上服務人員親切且機票也不貴，下次會再考慮搭乘。
Eng: Not bad On Cathay Pacific to Hong Kong during the double ten consecutive holidays, overall it was quite satisfactory. The on-board service staff is kind and the air ticket is not expensive.

review: 5天的朋友一起旅行  工作人員非常熱情而且在我們住宿期間一直到達的。 我想說的是這裏的服務是我見過的最好的讓我們的假期更完美了。 我們是一羣16這是很難做到的餐廳和酒店的所有工作人員隨時準備爲您服務但是我們多美！e所以我們設法坐在一起吃飯每頓飯都在同一時間。 所有的員工都很棒和elena站出來因爲她實在是太令人愉快並沒有什麼太多的麻煩。  早餐的食物每家餐館的午餐和晚餐很棒和可供選擇的葡萄酒和雞尾酒也很好。  泳池區域非常乾淨而且有充足的躺椅和它坐落在自己的私人海灘有躺椅和服務生的服務。   房間很大,現代和每日客房清潔服務很棒。 枕頭非常的舒服和我們每天晚上都睡得很好。  我強烈推薦這家酒店而且絕對會再來的。 感謝所有在ikos olivia一個美好的住宿。
Eng: 5 days travel with friends The staff was very welcoming and arrived all the time during our stay. What I want to say is that the service here is the best I have ever seen to make our holiday more perfect. We are a group of 16 It is difficult to do all the restaurant and hotel staff are always ready to serve you but how beautiful we are! e So we managed to sit together and eat every meal at the same time. All the staff were great and elena stood out because she was so pleasant and not too much trouble. The food for breakfast is great for lunch and dinner in every restaurant and the choice of wine and cocktails is also very good. The pool area is very clean and has plenty of deck chairs and it is located on its own private beach with deck chairs and waiter service. The rooms are large and the modern and daily room cleaning service is great. The pillows were very comfortable and we slept very well every night. I highly recommend this hotel and will definitely return. Thanks to all for a wonderful stay in ikos olivia.

review: 酒店设施略老旧
Eng: Hotel facilities are slightly old

review: 酒店附近的深井陈记烧鹅一定不要去，一定不要去，一定不要去。又难吃又贵而且只接受现金。
Eng: Shen Ji Roast Goose near the hotel must not go, must not go, must not go. It is ugly and expensive and only accepts cash.

review: 再也不來了  我的印象是這是一個世界一流的國泰航空公司。 可悲的是它不是。 舊飛機,座位不舒服而混亂的服務使這家航空公司我也不會再坐飛機回家。 他們有許多其他航空公司被甩在了後面。 爲您的下一個選擇國泰坐長途飛機後果自負！
Eng: Never come again My impression is that this is a world-class Cathay Pacific. Sadly it is not. The old plane, uncomfortable seats and chaotic service make this airline I will not fly home again. They have many other airlines left behind. Choose Cathay Pacific for your next long-distance flight at your own risk!

review: 很適合看一看  我永遠不會厭倦步行穿過廟街夜市。 也許你會發現有很多值得看和買什麼東西。 而且要做好砍價的步行路程... 你會發現另一個攤位賣的同樣的事情。 避免手袋的銷售人員和小販看那些想帶你到樓上的房間你會感覺到像是被困在和被強迫買就出去。 有很多食物的選擇和我從來沒有吃過一頓不好的。 在一個炎熱的夜晚有點太近和在一個溼漉漉的整晚不好玩,但其他任何時間去多花些錢在一個開放的心態和你真的不需要的東西。 玩得很開心。
Eng: Great for taking a look. I will never get tired of walking through Temple Street Night Market. Maybe you will find that there are many things worth seeing and buying. And to make a good bargain walk... You will find another stall selling the same thing. Avoid salespeople and hawkers of handbags looking at rooms that want to take you upstairs. You will feel like you are trapped and forced to go out. There are many food choices and I have never had a bad meal. It's a little too close on a hot night and not fun on a wet all night, but any other time to spend more money in an open mind and something you really don't need. Have a great time.

review: 免費參觀，飽覽美景和靚酒店房  美利歷史導賞團  這個新推出的免費導賞團十分受歡迎，如果幾個人想一起參與的話，要46星期前就電郵預訂。  行程中的City Insider Michael 熱情地介紹酒店如何由一棟舊政府大樓改造而成，令我們都讚嘆建築師的巧思。行程中會登上酒店天台的餐廳看風景，又會參觀酒店的不同客房。如果碰巧是45月參觀，應該可以看到酒店門前那棵古老的榭開花。行程完結時酒店還為參加者準備了一杯Signature drink, 可以稍稍休息才離開。對本地的旅客來說，這也是一個不錯的週末家庭活動。
Eng: Free visit, full view and beautiful hotel room Murray History Guided Tour This newly launched free guided tour is very popular. If several people want to participate together, it must be booked by email 46 weeks ago. City Insider Michael in the itinerary warmly introduced how the hotel was transformed from an old government building, which made us all admire the architect's ingenuity. During the itinerary, you will visit the restaurant on the rooftop of the hotel to see the scenery, and you will visit the different rooms of the hotel. If you happen to visit it in April, you should be able to see the old flower in front of the hotel. At the end of the itinerary, the hotel also prepared a signature drink for the participants. You can take a short break before leaving. For local travelers, this is also a good weekend family activity.

review: 很棒的航空公司  我只是喜歡他們的新業務類（左右）  這裏有平整的牀還有很棒的腿部空間。 Cx和工作人員總是樂於助人和高效。 當然這是一個在世界上最好的航空公司（如果不是）！
Eng: Great airline I just like their new business class (left and right) There are flat beds and great leg room. Cx and staff are always helpful and efficient. Of course this is the best airline in the world (if not)!

review: 令人興奮的購物  如果你想找便宜的t  襯衫,手袋,玩具,紀念品,雨傘等那麼這就是你要去的地方。 它不會是頂級的但通常和時尚的手袋最特別的是做得很好。 檢查砍價和縫合等。 有多種類型的紀念品冰箱磁鐵和其他東西。 兒童服裝（小孩和年輕的）很棒。 要看好你的錢包和錢包因爲它可能也相噹的擁擠和總是有一個小偷的機會
Eng: Exciting shopping If you are looking for cheap t-shirts, handbags, toys, souvenirs, umbrellas, etc. then this is the place to go. It will not be top-notch, but the most special of the fashionable handbags is that they are well done. Check bargains and stitching. There are many types of souvenir refrigerator magnets and other things. Children's clothing (children and young ones) is great. Be optimistic about your wallet and purse because it may also be quite crowded and there is always a chance for a thief

review: 真是一次很棒的經歷在海港城！  海港城是一個很棒的購物中心去！ 各種各樣的商店,高存在下列任客戶服務,有一個漂亮的海港景色！   一個很棒的戶外設置爲提供的照片使用現有的牀鋪時不需每年,從鎮,大黃鴨,到今年的小精靈。 大飛小精靈在網關中吸人眼球的是,那裏銷售和紀念品也都不錯。  它會是一件很令人高興還有一個娛樂區域vistior任何想玩遊戲。 我幾乎就可以在這裏一整天！
Eng: What a great experience in Harbour City! Harbour City is a great shopping mall to go! Various shops, high-presence customer service, with a beautiful harbour view! A great outdoor setting is provided for the photos provided using existing beds when not required every year, from the town, the yellow duck, to this year's elf. What attracts the eyes of the Dafei elf in the gateway is that the sales and souvenirs there are also good. It would be a pleasure to have a vistior entertainment area for anyone who wants to play games. I can almost be here all day!

review: 航班時間不錯，服務佳    航班時間很不錯適合早去晚回，白天還可以上班，地勤跟空服人員的服務都很不錯。有疑問會盡快解決，個人還蠻常搭國泰的。
Eng: The flight time is good, and the service is good. The flight time is very good. It is suitable for going early and returning late. You can also go to work during the day. The ground service and flight attendant services are very good. Questions will be resolved as soon as possible, personally quite often Cathay Pacific.

review: 悦来酒店就在悦来坊这个商场的三楼，挺好找的，就是离地铁有些远，走个10分钟吧。附近有一些商场，也要走10几分钟，总体来说还是不错的。
Eng: The Yuelai Hotel is on the third floor of the mall, Yuelaifang. It's easy to find. It's a little far from the subway. Just walk for 10 minutes. There are some shopping malls nearby and you have to walk for 10 minutes, which is generally good.

review: 日本之旅2016年2月  我喜歡坐飛機國泰航空公司。 在過去的6個月一直在使用這家航空公司的兩倍。 最後一次是在日本。 方便快捷的登記入住。 友好的工作人員。 我遇到的唯一問題是從泗水到香港。 我的耳機接口不能正常工作。 所以,沒有聲音的娛樂活動。 即使空姐後重新啓動程序,仍然沒有結果。 幸運的是我有我自己的設備。 但總體而言。 我很滿足。
Eng: Journey to Japan February 2016 I like to fly by Cathay Pacific. In the past 6 months has been using this airline twice. The last time was in Japan. Easy and fast check-in. Friendly staff. The only problem I encountered was from Surabaya to Hong Kong. My headphone jack is not working properly. Therefore, there is no sound entertainment. Even after the flight attendant restarted the program, there was still no result. Fortunately, I have my own device. But overall. I am satisfied.

review: 假期ikos olivia  這是我們第一次到ikos olivia ,和我們第三次整體來說ikos品牌（ikos大洋洲巴黎波特凡爾賽酒店住過兩次了）。 我妻子和我在這兩家酒店都是無法表達有多棒了。 Olivia顯然是新的,而且當我們住在那裏的2017年6月真是棒極了。 所有的員工都很有禮貌和樂於助人,那裏的食物很棒而且種類很多,不同的餐館很棒,有很多的飲料,房間非常舒適和寬敞,服務員都很有禮貌,事實上我們不能有足夠的工作人員的讚美和管理。 管理是經常四處走走很高興和你交談的事情。 我們已經有一些很棒的酒店住過,但我們肯定把ikos品牌在列表的頂部。 我們實際上是今年九月再去大洋洲（他們最近在這家酒店已經翻修過）和非常盼望着再見到那些員工管理。 從你到達的那一刻到你離開的那一刻起他們會讓你感覺很特別。 感謝所有在ikos。
Eng: Holidays ikos olivia This is our first time to ikos olivia, and our third overall ikos brand (ikos Oceania Paris Porte Versailles stayed twice). My wife and I couldn't express how great they were in these two hotels. Olivia is obviously new, and June 2017 when we lived there was really awesome. All the staff are polite and helpful, the food there is great and the variety is great, the different restaurants are great, there are a lot of drinks, the room is very comfortable and spacious, the waiters are very polite, in fact we can't have enough Staff praise and management. Management is something that is always happy to talk to you about walking around. We have already had some great hotels, but we definitely put the ikos brand at the top of the list. We actually went to Oceania again in September this year (they have recently been renovated at this hotel) and look forward to seeing those staff management again. They will make you feel special from the moment you arrive to the moment you leave. Thanks all in ikos.

review: 服務態度好
Eng: Good service attitude

review: 絕對完美... 不要聽信任何負面的評論,現在就預訂吧！   我寫這篇評論因爲我躺在躺椅上可以俯瞰美麗的海灘我可愛的游泳池,在美麗的陽光。 我和我老公以及11個月大的寶寶都有早上坐在我旁邊的躺椅上打盹。   首先。 這家度假村是預定作爲一個早到的生日禮物老公爲30個月變成的盡頭。 我們已經走遍了世界各地雖然我們是一點都不勢利,我們早已習慣了風格和旅行住在5 星級酒店有美食家全包產品和服務作爲典型的事情。 不用說。 我知道我們家第一次到國外度假肯定會有所不同因爲它會適合任何夫婦最近有一個孩子。 我們知道我們的生活中是很強的集會和日常等已經改變了很多我們的女兒走進了我們的生活但是她還有以適合有點到以前的生活和我們記住這一點是我想要的是一個很棒的家庭假期會滿足你所有的要求和一些特別的東西是我丈夫的生日。   Ikos olivia有沒有讓我們失望。   從我們到達的那一刻起我們度假村的私人接機親屬機場40分鐘後,我們就知道這不只是一個普通的地方。 有一小羣工作人員微笑着和我們打招呼之前幫我們拿了行李帶我們在酒店裏面的。 第一印象是哇！ 漂亮和乾淨也有簡單而令人驚歎的燈具和傢俱讓它看起來十分優雅。 我們坐下來喝杯小之前的時間被護送到前臺辦理入住手續時他們給了我們一杯香檳。 登記入住非常迅速和他們解釋本身酒店給我們的一切。   房間： 我們被帶到了我們的房間後不久坐馬車司機給我們指出了事情的解釋因爲我們開車佈局。 我們住在一個海景平房  我預訂了一個普通套房和提前發郵件問瞭如果我們有一個房間位於所以我們可以得到一個不錯的日落。 知道了這是一個特殊的日子我們就得到了升級和所有我能說的就是感謝。 我們有最棒的景觀從我們的房間的大小對我們家人來說這是一個完美的無可挑剔的乾淨和所有的現代化生活設備3 .你想要需要。   食物： 就事論事。
Eng: Absolutely perfect... Don't listen to any negative reviews, book now! I wrote this review because I lay on a lounger overlooking the beautiful beach and my lovely swimming pool, under the beautiful sunlight. My husband and I, as well as the 11-month-old baby, both took a nap on the lounge chair next to me in the morning. First of all. This resort is scheduled to end as an early birthday gift for her husband for 30 months. We have traveled all over the world. Although we are not snobbish at all, we have long been accustomed to style and travel. Staying at a 5 star hotel has foodies all-inclusive products and services as typical things. Needless to say. I know that our family's first vacation abroad will definitely be different because it will suit any couple who recently had a child. We know that our life is very strong. The assembly and daily life have changed a lot. Our daughter walked into our life but she still has to fit a little to the previous life and we remember this is what I want is A great family holiday will meet all your requirements and something special is my husband's birthday. Did Ikos olivia disappoint us. From the moment we arrived at our resort's private pick-up relative airport 40 minutes later, we knew that this was not just an ordinary place. A small group of staff smiled and greeted us before taking us the luggage to take us inside the hotel. The first impression is wow! Beautiful and clean with simple and amazing lamps and furniture to make it look very elegant. We were escorted to the front desk when we sat down and had a glass of wine before check-in. They gave us a glass of champagne. Check in was very quick and they explained everything the hotel gave us. Room: We were taken to our room shortly after the carriage driver pointed us to an explanation of the matter because we drove the layout. We stayed in a bungalow with sea view. I booked a junior suite and emailed in advance to ask if we had a room located so we could get a nice sunset. Knowing that this is a special day we got an upgrade and all I can say is thanks. We have the best view from the size of our room to our family. It is a perfect impeccably clean and all modern living equipment 3. You want it. Food: Talk about things.

review: 比想飲中好  本來是乘搭另一航班, 但因該航空某些問題而改了國泰航空 之前搭過兩次去 分別為去英國及台灣 兩次的體驗都不太好 是次反而不錯 準時boarding 起飛到達 穩定 飛機餐有飯或意粉選擇 我挑了蕃茄長通粉, 味道不錯, 另有雪糕 電影選擇也很多

review: 額外的  我們沒有見過的最出色的希臘之旅的完美的酒店有很好的服務和食物。 乾淨程度在較高的級別,提供了一個很大的度假村有很多適合各種口味和需要。 明年肯定還會重複
Eng: Extra The perfect hotel on the best trip to Greece that we haven't seen yet with good service and food. The cleanliness is at a higher level and provides a large resort with a lot to suit all tastes and needs. Will definitely repeat next year

review: 很大的商場  這個商場位於尖沙咀，有時裝店、電器店、食肆，在海運觀景可以欣賞維港景色，入口部份有時舉行展覽，如聖誕、農曆新年等重要節日。
Eng: Very large shopping mall This shopping mall is located in Tsim Sha Tsui. It has fashion shops, electrical appliances stores, restaurants, and you can enjoy the view of Victoria Harbour from the ocean view. There are sometimes exhibitions at the entrance, such as Christmas, Chinese New Year and other important festivals.

review: 没有不满意。
Eng: No dissatisfaction.

review: 值得一搭再搭的國際航空公司  一月底彈完新加坡NAFA的鋼琴音樂節，密集式上了好十幾個小時的課，終於又要回家了。 也許連日奔波勞頓的行程讓我覺得很疲憊，一上飛機不到十分鐘就睡著了。 到送餐時間，服務員就安靜地略過我，然後我再按鈴請求送餐也很快送到。這趟旅程的餐點還可以接受，飲料部分希望可以有日式抹茶，這次的烏龍茶也是不錯。 感謝機組人員把我安全送回家。
Eng: It is worthwhile to take the international airline again and again at the end of January to play the Singapore NAFA piano music festival, intensively spent more than ten hours of classes, and finally have to go home again. Maybe the day-to-day trip to Lawton made me feel very tired, and fell asleep within ten minutes of getting on the plane. When the meal was delivered, the waiter skipped me quietly, and then I rang the bell to request the meal to be delivered quickly. Meals on this journey are also acceptable, and the beverage part hopes to have Japanese-style matcha, and this time oolong tea is also good. Thank the crew for sending me home safely.

review: 美味的食物, 你可以在一些不錯的東西  這是值得參觀； 你可以買一些非常不錯的項目（從筷子裙子）和吃地道的中國食物最好的獎。
Eng: For delicious food, you can have some nice things which are worth visiting; you can buy some very nice items (from chopstick skirts) and the best prize for eating authentic Chinese food.

review: 3. 牆身沒有十分清潔，有少許刮花。建議使用乳膠油漆或牆紙。
Eng: 3. The wall is not very clean, with a little scratches. It is recommended to use latex paint or wallpaper.

review: 在那邊多方面一個！  這是我們第二次在國泰航空的飛機。 第一次我們升級到了豪華經濟艙。 這次我們沒有！ 當然不是很豪華,但是按照今天的標準這航空公司還是相當不錯的。 這是一個13小時的飛機所以在舒適的環境中任何改進還是值得稱讚的。 有一個小小的食物是令人滿意的更多的空間和座位的。 航空公司非常有幫助的員工提供很好的服務。 我肯定還會再來的時候可以坐他們家的飛機。
Eng: There are many ways over there! This is our second flight at Cathay Pacific. The first time we upgraded to deluxe economy class. We don't have this time! Of course not very luxurious, but the airline is quite good by today's standards. This is a 13-hour flight, so any improvement in a comfortable environment is commendable. There is a little food that is satisfying for more space and seating. The airline's very helpful employees provide good service. I will definitely be able to take their plane when I come back.

review: 微笑服務。  國泰航空公司有一個很好的安全記錄。 他們的乘務人員都是他們的強項。 他們是迷人的,周到,專業和付出額外的努力。 的商務艙的座位也是非常舒適的。
Eng: smiling service. Cathay Pacific has a good safety record. Their flight attendants are their strengths. They are charming, thoughtful, professional and pay extra effort. The seats in Business Class are also very comfortable.

review: 沒有usb插電位置
Eng: No USB plug-in location

review: 捷運出口的指示不明確中途2次找不到
Eng: The MRT exit instructions are unclear and cannot be found twice

review: 先生Suchak維沙爾   極棒的酒店和很棒的員工。 一切都很完美。 食物,游泳池,海灘都非常棒。 客房服務也是很棒的。 免費的機場接機送機的車是一個樂隊在一個奢華的貼心的服務讓我們的假期很特別。 肯定會再回去一次。
Eng: Mr. Suchak Vishal Excellent hotel and great staff. Everything is perfect. The food, swimming pool, and beach are excellent. Room service is also great. The free airport pick-up and drop-off car is a band in a luxurious and intimate service that makes our holiday very special. Will definitely go back again.

review: 危機處理極差
Eng: Crisis management is extremely poor

review: 房间装修太老旧，房间隔音不好，员工态度不好
Eng: Room decoration is too old, room sound insulation is not good, staff attitude is not good

review: 服務優良  長途飛行搭乘國泰是第2次了，除了可以累積亞洲萬里通之外，國泰的機上服務很不錯，設備齊全、乾淨整齊，機上娛樂也滿適合長途飛行，惟餐點普通，整體感覺還是很不錯。
Eng: It is the second time that Cathay Pacific has been flying with excellent service. In addition to accumulating Asia Miles, Cathay Pacific’s in-flight service is very good, well-equipped, clean and tidy, and the in-flight entertainment is also suitable for long-distance flights, but the meals are ordinary and overall I still feel very good.

review: 馬其頓語  美麗的地方。 這是家很棒的酒店在一個非常時尚的度假勝地。 strat歲完成從這裏都是無可挑剔的。 每家餐廳的員工都很棒。 房間和整個度假村都乾淨得一塵不染很乾淨。 我有一個很棒的住宿體驗。
Eng: Macedonian beautiful place. This is a great hotel in a very stylish resort. strat-year-old finishes from here are impeccable. The staff at each restaurant is great. The rooms and the entire resort were spotlessly clean. I have a great stay experience.

review: 沒有
Eng: No

review: 前枱員工態度差，一個字「西」
Eng: The front desk staff had a bad attitude, a word "West"

review: 迄今為止在香港住過最好的酒店  打開房門我驚呆了，寬敞，奢華，富有設計感，一眼就喜歡上，不想出門了。 更開心的是，所有的洗浴用品都很好用，尤其是洗髮水和手霜，也是迄今為止用到最好的，勝過歐舒丹。梳子刮鬍刀都很好用，特別是拖鞋，超級高檔。 酒店服務也挺不錯，客房服務或者尋求幫助都很快回復，晚上還送黑巧克力，非常貼心，非常推薦！
Eng: The best hotel I've stayed in Hong Kong so far. I was stunned when I opened the door. It was spacious, luxurious, and full of design. I liked it at a glance and didn't want to go out. What's even happier is that all toiletries are very good, especially shampoo and hand cream. They are also the best used so far, better than L'Occitane. Comb razors are very useful, especially slippers, super high-end. Hotel service is also very good, room service or asking for help will reply quickly, and even send dark chocolate at night, very intimate, highly recommended!

review: 夠舒服  這裏的員工真的很棒。 所有善良,樂於助人和隨時準備幫助你。 他們會給你帶可樂或者一瓶水在你想要的時候。 座位不是最舒服的,但是我一天的長途飛機所以它有讓人覺得不舒服。 小木屋成爲從空調實在是太冷了,所以需要一個比一個厚的毯子是免費的。 這裏的食物挺煩人的,但再說一次,這是一個很單調的長途飛行所以可能不是經驗豐富的當你吃的少。 在這樣的一個航班,食物托盤都是骯髒的醬汁和灑咖啡等等,所以這不是很棒但是沒有什麼用下去的擦拭溼不能解決。 是一種綜合的娛樂！
Eng: Comfortable enough The staff here are really great. All kind, helpful and ready to help you. They will bring you Coke or a bottle of water when you want. The seat is not the most comfortable, but I have a long-distance plane so it feels uncomfortable. The cabin became too cold from the air conditioner, so the need for a thicker blanket is free. The food here is quite annoying, but again, this is a very monotonous long-distance flight so it may not be experienced when you eat less. On such a flight, the food trays were all dirty sauces and spilled coffee, etc., so this is not great but there is nothing that can't be solved by wiping wet. It is a comprehensive entertainment!

review: 不值得一來  我們去這裏是因爲網上的各種評論。 我不喜歡這個地方是不值得的。 所有的一切都是非常低的質量和不值得購買
Eng: It's not worth coming. We went here because of various reviews online. I don't like this place is not worth it. Everything is very low quality and not worth buying

review: 設施破舊和損壞
Eng: Worn and damaged facilities

review: 飛往歐洲城市首選  個人搭乘國泰航空已超過10年，都是由高雄飛香港再轉機到歐洲，每次都十分滿意，尤其是飛往歐洲漫長的旅程，座椅還算寬闊，食物也可口，電影選擇多，十分推薦.
Eng: It has been more than 10 years for Cathay Pacific to fly to European cities for personal use. Kaohsiung flew to Hong Kong and then transferred to Europe. I was very satisfied every time. Especially for the long journey to Europe. The seats are still wide and the food is delicious. There are many choices for movies, highly recommended.

review: 香港女士街市  沒有享受這個市場。很多垃圾都不那麼便宜，而且市場周圍的區域很臭。更喜歡寺廟街頭市場，這裡的人們非常脾氣暴躁。
Eng: Hong Kong Ladies Market did not enjoy this market. A lot of garbage is not so cheap, and the area around the market is smelly. I prefer the temple street market, people here are very grumpy.

review: 最物有所值的湯包  我已經飛了兩次CP且尚未讓我失望。 一流的食物和飲料費用SAN。 紐約肯尼迪國際機場的航班都是ns的時候他們都很舒適。
Eng: Best value soup bag I have flown CP twice and have not disappointed me. First-class food and drinks cost San. New York JFK International Airport flights are all ns when they are comfortable.

review: 清新的和專業   我在國泰的飛行一段時間後。 印象非常深刻的點和熱情的服務。 我的航班是4 . 5小時的寧靜和san任何受其擾。   睡得很好  非常專業的工作人員  舒適的座位  和新的飛機。   在當天早些時候我有很好的體驗和互動的更令人欣慰的reddy praveen庫馬爾在辦理入住手續的櫃檯。 他們兩個都給我留下深刻印象的清新和人性化的服務。   非常感謝   Cx飛644  第39號座位上c 2月20日。
Eng: Fresh and professional After I flew in Cathay for a while. Very impressive point and warm service. My flight was 4.5 hours quiet and san any disturbed. Slept very well very professional staff comfortable seats and new aircraft. Earlier in the day I had a great experience and interaction with the more gratifying reddy praveen Kumar at the check-in counter. Both of them impressed me with the fresh and user-friendly service. Thank you very much Cx Fei 644 seat 39 on February 20th.

review: 絕對是一次難忘的經歷...  女人街向我們推薦了一些朋友在我們去酒店之前在香港。 我們不知道要期待什麼但是這是多麼好的一次經歷。 我從來沒有見過這樣的事。 不要不好意思跟他們討價還價,大多數攤主都願意在價格上讓步。 最有趣的地方在香港買紀念品！
Eng: Definitely an unforgettable experience... Ladies Market recommended us some friends in Hong Kong before we went to the hotel. We don’t know what to expect but what a great experience this is. I have never seen anything like this. Don't be embarrassed to bargain with them, most vendors are willing to make concessions on the price. The most interesting place to buy souvenirs in Hong Kong!

review: 清潔程度非常一般,第一次有小強,第二次入住時還有上手住客之垃圾,第三次升級我們住宿,表面看似很好,但睡了一晚,床是有蛩咬的,之後兩天,背部非常痕癢,還有點紅腫......
Eng: The cleanliness is very general, there is Xiaoqiang for the first time, and there are garbage from the guests at the second check-in, and the third time we upgraded our accommodation, the surface looks good, but after a night of sleep, the bed was bitten In the next two days, my back was very itchy, and there was a little redness and swelling...

review: 舒適但餐飲要改善  整體服務和坐位都很好還可以，餐飲是要改善的地方。在香港來回台北，我都有選擇特別餐，但都很不理想，都是一個不好吃的包和小小的一包袋裝飲料和餅乾，完全不飽。
Eng: Comfortable but catering needs to be improved The overall service and seating are good, catering is the place to be improved. When I travel to and from Taipei in Hong Kong, I always choose a special meal, but they are all unsatisfactory. They are all a bad bag and a small bag of drinks and biscuits. They are completely unsatisfactory.

review: 忘了它吧  在走下坡路。 他們所想要的就是賣給我一個複製的手錶,在這裏就像住在彌敦道上。 一個攤位給了一個荒謬的價格和我當走開擔任者她抓住了我和她的指甲抓我。 在灣仔的市場更好。 他們在那裏但是他們的價格太好太多不溫迪西他們也不需要。
Eng: Forget it. Going downhill. All they want is to sell me a replica watch, like living on Nathan Road here. A stall gave a ridiculous price and when I walked away as the host she grabbed me and her nails scratched me. The market in Wanchai is better. They are there but their prices are too good and they do not need Wendy West.

review: 長途旅行的首選  此次坐的艙等為343的座位，乘坐空間並不會算太差，飛機上餐點除了正規的早晚餐外，還有附餐的冰淇淋和泡麵可供食用，飛機上的影音設施與空服人員的服務絲毫不馬虎，實為長途旅行的選擇之一。
Eng: The first choice for long-distance travel is the seat of 343 seats. The seating space is not too bad. In addition to the regular breakfast and dinner, the meals on the plane are also served with ice cream and instant noodles with meals. The video and audio facilities and the services of the flight attendants are not insignificant, and it is actually one of the options for long-distance travel.

review: 我是長期住客也没有特别優待，房價貴了一点，我已連續在悦來酒店入住。
Eng: I am a long-term guest and have no special treatment. The room rate is a little more expensive. I have been staying in Yuelai Hotel successively.

review: 發生小插曲  當日個班機係凌晨機，基本上食左飛機餐之後就訓教補睡，點知有其中一個乘客突然嘔吐，面積就係佢232既中間3個位都影響到，而且機上發出陣陣吐味，令人不安加反胃，因為人們既衛生意識高左，空姐見我地都有想吐因聞到嘔吐物味既情況，而比我地一人一個口罩，之後撒消毒粉，之後就立即通知日本方面要求衛生人員上機檢查。好彩最後只是那個乘客個人不適而嘔。這是反映到機組服務人員RISK MANAGEMENT 好好! 值得一讚
Eng: On the day of the episode, the flight was in the early morning. Basically, I ate and taught to sleep after eating the left plane meal. I knew that one of the passengers suddenly vomited, and the area was affected by the three places in the middle of the canal 232. Spitting odors are disturbing and nausea, because people have a high sense of hygiene, the flight attendants see me everywhere, they want to vomit because of the smell of vomiting, and each person has a mask, then sprinkle disinfectant powder, after Immediately notify the Japanese side to require health personnel to check-in. Lucky in the end is just that passenger's personal discomfort and nausea. This is reflected in the crew service staff RISK MANAGEMENT Good! It is worthy of praise

review: 品牌名稱galour  如果你正在尋找名牌,這是你要去的地方。 還有數不盡的各大品牌名稱的時裝和配件。  另外,它還靠近一個很棒的城市vantagepoint去看河對面。 晚上絕對是非常漂亮。 你也可以坐地鐵在尖沙咀地鐵站。
Eng: Brand name galour If you are looking for a brand name, this is the place to go. There are also countless fashion and accessories under major brand names. In addition, it is also close to a great city vantagepoint to see across the river. The night is absolutely beautiful. You can also take the subway at Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station.

review: 超級友好的服務  辦理入住手續的女士非常友好（maria）和工作人員在希思羅機場的飛機上。 航班很準時,座位還能更舒服,但它是經濟所以你不能指望世界！
Eng: Super friendly service The lady who checked in was very friendly (maria) and the staff were on the plane at Heathrow Airport. The flight is on time and the seats can be more comfortable, but it is economical so you can't count on the world!

review: 前後空間變大  飛機上的餐點比以往好吃，空服員服務非常親切，很適合帶嬰兒的旅客，這次是搭A3501000空間有增加不少，總而言之這趟飛行非常滿意。
Eng: The space on the front and rear has become larger. The meals on the plane are more delicious than before. The flight attendant service is very kind and suitable for passengers with babies. This time, there is a lot of space increase on the A3501000. Overall, this flight is very satisfactory.

review: 令人愉快的飛行體驗  波音77w執飛的香港——洛杉磯。航線並非最優，回程飛了15個小時，真是飛到世界的盡頭了。幸虧餐食不錯，空中服務貼心，小食酒水不斷，還有哈根達斯。機上娛樂也是豐富。值得推薦，下次一定嘗試一下它的商務艙
Eng: Delightful flight experience Hong Kong-Los Angeles operated by Boeing 77w. The route is not optimal, and the return flight took 15 hours, and it really flew to the end of the world. Fortunately, the meals are good, the air service is intimate, the snacks and drinks are constant, and Haagen-Dazs. In-flight entertainment is also rich. It is worth recommending, must try its business class next time

review: 女人街  我帶了一些很有趣的項從此處, 但不得不溫迪西多才能得到良好的價格
Eng: Ladies Market I brought some very interesting items from here, but had to Wendy Cido to get a good price

review: 網上登記系統壞了沒有24小時免費取消  他們的在綫登記現在壞了,浪費了不少時間。  我感覺很沮喪因爲它花了很長時間才能到他們的客戶服務,除非它不會管理77一個人支付了長途電話到香港。  最糟糕的是,他們不允許在美國之外的24小時免費取消。
Eng: The online registration system is broken and there is no free cancellation for 24 hours. Their online registration is now broken and a lot of time is wasted. I feel very frustrated because it took a long time to reach their customer service unless it would not manage 77 people who paid a long distance call to Hong Kong. The worst part is that they do not allow 24 hours of free cancellation outside the United States.

review: 極度差 垃圾國泰  早前上網買左機票225起飛 所有單據有齊 緊住去到機場唔比我check in 話我張機票取消左 然後強制將我機票改到晚上1000 我唔明點解國泰的錯誤要乘客利承受 沒有想過乘客有幾重要的事和生意要做 浪費時間金錢 shit cachay  唔會再乘搭
Eng: Extremely bad garbage Cathay Pacific bought online the left ticket 225 and took off. All the documents were tightly packed and went to the airport. I checked it in. If I cancel the ticket, I will force my ticket to be changed to 1000 at night. I don’t know the Cathay mistake. Passenger Lee bears not thinking about the passengers have a few important things and business to do to waste time and money shit cachay do not ride again

review: 來香港的必遊景點!  即便你不喜歡購物,也一定要去看看女人街!真是超棒的體驗,有很多商店,氣氛超好。  如果你打算購物,一定要記得討價還價。不過有些是不能講價的賣家會告訴你哪些不能講價!  如果想省錢,一定要這樣做。賣家會出個價格,你的報價一定要低於五折價。之後再一點點討價還價,直到達成交易。千萬別因為標價太高而嚇退了這兒有很多其它商店出售同樣的東西。  過去幾年裡香港流行很多冒牌貨,從我上次2004年來開始,已經明顯改善了。但是這兒仍舊有很多提供小商販發傳單,只要你稍感興趣,他們就會誘惑你到遠離集市的店鋪去。購買者要當心了!
Eng: A must-visit attraction in Hong Kong! Even if you don’t like shopping, you must visit the Ladies’ Street! It’s a great experience, with many shops and a great atmosphere. If you plan to shop, be sure to remember to bargain. However, some sellers who cannot bargain will tell you which ones cannot bargain! If you want to save money, you must do so. The seller will offer a price, and your quotation must be lower than 50% off. After that, bargain a little bit until a deal is reached. Don't be frightened by the high price tag. There are many other shops selling the same thing. A lot of counterfeit goods have been popular in Hong Kong in the past few years. Since my last time in 2004, it has improved significantly. However, there are still many small vendors offering flyers. As long as you are interested, they will entice you to go to a store away from the market. Buyers need to be careful!

review: 服務很好  這裏的服務很好。 很順利的起飛和着陸。 按時,沒有延誤。 稍微早點到了這裏真是很好的。  唯一的缺點就是這裏的小吃在飛機上也不是很好。 這是一個很長時間的飛機和預期的曲奇餅。 因爲這是女主人說什麼空氣。 但是最後他們只給了薄脆餅乾,薯條和一杯麵條... 這樣一個平庸的... 提供的食物也用完了,我們必須與其餘還是比較滿意的。
Eng: The service is very good. Very smooth takeoff and landing. On time, there were no delays. It was nice to be here a little earlier. The only drawback is that the snacks here are not very good on the plane. This is a long time flight and expected cookies. Because this is what the hostess said. But in the end they only gave crackers, french fries and a cup of noodles... Such a mediocre... The food provided was also used up, we must be quite satisfied with the rest.

review: 很棒的全包式假期  剛從一個極好的7晚的很棒的酒店。   這是我們第二次來這裏,也一定不會是最後一次。   我要說的是一個很大的哇從我們收到的服務從您的員工  他們是真正的以客戶爲中心,和一個很棒的信貸組織。   特別是Skouros tasos ,您的客戶關係經理已令人難以置信的。  我有特別的健康需求和他回應的態度和很棒的服務。 他真是一個很棒的個人,和它的大部分原因是因爲他是我們已經在計劃明年再來我們40th週年結婚紀念日還有很多我們的其他家庭成員。    爲您的組織是一個偉大的大使非常乾淨舒適,還有個人在招聘方面的專業技能。 我會僱傭他實例中如果我能！

What I want to say is a great wow service received from us from your employees. They are truly customer-centric, and a great credit organization. Especially Skouros tasos, your customer relationship manager has been incredible. I have special health needs and his attitude to respond and great service. He is really a great person, and most of the reason for it is because he is we are already planning to come back next year for our 40th anniversary wedding anniversary and many other members of our family. Being a great ambassador for your organization is very clean and comfortable, as well as personal expertise in recruitment. I will hire him in the instance if I can!

review: 在每個方面都完美的假期  我們去過olivia過去2年和你的那一刻你在機場迎接ikos 5星級的服務。 這家酒店真正令人驚訝的是我無法想象和度假品牌目前ikos以外的地方。 我是一個完美主義者談到它的假期,和olivia符合每一個框。 我們一直住在一個別墅套房裏面有完美的滿足了我們一家人帶着孩子。 餐廳是世界一流的,每一位員工都會停下來跟你打招呼,和整個度假村都很完美。 還有就是這裏沒有什麼特別突出的地方。 Timos（總經理）, dirk tasos和他的團隊一起經營這家酒店就像上了發條一樣,而且對於我們第二次住在奧利維亞他們歡迎我們回來就像家人一樣。 他們真的是夢幻團隊,和我100％我們肯定會很快回來的。 讓做你要做夫妻。 我根本想不到一件事你可以改進。
Eng: Perfect holiday in every aspect We have been to olivia for the past 2 years and the moment you are at the airport you meet ikos 5 star service. What's really surprising about this hotel is that I can't imagine and the resort brand is currently outside of ikos. I am a perfectionist when it comes to holidays, and olivia fits every box. We have always lived in a villa suite which has perfectly satisfied our family with children. The restaurant is world-class, every employee will stop to say hello to you, and the entire resort is perfect. There is nothing particularly outstanding here. Timos (General Manager), dirk tasos and his team run this hotel together like a clockwork, and for our second stay in Olivia they welcome us back like family. They are really dream teams, and with me 100% we will definitely be back soon. Let you be a couple. I can't think of one thing you can improve.

review: 美妙的體驗  這是我們第一次經歷這家航空公司的商務艙。 從開始到結束的服務很出色。 高質量的食物和飲料還有一個很棒的選擇。 機上娛樂的很好的選擇。 機艙裏的出色的服務。 座位轉換爲一個平板牀,非常舒服。 強烈推薦這家航空公司的商務艙。

review: 商務旅行  第一次,飛行物理化學經濟體系。 我之前坐過商務和經濟。 我必須說,這是個不錯的旅行。 有足夠的空間,廁所很乾淨,私人隱私窗簾,美味的食物,良好的服務,免費的飲料。 一切都很好。

review: 購物作為一種接觸運動  我上次訪問香港是32年前，我對彌敦道的高檔化感到驚訝。因此，我很高興看到這個運動鞋街這個地方保留了舊的香港購物體驗。談判是必須的，如果您不喜歡這筆交易，可以離開。選擇是壓倒性的。我的妻子找到了夢dream以求的運動鞋，這是她永遠不會忘記的經歷。
Eng: Shopping as a contact sport The last time I visited Hong Kong 32 years ago, I was surprised by the upscale Nathan Road. Therefore, I am very happy to see that this place of Sports Shoes Street retains the old Hong Kong shopping experience. Negotiation is a must, if you don't like this deal, you can leave. The choice is overwhelming. My wife found the sneakers that dream dreams demand, which is an experience she will never forget.

review: 很棒的復活節假期  我們在10天ikos olivia度過了復活節假期真是太棒了。 我們去了ikos大洋洲去年和今年都是非常棒的。 從登記入住到你知道你是在一個很棒的酒店,提供有香檳和起泡酒當你到達。 辦理入住手續的時候要更快,因爲我有2個小孩子和我們曾經在一個很早的航班所以會很棒要能夠完成的表單在綫在你到達之前。 我們的單臥室套房很寬敞很乾淨,臥室裏的牀很大很舒服,休息室的牀是沙發和一張摺疊牀,一張雙人沙發牀摺疊你可以會更好一些。 房間每天都打掃,有一天晚上突然倒圓角清潔工還要確保你有你需要的一切,我們不得不要求了幾次額外的棉籤的清潔工忘記了（我們還要了額外的餅乾因爲我的孩子們都很喜歡他們！ ）。 電視是因爲所有的房間都是非常現代的便利設施。 有一天晚上我們沒有熱水但接待人員非常抱歉。 我覺得這家酒店的泳池也可能會受影響,因爲他們都是可愛和溫暖的但是當我們到達時有一天他們真的很冷。 酒店的自助早餐,這裏的食物真的很棒,因爲我們對這個也不太介意的是我們只能預訂到一個按菜單點菜的餐廳和所有其他酒店都訂滿了,但它是一個恥辱。 我們訂的是安納亞東方餐廳的食物棒極了。 我們不能把我們的孩子在兒童俱樂部完全是因爲它顯示在網上預訂的,所以這家酒店絕對值得你的孩子在你到達之前預訂的假期,預訂餐廳和在登記入住的時候。 有很多活動的足球,籃球場,網球場和自行車。 你不能提前預訂自行車讓人很失望因爲他們只有有限數量較小的兒童自行車所以如果你不夠早到達（我們沒有）你不會得到一輛自行車。 你可以預訂的前一天在大洋洲的自行車是非常有用的。 所有的員工都非常友好和樂於助人  娜塔莎在泳池酒吧,密斯在七家酒吧,自助早餐和Timos fotis在海灘上的人都非常好,他們真的會努力工作確保滿足您的不同需求但有的時候是飲料確實花了一段時間所以我認爲他們沒有充分的工作人員。
Eng: Great Easter holiday We spent the Easter holiday in ikos olivia in 10 days and it was amazing. We went to ikos Oceania last year and this year was great. From check-in until you know you are in a great hotel, champagne and sparkling wine are provided when you arrive. It was faster when checking in, because I had 2 young children and we used to be on an early flight so it would be great to be able to complete the form online before you arrive. Our one-bedroom suite is very spacious and clean, the bed in the bedroom is large and comfortable, the bed in the lounge is a sofa and a folding bed, a double sofa bed folding you can be better. The room was cleaned every day, and one night the round cleaner suddenly made sure you had everything you needed, we had to ask the cleaner who had extra cotton swabs a few times and forgot (we ordered extra cookies because of my Children like them all!). The TV is because all the rooms are very modern conveniences. One night we had no hot water but the reception staff was very sorry. I think the swimming pool of this hotel may also be affected because they are both lovely and warm but they are really cold one day when we arrive. The buffet breakfast at the hotel, the food here is really great, because we don't mind this very much because we can only book to a restaurant with a la carte menu and all other hotels are fully booked, but it is a shame. The food we ordered was great in the oriental restaurant of Anaya. We can't put our kids in the kids club completely because it is shown to be booked online, so this hotel is definitely worth your kids booking holidays before you arrive, restaurant reservations and at check-in. There are many activities of football, basketball courts, tennis courts and bicycles. It’s disappointing that you can’t book a bike in advance because they only have a limited number of smaller children’s bikes so if you arrive early enough (we don’t have one) you won’t get a bike. The bike you can book in Oceania the day before is very useful. All the staff are very friendly and helpful Natasha at the pool bar, Mies at the seven bars, the buffet breakfast and Timos fotis at the beach are very nice people, they really will work hard to ensure that your different needs are met but there are The drinks did take a while so I don’t think they have enough staff.

review: 和狗狗渡過愉快聖誕節  第一次同狗狗入住美利酒店，所有工作人員都好友善。房間好舒服好大！ 特別係洗手間用料高級，水壓很足夠。電視比想像中更加大，節目齊全可以享受電影音樂。小狗都住得好開心不停喺房間裏跑來跑去。我和先生都非常滿意今次嘅住宿，一定會再來。
Eng: Spend a Merry Christmas with a dog. For the first time staying at a Murray hotel with a dog, all staff are friendly. The room is so comfortable and big! Especially the toilet materials are high-grade, and the water pressure is enough. The TV is bigger than expected, and you can enjoy movie music with a complete program. The puppies are so happy to keep running around in the room. My husband and I are very satisfied with this stay and will definitely come again.

review: 希望酒店能及时添置洗漱用品，像24日我又续一天房，但是洗漱用品都没有更换。

Consignment, packing and arrangement are very thoughtful, and premium seats are also arranged. As a frequent flyer, I did get a home away from home treatment. I really have it.

review: 還是很好的  這是我們第二次來這家超讚的酒店, l從來沒有見過這麼多的馬車, s走出去那麼多孩子學校放假l預期！ 酒店和員工都很棒,酒店的花園很美,但是酒店有成人的幫助。 我們要求住在去年住的房間,我們得到了一個在隔壁（這很好）我們被完全包圍的孩子,這家酒店需要有一個只有成人的住宿條件的地方。 孩子們都跑沒人看管的很多餐廳繁忙的街道上,這反映了他的父母。

The hotel and staff are great, the hotel garden is beautiful, but the hotel has adult help. We asked to stay in the room where we lived last year and we got a child who was completely surrounded by us next door (which is good). This hotel needs a place where only adults can stay. The children ran on the busy streets of many restaurants that were left unattended, which reflected his parents.

review: 挺喜歡國泰航空的  可能跟個人遇到的人有關吧。每次在香港機場遇到國泰的小姐姐都特別Nice。然后還給升艙什么的。實在沒法不好評呀。可惜的是今年開始有些航線的燃油費漲得不少。

review: 我想象中的好  第一次也是最後一次飛行過的cp。 我早就聽說過他們的服務質量,但是我很失望。 一張座位上的一個8小時的航班從佩斯到香港,很糟糕。 沒有比澳洲經濟。 我想象的要平躺的座位,但是我很幸運地得到它可以倚靠。 再也不來了... ！

An 8-hour flight from Perth to Hong Kong on one seat was terrible. Nothing is better than the Australian economy. I imagined a flat seat, but I was lucky to get it to lean on. Never come again...!
