review: 獨特體驗！  在夜市的事情您將看到將永遠無法看到地球上任何地方的。 開放領域它確實是。 我找到的紐帶絲綢很公道, 中藥材正宗的, 所有類型的服裝, 玩具, 食物, 在您可以想到的一切  然後一些！ 千萬不要錯過這次在香港如果要。
Eng: Unique experience! Things in the night market you will see will never be able to see anywhere on earth. It really is in the open field. The bonds I found are very fair, authentic Chinese medicinal materials, all types of clothing, toys, food, everything you can think of and some more! Don't miss this time if you want in Hong Kong.

review: 我們去的一定要去看看  olivia是一個美麗的現代的酒店花園非常漂亮飯店和工作人員非常好的香草。 我們住在兩個不同的房間有一個臥室的公寓,還有一個漂亮又寬敞的海景房在主樓,也很漂亮但是小只有一個淋浴。 因爲我們有兩個不同的房間因爲我們要求升級和這是他們所能做的,但我們沒有什麼好抱怨的。 所有的餐廳都非常漂亮而且食物和飲料,唯一的障礙就是年輕家庭風味餐廳可能會非常繁忙,但是我們就要離開這家酒店的經營管理人員託尼基適合度假的一個館子想投棄權票。 有些遊客很粗魯倡導的海灘上太陽牀,當他們只需要他們會這樣他們就可以使用一個用於選擇2 3索斯威克,海灘是最早但主游泳池就最安靜的。 最後只有一個缺點,我們不得不把那層塑料薄膜一樣的牀讓你流汗和一些椅子在returants也有這方面的問題晚上熱的和你穿長褲。 抱歉犠詈海灘豪華間是最窮的。 我很高興我們住在不三不四的區域。 去享受
Eng: We must go and have a look. Olivia is a beautiful modern hotel with very nice gardens and very nice vanilla staff. We lived in a two-bedroom apartment with a one-bedroom apartment, and a beautiful and spacious sea-view room in the main building, which was also beautiful but small with only one shower. Because we have two different rooms because we asked for an upgrade and this is what they can do, but we have nothing to complain about. All restaurants are very beautiful and the food and drinks, the only obstacle is that the young family-style restaurant may be very busy, but we are about to leave the hotel management staff Tonici a restaurant suitable for vacation want to abstain. Some tourists are very rudely advocated for sun beds on the beach, when they only need them so they can use one for the 2 3 Southwick, the beach is the earliest but the main swimming pool is the quietest. There is only one drawback in the end, we had to put that plastic film-like bed to make you sweat and some chairs in the returants also have this problem. It is hot at night and you wear trousers. Sorry, the Luxor Beach Deluxe Room is the poorest. I'm very happy that we live in a non-competitive area. To enjoy

review: 漂亮但不是無綫的航空公司16小時的航班上...  國泰航空公司長期以來一直被公認爲一個優秀的航空公司。 乘飛機從香港到肯尼迪國際機場也不例外,但是我很驚訝爲什麼他們尚未開始提供無綫網絡上的服務16  一個小時的飛機是波音777的花朵。 我不明白這一點。   一流的座位很舒服。 服務也不是很先進的視頻； 的質量和種類繁多的屏幕提供的電影。   底綫  服務很好,但這不是我所期望的花費超過了香港單程$10千字節  肯尼迪國際機場旅行。
Eng: Beautiful but not wireless airlines on 16-hour flights... Cathay Pacific has long been recognized as an excellent airline. Flying from Hong Kong to JFK International Airport is no exception, but I am surprised why they have not yet started to provide wireless network services. The 16-hour flight is the flower of the Boeing 777. I do not get it. The first-class seats are very comfortable. The service is not very advanced video; the quality and variety of screens provided by the movie. Bottom line The service is good, but this is not what I expected to cost more than $10 kilobytes for a one-way trip to Hong Kong from JFK International Airport.

review: 水準還不錯，但是最好先上網登機  國泰航空的手機程式，功能做得很完整，所以搭乘國泰航空的旅客，最好提前兩天先上網辦理登記，不但可以選擇餐食，也可以選擇機位，就可以提前選擇自己想做的位置，又可以減少機場的等待時間。
Eng: The standard is not bad, but it is best to check in online on Cathay Pacific’s mobile phone program, the function is very complete, so passengers taking Cathay Pacific are better to register online two days in advance, not only can choose meals, but also choose the aircraft Position, you can choose the location you want to do in advance, and you can reduce the waiting time at the airport.

review: 上海快閃超值選擇  台中機場雖然國際航廈不大，但相對可以悠閒的辦理登機手續以及安檢通關 香港流暢的轉機過程，是讓我愛上轉機的開始 浦東機場超大，通關隨時都是人滿為患，但之後提領行李井然有序，給予高度肯定
Eng: Shanghai flash value-for-money choice Taichung Airport Although the international terminal is not big, it is relatively easy to check-in and security clearance customs Hong Kong smooth transfer process, is the beginning of the transfer I love Pudong Airport super large, customs clearance is always overcrowded , But afterwards the baggage was collected in an orderly manner, highly praised

review: 位置不错，旁边有很多餐厅、银行，稍微走走路就可以到尖沙嘴核心位置。客房大小适中，服务也不错，性价比比较好。下次如果可能还会去住。
Eng: The location is good, there are many restaurants and banks next to it, and you can walk to the core location of Tsim Sha Tsui with a short walk. The rooms are medium in size, the service is not bad, and the price is good. Next time I will go to live if possible.

review: 商務旅行  從布里斯班到北京國泰的飛機,飛機座位和完美的專業和友好的員工,很棒的食物和酒的選擇也很棒,很容易和香港傳輸4休息室可供選擇,'橋'提供了最好的餐廳和美麗的風景而不是機場。
Eng: Business trip from Brisbane to Beijing Cathay Pacific plane, airplane seats and perfect professional and friendly staff, great food and wine selection is also great, easy to transfer with Hong Kong 4 lounges to choose from,'bridge' Provides the best restaurant and beautiful scenery instead of the airport.

review: 交通方便性價比高

review: 長途旅行  長時間的空氣固然需要把它與一個住在香港的時候我們還去了設在機場的休息室這確實有助於你可以有一個淋浴間
Eng: Long-distance travel The long-term air of course needs to be taken with a person who lives in Hong Kong. We also went to the lounge at the airport. This really helps you to have a shower

review: 第二次入住，但這次是舊房型稍差點不是行政房(連住三晚.....可惜沒升等.....)，一分錢一分貨吧！

review: 很差  沒有什麼我可以買到便宜很多但是價格過高的垃圾在我的家鄉在菲律賓的。 廠商似乎不知道收什麼費用和防止談笑風生。 在曼谷jj真的是太好了。 這也不是什麼多一個旅遊市場。

review: 很棒的夜市（2份）  有2部分夜市。 一個靠近油麻地地鐵站而另一部分是在佐敦地鐵站附近。 它實際上是一個長的海灘還有一個休息內。 價格會更便宜但市場更近的驚喜更多是較小的的酒店相比在靠近約旦

The price will be cheaper but the surprises closer to the market are more in smaller hotels than in close proximity to Jordan

review: 好的市場  很棒的氛圍。 然後才能進行任何購買值得四處張望。 確保你一個討價還價的價格。 還有很多便宜貨如果你知道你想要什麼和怎麼花的。
Eng: Good market Great atmosphere. Only then can any purchase be worth looking around. Make sure you have a bargaining price. There are many bargains if you know what you want and how to spend it.

review: 我旅行航空的首選  因為是銀卡會員, 登機前可至貴賓室稍做休息.  我覺得餐點種類稍少, 飲料選擇多.  這次班機起降都準時, 空服員很親切, 機場check in 櫃檯人員 非常效率
Eng: My first choice for travel aviation is because I am a silver member. I can take a break in the VIP room before boarding. I think there are fewer types of meals and more beverage choices. This flight takes off and land on time, the flight attendants are very kind, the airport check in Counter staff is very efficient

review: 愉快的假期  員工很熱情,令人驚訝的好食物和一個全包的設施非常棒。 唯一的缺點就是wifi： 經常壞,這是一個問題因爲我不能總是迎頭趕上的工作事項從我的房間  我的錯不夠放鬆！  但是他們不是很正常的蚊子和惡劣天氣！
Eng: Pleasant holiday The staff is very welcoming, surprisingly good food and an all inclusive facility are excellent. The only drawback is wifi: often bad, this is a problem because I can't always catch up with work items from my room My mistake is not relaxing enough! But they are not normal mosquitoes and bad weather!

review: 好吃好逛好玩  我們總是在暑假訪港, 這兩年發現這裡總是會有很適合小朋友逛的地方 , 去年有醜比頭展 , 今年是樂高 , 為此 , 我們這次停留的八天裡 , 有三天都會找時間來這吃飯逛街 ,  每一回都要看一看樂高 , 展覽很有意思 , 設計者在樂高裡藏了很多有趣的人物與幽默的設計, 用小朋友的高度就很容易看見 , 真是很棒的展覽
Eng: Delicious and fun to visit. We always visit Hong Kong during the summer vacation. I have found that there are always places suitable for children to visit in the past two years. Last year there was a ugly head show. This year is Lego. For this reason, during our eight days of stay , I will find time to eat and shop here for three days. I have to look at Lego every time. The exhibition is very interesting. The designer has hidden a lot of interesting characters and humorous designs in Lego. It is easy to see at the height of the children. What a great exhibition

review: 很好,但是不是很完美  我們去的時候是六月2 x 3歲的兒子和我們住在一個海灘平房。 總的來說這個地方很棒但是讓人失望的很差的入住體驗我們離開的時候在那裏閒逛。   全包套餐非常好,和食物,對於希臘來說,非常好。 我很高興通過酒的選擇也有一些高檔的國際選項（但是有一些希臘葡萄酒也很好）。 讓人不爽的是你只能喝一杯香檳酒的法國餐廳和一個閃閃發光的地方是當地的葡萄酒甜。   兒童俱樂部很棒我們的兒子一度只去了但是我很喜歡這裏。   海灘不是很吸引小孩子不軟像是在議事廳（他們的姐妹酒店..我會再到閃存中）。 除非你只想享受日光浴和做一些水上運動類（都非常好）一整天然後真的沒有什麼其它的事情可以做的地方所以不要來這裏如果你想探索！   我們還生氣的是我們付的是海灘別墅是因爲我們想在一樓和專門走出去到海灘我們還要求事先因爲父親有行動不便所以我們不想讓他爬樓梯。 但是他們並沒有考慮到這一點把我們安排在一樓... 所以不要以爲平房小屋
Eng: Very good, but not perfect When we went to June 2 x 3 year old son and we stayed in a beach bungalow. Overall this place is great but disappointingly poor staying experience We hang out there when we left. The all-inclusive package is very good, and the food is very good for Greece. I am happy that there are some high-end international options through the wine selection (but some Greek wines are also very good). Uncomfortable is that you can only drink a glass of champagne in a French restaurant and a sparkling place is sweet with local wine. The children’s club was great. Our son only went there once, but I love it. The beach is not very attractive to small children and it is not as soft as it is in the Chamber (their sister hotel.. I will go to flash again). Unless you just want to sunbathe and do some water sports (all very good) all day long and then there is really nothing else to do so don't come here if you want to explore! We were also angry that we paid for the beach villa because we wanted to go out to the beach on the first floor and we specifically asked in advance that we didn’t want him to climb the stairs because of his mobility difficulties. But they didn’t take this into consideration and arranged us on the first floor... so don’t think the cottage

review: 值得一去   很棒的市場去的最好的東西便宜得你是否能爲他們設置不要忘了一定要使勁討價還價和不要害怕走不遠就有很多攤位都賣同樣的東西但是一些很棒的便宜貨
Eng: It's worth a visit. The best things in a great market are cheap enough. Can you set them up? Don't forget to bargain hard and don't be afraid to go a short distance. There are many stalls selling the same things but some great bargains

review: 浴室有點透明😅
Eng: The bathroom is a bit transparent 😅

review: 目前都很满意
Eng: Currently very satisfied

review: 不滿意的服務  我上個月去馬尼拉航班延誤是從馬累到香港然後當我再回到馬累7月7日推遲再次從香港到馬累我去趕另一個航班去科倫坡。 飛行時間不是完整的,但是當我問我是否可以轉移到一個船員的因爲我要趕在前面當我們土地另一個航班。 我沒有那麼多時間因爲航班延誤,他不回來給我,他就不理我。 加上食物上的時間不是很好。 我永遠不會再試一次
Eng: Unsatisfactory service The delay in my flight to Manila last month was from Male to Hong Kong and then when I returned to Male on July 7, the delay was again from Hong Kong to Male. I went to catch another flight to Colombo. The flight time is not complete, but when I asked if I could transfer to a crew because I had to catch up when we landed another flight. I don't have that much time because the flight was delayed, he didn't come back to me, he ignored me. Plus the time on the food is not very good. I will never try again

review: 地点太不方便，往地铁站要十至二十分钟，周邊是兴建中既建筑地盘，商場亦一般。且很多旅行团。
Eng: The location is too inconvenient. It takes ten to twenty minutes to reach the subway station. The surrounding area is both a construction site under construction and a shopping mall. And many tour groups.

review: Ikos規則！ ... 還會再來。  我們住在去年九月ikos olivia ,和太喜歡這裏了,我們想再去一次,但是我們可以說我們去到另一個目標,我們嘗試了olivia。   令人難以置信的。   從機場到酒店的接送,絲綢一樣光滑。   在登記入住的時候,房間還沒有準備好,所以我們去吃午飯和坐在泳池邊在燦爛的陽光下。   頂樓的游泳池是由主酒店是我們在那裏度過了大部分的時間。 稍微不太繁忙的和安靜,和小游泳池是在浴缸的溫度。 真的很可愛！   這家酒店的地面很漂亮,到處都是漂亮的植物和五顏六色的玫瑰花和一個漂亮的花園裏面的味道。 這樣也維護得很好。   這裏的工作人員是令人難以置信,因爲真正的財富品牌,總是面帶微笑和毫無疑問地會幫助你。   我們預訂了3晚第一次預定的餐廳在我們離開之前,然後我們到了那裏的時候好好休息了。 一點問題都沒有得到我們要求的時間和餐廳。   奧希阿納一樣,我們最喜歡的是希臘飯後酒,木莎卡的很完美。 所有的餐廳都很棒,包括自助  這裏的一切東西。 有幾個晚上我們都自己去自助的口味,我們只吃了一點後餐廳  因爲他喜歡選擇他自己的食物。 我想說的是這裏的餐廳是更多的體驗 3因爲它們就在海灘上,很可愛的環境。 我們 很高興能看到餐廳的經理可以在今年oceana olivia  他已經做了升級和移動。 他是一個友好的面孔,記得我們和他是個真正的信用卡公司.。   我們有一個海景的房間在主樓4層上,我們真的很喜歡酒店的房間  最令人驚歎的花園和大海的景色,而且房間本身是一個很好的大小。 真的很現代的傢俱和客房清潔人員工作極其努力保持乾淨,還有夜牀服務,我們的小寶寶總是很高興地看到客房部睡覺前他的餅乾：  ）  我不得不提的是枕頭。 哦我的天啊！ 我用過的最舒服的枕頭。 我需要他們家！   我忘了我的隱形眼鏡。 沒有問題,現場太陽鏡的商店有他們的股票。
Eng: Ikos rules! ... will come again. We lived in ikos olivia last September, and loved it so much, we wanted to go again, but we can say we went to another goal and we tried olivia. unbelievable. The transfer from the airport to the hotel is as smooth as silk. At check-in, the room was not ready yet, so we went for lunch and sat by the pool under the bright sun. The swimming pool on the top floor is by the main hotel where we spent most of our time. Slightly less busy and quiet, and the small swimming pool is at the temperature of the bathtub. really cute! The grounds of this hotel are beautiful, full of beautiful plants and colorful roses and the smell of a beautiful garden. This is also well maintained. The staff here is unbelievable, because the real Fortune brand, always smiling and will undoubtedly help you. We booked the restaurant for the first 3 nights before we left, and then we took a good rest when we got there. Did not get the time and restaurant we requested at all. Like Ohiana, our favorite is Greek after-dinner wine, and Musaka is perfect. All restaurants are great, including buffet everything here. For a few nights we all went to the buffet for our own taste, we only ate a little after the restaurant because he likes to choose his own food. What I want to say is that the restaurants here are more experience 3 because they are on the beach in a lovely environment. We are very pleased to see that the restaurant manager can upgrade and move this year in Oceana olivia. He is a friendly face, remember we and he are a real credit card company... We have a room with sea view on the 4th floor of the main building, we really like the hotel room The most amazing view of the garden and the sea, and the room itself is a good size. Really modern furniture and housekeeping staff worked extremely hard to keep it clean, and there was turndown service, our little baby was always happy to see his biscuit before bedtime in the housekeeping department:) I have to mention pillows. Oh my God! The most comfortable pillow I have ever used. I need their home! I forgot my contact lens. No problem, the on-site sunglasses store has their stock.

review: 不值得一去。  最近我去女人街夜市。 我的經驗是D '可怕'的市場。 再也不會把它推薦給任何人。 真的不值得一去的那一刻起他們意識到你不是一個地方又不會說他們的方言； 價位合理天空火箭。 不管你怎麼溫迪西他們依然會不同意的價格5倍的價值是美元在英鎊。 如果你同意他們的價格,他們很樂意讓你去。  甚至如果你碰巧發現有人,他同意在一個合理的價格買到任何電子產品從來沒有在任何情況下它有一個USB, 手錶或計算器。 完全就是敲竹槓。
Eng: Not worth a visit. Recently I went to Ladies Street Night Market. My experience is D'horrible' market. Never recommend it to anyone again. From the moment it was really not worth going, they realized that you were not a place and would not speak their dialect; the sky rocket was reasonably priced. No matter how you Wendy West they will still disagree, the price is five times the value of the dollar in pounds sterling. If you agree to their price, they will gladly let you go. Even if you happen to find someone, he agrees to buy any electronic product at a reasonable price and never under any circumstances it has a USB, watch or calculator. It's just a rip-off.

review: 絕不能錯過的地方!  這家夜市對於那些愛討價還價的人來說是必須要去的地方,它的格局和“女人街”一樣,整個市場三大排商鋪。  這裡有各種各樣的商品出售,可以買到紀念品,包,太陽鏡,衣服,珠寶和DVD光盤和很多很多東西。這兒有很多商店出售最新的盜版DVD,每張大約25元,我買了許多,只有一部分可以正常播放,所以要小心哦!  另人驚喜的就是在夜市上可以找到價格各樣的短袖T恤——有很多可以選。最棒的事就是我買的短袖T恤質量很不錯,價格只是英國價格的四分之一。  到玉器市場很近,步行就可以到達,而且距離地鐵站也很近。
Eng: A place not to be missed! This night market is a must-visit place for those who like to bargain. Its structure is the same as "Ladies Street", with three rows of shops in the entire market. There are all kinds of goods for sale here, you can buy souvenirs, bags, sunglasses, clothes, jewelry and DVD discs and many, many things. There are many shops selling the latest pirated DVDs at about RMB 25 each. I bought a lot of them. Only a part can be played normally, so be careful! Another surprise is that you can find short-sleeved T-shirts at various prices in the night market. ——There are many choices. The best thing is that the short-sleeved T-shirts I bought are of good quality, and the price is only a quarter of the price in the UK. It's close to the Jade Market, within walking distance, and also close to the subway station.

review: 棒極了  過多的希臘自助10  15年前的假期,這是一個冒險的事情因爲我不知道我能期待什麼的全包的度假村在希臘。 我們想要一個放鬆的假期了兩個豪華而且沒有讓我們失望。 最近的假期包括香格里拉婆羅洲和迪拜的阿瑪尼酒店所以我們以爲Ikoas Olivia挺基本的但不是這樣的。  服務很好,從入住到晚餐和池畔服務。  我們選擇的是套房有一個很大的私人泳池很棒而且我們花了大約50％的時間使用它。 我們做了夫妻按摩和溫泉很棒。  食物非常美味,我們很喜歡這裏的希臘餐廳吃早餐因爲還是很安靜有很多水果和亞洲餐廳是我們最喜歡的晚餐選擇和我們那吃了兩次。  這是一個家庭度假村但是我們絕對放鬆的感覺和度假村有撥供款次成人只能到餐廳等。
Eng: Awesome. Excessive Greek buffet for 10 and 15 years ago. This is an adventure because I don’t know what I can expect from an all-inclusive resort in Greece. We wanted a relaxing holiday with two luxurious and did not let us down. Recent holidays include Shangri-La Borneo and Armani Hotel in Dubai so we thought Ikoas Olivia was quite basic but not like that. The service is good, from check-in to dinner and poolside service. What we chose is that the suite has a large private pool which is great and we spent about 50% of our time using it. We did a couple massage and the spa was great. The food is very delicious, we love the Greek restaurant for breakfast because it is still very quiet. There are many fruits and Asian restaurants are our favorite dinner options and we ate twice. This is a family resort but we feel absolutely relaxed and the resort has allocated funds for adults only to the restaurant.

review: 如果你可以通過香港路由  這樣做在國泰！   絕對是頂級的。  我這次旅行一年四次,我最喜歡的還是運營商和cx到香港。 港龍航空公司（現在更名）會把你升級到高級經濟業務如果他們沒有本節中的飛機。  飛機利用我覺得舒服的是翻新過的舊飛機從商務客位更新到睡個泊位的業務,所以沒有考慮價格的是舒適和空間。  一個很棒的航空公司（服務很出色）還有一個很棒的產品。  爲了區區的透明度。 我不是一個員工,但我一個銀色的會員卡馬可波羅。
Eng: If you can route through Hong Kong do this at Cathay Pacific! Definitely top. I travel four times a year this time, and my favorite is the operator and cx to Hong Kong. Dragonair (now renamed) will upgrade you to a premium economy business if they do not have the aircraft in this section. I feel comfortable with the use of aircraft because the refurbished old aircraft is updated from a business class to a berth, so it is comfortable and space without considering the price. A great airline (service is excellent) and a great product. For the sake of transparency. I am not an employee, but I am a silver member Camo Polo.

review: 非常令人失望   令我們失望的是我們的旅行社爲我們預訂了5晚只。 我們在多年來最棒的假期。 可能是最好的。   很棒的設施,很棒的食物,很棒的服務。 他們只在乎給你最好的體驗和它所展示的。   我們留下了很深的照管孩子的服務。 我們保證我們的女兒離開他們的照料下的感覺,因爲我知道他們會得到最好的待遇。  保姆服務也很出色。   我真的不想說這家酒店沒什麼不好。 我們還沒有離開,我們已經開始準備我們的下一個訂單並住在這裏。
Eng: Very disappointing We were disappointed that our travel agent booked us for 5 nights only. Our best holiday in years. Probably the best. Great facilities, great food, great service. They only care about giving you the best experience and what it shows. We left a very deep care of children. We guarantee the feeling that our daughters leave their care, because I know they will get the best treatment. The nanny service is also excellent. I really don't want to say that there is nothing bad about this hotel. We have not left yet, we have started to prepare our next order and stay here.

review: 假期  其中一個最好的假期。 適閤家庭和年輕的孩子。 我的妻子和我們的孩子大孩子玩得非常開心。 這家酒店被照顧的很好而且很乾淨。 這裏的設施很棒。 酒店的運動設施和娛樂設施都是很棒的。 可供選擇的食物很棒（5家不同的餐廳）當然還有這裏的服務也是首屈一指的服務人員願意並準備讓您住得非常愉快。 我們肯定還會再來的。
Eng: Holiday One of the best holidays. Suitable for families and young children. My wife and our kid elder have a great time. This hotel is well taken care of and very clean. The facilities here are great. The hotel's sports facilities and entertainment facilities are great. The food choices are great (5 different restaurants) and of course the service is also second to none. The service staff are willing and ready to make your stay very enjoyable. We will definitely come again.

review: 令人愉快的積極  從你到達的那一刻起你就在機場的一個好態度。 一級棒的休息室爲您提供任何你能想到的吃的和喝的。 登機很方便服務也是無可挑剔的。 這裏的工作人員都是受過訓練的很完美。 食物也很不錯和牀,提供睡衣,給你非常甜美的夢。  國泰的總是一個很棒的選擇。
Eng: Pleasant and positive You have a good attitude at the airport from the moment you arrive. The first-class lounge offers you everything you can think of to eat and drink. Boarding is convenient and service is impeccable. The staff here are perfectly trained. The food is also very good and the bed, provided pajamas, gives you a very sweet dream. Cathay Pacific is always a great choice.

review: 今次主要是針對來回香港到沖繩的航班饍食方面。一份餐只有主菜、雪糕及水，份量非常細。甚至連汽水、啤酒也沒有提供。至於味道就看看運氣，好彩今次來回餐饍的味道尚算不錯，只是吃不飽而已。
Eng: This time it is mainly for the meals of flights from Hong Kong to Okinawa. A meal consists only of main course, ice cream and water, and the portion is very fine. Even soda and beer are not provided. As for the taste, let's look at luck. Luckily, this round-trip meal tastes pretty good, but it's just not enough.

review: 服务特别好，免费的水跟服务员随便要，都会给
Eng: The service is particularly good, free water and the waiter will do whatever they want

review: 由香港到台北，再由台南回香港，中華航空是唯一一個可以OPEN
Eng: From Hong Kong to Taipei, and then from Tainan to Hong Kong, China Airlines is the only one that can open

review: 已經向國泰航空投訴去新加坡最好都是坐新加坡航空否則會後悔要平宜就坐服務好就坐新加坡航空不會推薦人坐了太差了
Eng: I have complained to Cathay Pacific that it is best to go to Singapore to take Singapore Airlines, otherwise I will regret to sit down and take the service. Singapore Airlines will not recommend people to sit too bad

review: 好貼心服務  出發時 自動升級 商務 坐位舒服 食物又好  機組 人員自動帮助人，  十分享受四小時 旅程，  回程由 曼谷回香港可以 提早寄存行李，我可以享受一下休息室和機場購物。
Eng: Good caring service, automatic upgrade when you leave, business, comfortable seats, good food, crew members help people automatically, enjoy a four-hour journey, return from Bangkok to Hong Kong can store luggage early, I can enjoy shopping in the lounge and airport.

review: 良好的服務和友好的工作人員  我和我的家人從曼谷飛往新加坡的國泰航空公司。 從登記入住到退房  在抵達新加坡是一個很棒的經歷。 板載的工作人員特別友好和樂於助人。 雖然飛機是滿的,工作人員能夠提供微笑服務他們的午餐。 我們到達的時候在新加坡的時間。 有這麼好的服務,像我這樣的新客戶國泰觥籌交錯。 保持良好的工作和期待再次國泰航空的飛機。
Eng: Good service and friendly staff My family and I flew from Bangkok to Singapore by Cathay Pacific. From check-in to check-out It was a great experience to arrive in Singapore. The on-board staff is particularly friendly and helpful. Although the plane was full, the staff was able to provide a smile to serve their lunch. The time we were in Singapore when we arrived. With such a good service, Cathay Pacific, a new customer like me, is planning a crossover. Keep up the good work and look forward to Cathay Pacific's aircraft again.

review: 預算旅客的天堂  這是你要去的地方如果你正在尋找廉價的便宜貨。 營業時間從10上午 10下午晚上到這個市場是最活躍的。 每個隔間有各種商品... 從衣服的假冒手袋,珠寶首飾,玩具,電話蓋涵,飾品,禮品等。 便宜一半的數額要堅持你自己的BID。 他們會的洞穴。 它很擁擠和熱鬧和有趣。 一個大背包把所有的購物... 這使它更容易些。 我們在旺角地鐵站和要向任何人問路。 如果你有時間去爃&爉卡卡爾在朗豪酒店的建築只有幾步之遙。 雜念。
Eng: A paradise for budget travelers This is the place to go if you are looking for cheap bargains. Opening hours from 10 am to 10 pm to this market are the most active. Each compartment has a variety of goods... from fake handbags in clothes, jewelry, toys, phone covers, accessories, gifts, etc. Half the cheaper amount must stick to your own BID. They will cave. It is crowded and lively and interesting. A big backpack carries all the shopping... which makes it easier. We are at Mong Kok MRT station and want to ask anyone for directions. If you have time to go to Yao & Yao Kakar, the building at Langham Hotel is just a few steps away. Miscellaneous thoughts.

review: 房間很大, 價錢實惠
Eng: Rooms are large and affordable

review: 改觀 舒適  這次台北回程香港對國泰航空有點改觀， 以前印象好一般， 現在的座位比以前闊 舒適，空間感也較大， 艙內也比以前明亮 極潔， 空服員態度也很好， 只是飛機餐都改為簡便餐， 肉圈熱的，味道幾好， 但餅乾好一般， 及只提供一合檸檬茶， 當然可以另外問空服員要水或茶， 但印象中空服人員在飛行過程中問乘客要不要茶或水完全沒有， 但整體都不差， 只是平常票價都較貴。
Eng: Improved comfort This time, the return trip from Taipei to Hong Kong made a little difference to Cathay Pacific. The impression was good. The seats are wider and more comfortable than before. The space is also larger. The cabin is brighter and cleaner than before. The flight attendant attitude is also very good. The meals are all changed to light meals, the meat circle is hot, and the taste is good, but the biscuits are average, and only one lemon tea is provided. Of course, you can ask the flight attendant to ask for water or tea. Ask the passengers if there is no tea or water at all, but the overall is not bad, but the fare is usually more expensive.

review: 非常好的服務和價值的旅行服務  他們提供很好的,友好的服務和從票購買到真正的旅行。 雖然他們的在綫服務很好,它可能是更好的給他們打電話以確保,特別是如果您連接到的其他航空公司港龍航空航班包括（這是現在在國泰的一部分,叫做龍國泰）。
Eng: Very good service and value travel service They provide good, friendly service and from ticket purchase to real travel. Although their online service is good, it may be better to call them to make sure, especially if you are connected to other airlines including Dragonair flights (this is now part of Cathay Pacific, called Dragon Cathay Pacific).

review: 漂亮的酒店  我們剛從度過了一個超讚的假期Ikos Olivia上星期 這是一家漂亮的酒店但是遺憾的是我和我的同伴都覺得這是缺乏一種大洋洲溫泉提供的一些特別的東西。 我們意識到這是一個新酒店這是第一季。 食物絕對是超讚的服務員也是在所有的餐廳。 然而娛樂節目很一般主要是由於惡劣的天氣和主要的酒吧真的不是。 座位馬吉尼和這裏的一切都讓人驚喜的地方根本就沒有。 我們的房間很可愛但是再來這裏我們覺得這裏的服務不是那麼好Occiana  我覺得我是相當挑剔的因爲這真的是一個漂亮的酒店和我們遇到的幾次Timos 他肯定是把所有的評論對他最難熬的主板和把事情弄好。 我們一些很棒的人們在這個假期和我們覺得肯定會保持一生的朋友 所以非常感謝你們的
Eng: Beautiful hotel We just had an amazing holiday from Ikos Olivia last week. This is a beautiful hotel but unfortunately my colleagues and I felt that it lacked something special that Oceania Hot Springs offers. We realized that this is a new hotel and this is the first season. The food is absolutely superb and the waiters are also in all restaurants. However, entertainment shows are generally mainly due to bad weather and the main bars are really not. Seating Magini and everything that surprises here are simply not there. Our room was lovely but when we came back we thought the service here was not so good Occiana I think I was quite picky because this is really a beautiful hotel and we have encountered Timos a few times and he definitely put all the reviews right He had the toughest motherboard and got things right. Some of our great people are friends on this holiday and we think they will definitely stay a lifetime, so thank you very much

review: 這是一個很棒的航空公司的航班  這是很久以來我們已經飛了國泰的但它仍是一如既往的好,如果只有歐洲航空公司附近的任何地方都可以找他們的服務太好了我要。 從你到達的那一刻起你就是一個機場的旅行者的歡迎,他們的登記入住非常愉快,他們的服務很棒的休息室和船上的歐洲航班的價格遠遠高於質量真希望我們能有機會更頻繁的使用。
Eng: This is a great airline flight. It's been a long time since we have flown to Cathay Pacific but it is still as good as ever. If only European Airlines can find their service anywhere, it's great. I want it. From the moment you arrive you are welcomed by an airport traveler, their check-in is very pleasant, their service is great and the price of the European flight on board is much higher than the quality I really hope we can have the opportunity Use more frequently.

review: 一個很棒的航班從香港到曼谷  登機手續安排的很好的溝通。 找到主板上的服務要比我想象的和最重要的是飛機上的時間表。  腿部空間不是一個問題和滿足我們的需求有飛機上的娛樂來打發時間的旅行。
Eng: A great flight from Hong Kong to Bangkok with good communication for check-in arrangements. Finding the services on the motherboard is more important than I thought and the most important thing is the schedule on the plane. Legroom is not an issue and meeting our needs has entertainment on the plane to pass the time travel.

review: 雖說是荃灣地標, 但步行往荃灣市中心較遠, 要十多分鐘. 相對來說, 酒店較接近大窩口地鐵站
Eng: Although it is a landmark of Tsuen Wan, it takes more than ten minutes to walk to the center of Tsuen Wan. Relatively speaking, the hotel is closer to Tai Wo Kou MTR Station

review: 樓下是商城，超讚，旅遊多次，CP好到破表會有驚喜感，以個人經驗，可謂港澳台之冠
Eng: Downstairs is a shopping mall. It’s awesome. I have traveled many times. When CP is good enough to break the table, I will be pleasantly surprised. Personal experience is the crown of Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.

review: 了解你的需要，提供你所需  帶著小孩跟老人一起去日本旅遊，老人不吃牛，從訂位開始，我就知道我選對了。在預訂與小孩一起的座位時，提到同行的人不食用牛肉，客服貼心的設置特殊餐，再三標明不食用牛肉。看到小孩要登機，提醒我們可以優先上機，並詢問我們是否需要枕頭及毛毯。各家航空公司都很好，但多數是我們詢問後提供，可是國泰卻會提前我們一步資訊，真的很感謝。因為你們，讓我對於帶小孩出國，不在感到緊張。因為你們會協助我!!
Eng: Understand your needs and provide what you need. Take a child to travel with the elderly to Japan. The elderly do not eat cattle. From the time of booking, I know that I have chosen the right one. When booking a seat with a child, it is mentioned that people traveling with you do not eat beef, and the customer service intimately sets up special meals. Seeing that the child is going to board the plane, remind us to give priority to boarding and ask if we need pillows and blankets. All airlines are very good, but most of them are provided after our inquiry, but Cathay Pacific will give us a step ahead of the information, I really appreciate it. Because of you, I am no longer nervous about taking children abroad. Because you guys will help me!

review: X391班機  從北京飛香港轉機  空服員倒水時，大概有一滴水它覺得不開心吧，濺到我手肘，我完全覺得沒事，it happened.  但空服員立刻慰問並拿一大疊紙巾給我表示歉意  我覺得小小動作可以看得到服務的用心，但忘記看空服員名字了！！抱歉！上次商務艙香港飛浦東也是，男空服員上餐不小心滑了一下，食物飛出到地上一點點，兩位空服員立刻衝過來幫忙擦拭與清理地上，還堅持要立刻換一份全新餐點給我，後來我是沒讓他們換，lounge吃飽了，飛機餐少吃些！😜😜  總之，推薦國泰！不論商務還渡假，我都坐國泰喔！👍👍👍
Eng: When the flight attendant of flight X391 flew from Beijing to Hong Kong, the flight attendant poured water, there was probably a drop of water. It felt unhappy, splashed on my elbow, I totally felt fine, it happened. But the flight attendant immediately condolences and gives a large stack of tissues I apologize, I think the action can be seen in the little action, but I forgot to see the name of the flight attendant! ! Sorry! The last time in the business class of Hong Kong's Feipu Dong, the male flight attendant slipped accidentally during the meal, the food flew out to the ground a little bit, the two flight attendants immediately rushed over to help wipe and clean the ground, and insisted on changing one immediately Give me a brand new meal. Later, I didn’t let them change, the lounge was full, and the plane meal was less! 😜😜 In short, recommend Cathay! Regardless of business or vacation, I take Cathay Pacific! 👍👍👍

review: 當你跟他們討價還價是合理的  這是一個美妙的氛圍！ 但是請合理, 我們看到很多人在叫他們不會花更多的錢商店的店主提供的東西非常的, 記得他們也要生活。 如果你不滿意的話就走了。 總之很適合仿製品和便宜的東西, 如果你想要高品質的去的地方去。
Eng: It's reasonable when you bargain with them. This is a wonderful atmosphere! But please be reasonable. We see that many people are telling them that they will not spend more money. The owner of the store provides very good things. Remember that they have to live. If you are not satisfied, leave. In short, it is very suitable for imitation products and cheap things, if you want high quality to go to the place.

review: 購物  工作人員服務態度好，購物應有盡有，地理位置佳，不用到處找不到，要什麼大牌子都有，附近環境好優美，面對大海，感覺非常好
Eng: The shopping staff has a good service attitude, shopping is everything, the location is good, you don't need to find it everywhere, you need to have any big brands, the surrounding environment is beautiful, facing the sea, I feel very good

review: 據傳... 不差  我們很喜歡這裏的食物&服務我們的航班在香港和蘇黎世之間,至少他們也很想念我的t特別的一餐,這些航班也很準時。 我寧願選擇cx而不是那些廉價航空公司d。
Eng: According to legend... Not bad. We love the food & service. Our flights are between Hong Kong and Zurich. At least they also miss my special meal. These flights are also on time. I would rather choose cx than cheap airlines.

review: 是需要花錢的是馬可波羅俱樂部會員  我和我姐姐乘坐國泰從克利夫蘭這是我們第一次去芝加哥到香港和香港到登巴薩,巴厘島。 我們的航班延誤了芝加哥和這是不幸的。 我們被告知這是因爲飛機在未來的時間,也被延誤了,然後必須在完成準備爲我們的航班。 不過,每個人都很好很隨和的。 還。 我和我妹妹給了我們可以選擇一個座位和一個空的座位有3行在中間,這讓我們非常感激上的長途飛行！ 我們很清楚的看到外面有人因爲我們馬可波羅俱樂部成員  登機時最初的想法是友善的工作人員和在愛的優先登機的馬可波羅俱樂部的成員。 有趣的是無論你在世界的哪裏,似乎人不傾聽並遵循的。
Eng: It is the Marco Polo Club member who needs to spend money. My sister and I took Cathay Pacific from Cleveland. This was our first trip to Chicago to Hong Kong and Hong Kong to Denpasar, Bali. Our flight was delayed in Chicago and this is unfortunate. We were told that this was because the plane was delayed in the future, and then must prepare for our flight. However, everyone is very nice and easy going. also. My sister and I gave us a choice of a seat and an empty seat with 3 rows in the middle, which makes us very grateful for the long-distance flight! review: 如果不趕時間可以盡情的享受  經常往來兩地，過去經常搭乘長榮航空，而國泰則成為我最近的心頭好。不同於國籍航空，國泰及國泰港龍基地為香港，因此選乘國泰系列班機必須在香港轉機，也因為如此，來往北京的出發地則選擇更多台灣三大主要機場，這是其一。其二是國泰航空在飛行體驗上做的很棒，不論是餐點還是服務，更不可以不提香港機場內的四大貴賓室。  而更讓我訝異的是某天在郵箱內發現的馬可波羅俱樂部的邀請函，這讓我對國泰的印象更加深刻。這一年主要以國泰為主，而我目前僅是亞洲萬里通的會員。因此收到馬可波羅的邀請讓我對他們對乘客的細心好感度增加。

Unlike national airlines, Cathay Pacific and Cathay Dragon are based in Hong Kong. Therefore, Cathay Pacific flights must be transferred in Hong Kong. For this reason, the departure point to and from Beijing is to choose more of the three major airports in Taiwan. This is one of them. The second is that Cathay Pacific has done a great job in flight experience, whether it is meals or services, let alone the four VIP lounges in Hong Kong Airport. review: 總是感到賓至如歸。  上的工作人員都非常專業而且令人愉快的地面和空中。 他們看起來高度拋光的而且非常平易近人。 白天和晚上的飯菜總是做得恰到好處我覺得是我吃過的餐廳的飯菜質量很高。 早餐都是一些什麼的對我來說太花哨。 這是我每次都選擇從香港第1。

This is my first choice from Hong Kong every time.

review: 繁忙的市場,要小心價格  還是一個的主要市場如果你是一個遊客。 不過,要小心一些價格,他們會讓他們較高的如果他們知道你是一個遊客。 你想出多少前開始討價還價。 要做好走很遠的。 一些攤位就會有固定的價格和會說'沒有討價還價'。 小心有接待的都是假的,因爲他們可能會帶你到一個小衚衕裏的錢包被偷了手機和錢包蓋爾納才能。 如果你早點去（11上午）時仍設置攤位,你可能會有一個更好的價格包因爲它爲'開始新的一天'這就意味着如果他們有優惠及早,它應該整天。 中國人民非常迷信。 因爲下午晚一點會多一點人氣方法。 這不是一個美好的時光,如果你有小孩子因爲你鬥爭同一輛車。

If you set up the stall when you go early (11 am), you may have a better price package because it is'start a new day' which means that if they have a discount early, it should be all day long. review: 警告從一個鑽石會員  我指望的成員和我是一個這麼這麼多年球的鑽石會員。   兩年前我開始覺得cx已更改。 我覺得現在是一個非常吝嗇的航空公司。 即使是對於一個鑽石。   飛機都是舊的,食物很便宜,酒也很差,而且當我嘗試使用我的飛行里程積分升級我的位子。 我像被當成一個乞丐。  幾年前當我想升級我的第一類業務。 我只需要給不超過兩週才獲得了一個座位。 現在只需6個月或更長時間。  我打電話給客戶服務中心輕鬆步行球向他們反映我們擔心的惡化的整體服務。 我有幾個有意思的回答了我的問題包括： Cx是不指望polo所以他們根本不在乎（還不錯但是我覺得我的vip cx.

I feel like being a beggar. A few years ago when I wanted to upgrade my first business. I only need to give no more than two weeks to get a seat. Now it only takes 6 months or more. review: 不想離開  看了那麼多很棒的評論的時候我總是很謹慎  我不想我的期待太多但在這裏我添加到列表'棒'！ 這真是一個天堂的一週！  我們帶着兩個兒子（9 6&）&他們有最好的時間,從法國西餐廳的獨立性的愉悅感的可以點他們的冰激凌在酒吧！  這裏的工作人員,無一例外的都很棒  友好&高效！ 不過要注意食物很好你的衣服可能是一個小的更緊密！  特別要提到的是一個噁心的廚房從安納亞,他挑選新鮮的香草香草花園在酒店的晚餐&很感興趣他的作業&食材他到了我工作的合作伙伴使用&餐廳餐飲是由這個年輕人留下很無語！   這是一個多麼美妙的一週,我是真的捨不得回家了！

The staff here, without exception, are great. Friendly & efficient! But beware that the food is good and your clothes may be a little tighter! Special mention is a disgusting kitchen from Anaya, he picked fresh herbs in the garden for dinner at the hotel & was very interested in his homework & ingredients he went to my working partner to use & the restaurant catering was by this young man Very speechless! What a wonderful week this is, I really can't bear to go home!

review: 一流的很傷心  我決定乘坐頭等艙過節國泰... 我通常都會即時與它們有業務關係... 我的建議是,不要有一流的,這真的是沒什麼特別的... 我收到了同樣的待遇基本上與業務類的睡衣和一雙！ 休息室本身很無聊,它擁有一個5星級的餐廳但是很小... 沒有接回家,沒有護送我到休息室,護理我收到其他航空公司飛行業務類... 如果你想坐飛機國泰,堅持與業務類,第一類而不是嘗試在新加坡航空公司！ 它只是不值得我所付的錢。

The lounge itself is boring, it has a 5 star restaurant but it's small... No pick up home, no escort me to the lounge, care I received other airline flight business class... If you want to fly Cathay Pacific, stick with the business category, the first category instead of trying Singapore Airlines! It's just not worth the money I paid.

It is also connected to other malls, so I can really shop all day. Favorite LCX The Miyazaki shop inside is selling original pieces. It’s really cute.

review: 有哈根達斯的冰激凌  飛機還算新，空姐也還可以，但是港式的那種服務大家都懂飛機餐亮點就是哈根達斯冰激凌了吧其他的，好像也沒什麼了
Eng: There are ice creams from Haagen-Dazs. The plane is fairly new, and the flight attendants are OK, but the Hong Kong-style service. Everyone knows that the highlight of the aircraft meal is Haagen-Dazs ice cream. Others, it seems to be nothing

review: 東西不錯價格合理   * ）工作站上轉至旺角（旺角東不）, 使 E2退出並詢問方向, 很失望。 在您退出時接地級別轉發需步行半塊則處於中間位置的女人街運行的是從左側和右側都是客戶的堅強在其中。  * ）一般來說一切都就緒與中午準備自助晚餐有些供應商。 女人街市場的營業時間是一年中每一天的第一天之外的中國新年的。 這將真正來臨後黑在晚上。  * ）它的東西幾乎相同的第三個商店的每一銷售。  * ）成本將您的手提包150到250 HKD 圍繞, 這只是我的理解。 我不得購買, 剛買了一個手袋180 HKD 使用剪切工作值得。  * ）捕獲到我的注意哪些主要是手提包, 離合器,
Eng: Things are good and the price is reasonable *) Transferred to Mong Kok on the workstation (Mong Kok East is not), made E2 exit and asked for directions, very disappointed. When you log out, the ground level forwarding needs to be half a block away, but the woman’s street in the middle is running from the left and right sides of the customer’s strength. *) Generally speaking, everything is ready and some vendors prepare dinner buffet at noon. The business hours of Ladies Market are Chinese New Year except the first day of every day of the year. This will really come after dark at night. *) It sells almost the same thing in every third store. *) The cost will be around 150 to 250 HKD for your handbag, this is just my understanding. I can't buy it, I just bought a handbag for 180 HKD It's worth using the cutting job. *) caught my attention which is mainly handbag, clutch,

review: Check-out 時詢問前臺人員幫助、態度冷淡
Eng: Ask the front desk staff for help and a cold attitude during Check-out

review: 這次坐國泰真的是充滿期待是因為國泰給我印象一向都不差，可惜這次因為颱風關系而搞到我很不滿；原因是安排完全不好，而且訂好後補又不給我坐而且反而要我坐3天後的航班，我真的不知道訂票員工是如何搞。餐食真的很爛就是一個不知什麼的燒餅配餅干以及雀巢檬茶，我真的很傻眼！空服員的態度只是一般而且沒有及時協助他人，但我常常見到他們在聊天。
Eng: Sitting on Cathay Pacific this time is really full of expectations because Cathay Pacific has always impressed me, but unfortunately this time I got very dissatisfied because of the typhoon; the reason is that the arrangement is not good at all, and the supplement is not sitting for me and instead If I want to take a flight after 3 days, I really don't know how the booking staff is engaged. The food is really bad. It's an unknown biscuit with biscuits and Nestle lemon tea. I'm really dumbfounded! The flight attendant's attitude is just average and does not assist others in time, but I often see them chatting.

review: 十分驚喜的服務  今次旅程係出發既當日得知回港當日可能懸掛8號風球，在尾得兩天仍未覺定會否受颱風影響而非常擔心。一來擔心影響工作，二來又擔心航班取消，更改航班會非常麻煩。  登機前48小時收到國泰航空的提示電郵，因估計航班可能受颱風影響，而可自行更換航班，並且不用收取任何費用，而且有很多資訊更新，這是讓我感覺驚喜的表現
Eng: Very pleasant service. This trip started on the day when I learned that the No. 8 typhoon might be hoisted on the day of returning to Hong Kong. I was still very worried about whether it would be affected by the typhoon in the last two days. One is worried about the impact on the work, and the other is worried about the flight cancellation. Changing the flight will be very troublesome. I received a reminder email from Cathay Pacific 48 hours before boarding, because it is estimated that the flight may be affected by the typhoon, and I can change the flight on my own without any charge, and there are many information updates, which is a surprise to me

review: 員工服務態度差，酒店政策嚴重有問題，房間很小
Eng: Staff service attitude is poor, hotel policy is serious and the room is small

review: 一小片天堂！  我們在這裏住了一個非常放鬆的一個禮拜,沒有花我們很長的時間去享受被寵愛的感覺,離開工作的壓力遠遠甩在了身後。  我們受到了酒店所有的複雜的被員工的一個微笑和愉快的問候。  一塵不染的房間,可愛的花園,這裏的食物是一流的。 我們嘗試了所有的四個酒店裏的餐廳,以及自助餐廳和外出就餐選擇。  口味是一個非常高檔的自助餐廳,而且我們真的很喜歡這裏的娛樂活動（歌手和鍵盤手）一天晚上。 普羅旺斯（法國）,提供美味的早餐和午餐（很棒的沙拉！ ）,和我們在那裏吃的晚餐是一流的。  有一家希臘餐廳,喝點酒,也很好,還有友好和高效的服務。  意大利餐廳,福斯科,也很可愛,有很棒的服務,包括服務員從葡萄酒的選擇上非常有幫助的建議。  利於我們可能是安納亞,亞洲餐廳,這是一個頂級的提供一頓美妙的口味和出色的服務。  我們出去吃的飯在村莊的Mouragio, 並得到了優質的服務。 我們選擇了一個很棒的老闆以共享不同種類的開胃菜,和這裏的氛圍和食物品質都是最令人愉快的（雖然分量很大！ ）  我建議你提前預訂了所有這些食品。 我們預訂了我們的第一次吃三頓飯我們飛往希臘,而且我們很高興我們是這樣做的。  溫泉的員工也值得一提,禮貌和很棒的服務,這就是合租的海灘,她們真的很有效率,甚至我們的太陽鏡清潔！  別的詞彙來形容和讚美.... 這是一個一流的全包式酒店..... 強烈推薦！
Eng: A little piece of heaven! We stayed here for a very relaxing week, without spending us a long time to enjoy being pampered, and the pressure to leave work was far behind. We received a smile and a pleasant greeting from all the complex hotel staff. Spotless rooms, lovely garden, and the food here is superb. We tried all four restaurants in the hotel, as well as buffet restaurants and dining out options. Taste is a very upscale cafeteria, and we really like the entertainment (singer and keyboard player) here one night. Provence (France), offering delicious breakfast and lunch (great salad! ), and the dinner we had there was superb. There is a Greek restaurant with some wine, which is also very good, as well as friendly and efficient service. The Italian restaurant, Fosco, is also cute and has great service, including the waiter's very helpful suggestions on wine selection. Conducive to us may be Anaya, an Asian restaurant, which is a top-notch offering a wonderful taste and excellent service. We went out to eat in the village of Mouragio, and received excellent service. We chose a great owner to share different kinds of appetizers, and the atmosphere and food quality here are the most pleasant (although the portion is huge!) I suggest you book all of these foods in advance. We booked our first three meals and we flew to Greece, and we were very happy that we did. The staff of the spa is also worth mentioning, courtesy and great service, this is the shared rental beach, they are really efficient, even our sunglasses are clean! Other words to describe and praise... This is a first-class all-inclusive hotel..... highly recommended!

review: MARC POLO CLUB SUCKS  拿著馬可波羅綠卡，在值機櫃台遭到羞辱。說你為什麼在這裡排隊，這裏只針對商務艙。我解釋了我是馬可波羅會員，然後被羞辱了級別不夠，這裏只供藍卡以上（類似銀卡金卡）以上級別。我解釋了，任何馬可波羅會員都可以在這裡辦理的，我在香港沙巴桂林 任何機場都沒有問題，現在除了傲慢的德國機場客服。
Eng: MARC POLO CLUB SUCKS holding Marco Polo green card was humiliated at the check-in counter. Say why you line up here, this is only for business class. I explained that I am a member of Marco Polo, and then I was humiliated. The level is not enough, here only for the blue card and above (similar to silver card and gold card) and above. I explained that any Marco Polo member can handle it here. I have no problem at any airport in Guilin, Sabah, Hong Kong, except for the arrogant German airport customer service.

review: 免費升等商務昌  因為座位滿，所以免費升等商務艙，服務人員態度很好，位子也很大，調整椅背不會影響到後方乘客，餐點也不錯吃 機上的影視內容可以在更新快一點
Eng: Free upgrade to Business Changer. Because the seats are full, you can upgrade to Business Class for free. The service staff has a good attitude and a large seat. Adjusting the back of the seat will not affect the rear passengers. Meals are also good. faster

review: 看維港景色的新地標  海港城商場的海運大廈底的本來是商場一部份，坐擁無敵景觀，卻沒有好好發揮。之前會到三樓LCX底的星巴克，點一杯咖啡，享受美景。 最近到訪，發現商場重新規劃了，將海運大廈最底部全改成景觀餐廳。 頂樓的露天廣場可以看到九龍和港島的美麗景色。 雖然到訪當天氣候不佳，但是景色依舊非常迷人。 香港的地產商在產品的規劃真的是非常厲害👍
Eng: New landmark with views of Victoria Harbour At the bottom of the Maritime Tower in the Harbour City Mall was originally a part of the mall, sitting on an invincible landscape, but did not give full play to it. Before going to the Starbucks at the bottom of the LCX on the third floor, order a cup of coffee and enjoy the view. Recently visited, I found that the shopping mall was re-planned, and the bottom of the Maritime Building was completely converted into a landscape restaurant. The open-air plaza on the top floor offers beautiful views of Kowloon and Hong Kong Island. Although the weather was not good on the day of the visit, the scenery was still very charming. Real estate developers in Hong Kong are really good at product planning 👍

review: 房內燈光操作困難。
Eng: The lighting in the room is difficult to operate

review: 服務相當差勁，也沒該有的服務形象在飛行超過9個多小時的航線裡，除了兩次供餐時段主動給予飲料及水外，其餘都不會主動供應Munu上寫可在非供餐時段，可供應若提出需求的快速杯麵，在弟一次供餐前就跟多位空服員提出要吃杯麵卻說沒有了，明顯歧視坐經濟艙的乘客（或因我是台灣人？！）女空服員站在非理餐區的走道，大啖啖地近靠乘客站著吃冰淇淋還邊其他機組空服員聊天，實在形象糟透了！
Eng: The service is quite poor, and there is no service image. In the flight route of more than 9 hours, except for the two meals during the initiative to give drinks and water, the rest will not actively provide Munu. It can provide quick cup noodles if there is a demand. Before my brother served a meal, he asked many flight attendants to eat cup noodles but said it was gone. It clearly discriminated passengers in economy class (or because I am a Taiwanese?!) The female flight attendant stood in the aisle of the non-catering area, and slammed close to the passenger to eat ice cream while chatting with other crew flight attendants. It was a terrible image!

review: 快樂回程  今次48小時前, 終於有好多位提供check in, 可以同個friend一齊坐. 中午機, 我們都好早到機場, 攪好手續, 台灣counter 都不錯, 一上機, 一個輕便午餐, 這次比原定時間早了45分鐘, 真係值得一讚! 可惜, 等行李等了一小時. 真係無奈! 會再選CX嗎? 會, 始終香港人航空, 同聲同氣!
Eng: Happy return trip 48 hours before this time, finally there are a lot of people who provide check in and can sit together with a friend. At noon, we all arrive at the airport early and stir up the procedures. The counter in Taiwan is good. Once on the plane, a light lunch, This time is 45 minutes earlier than the original time, the department is really worthy of praise! Unfortunately, waiting for luggage for an hour. Really helpless! Will you choose CX again? Yes, always Hong Kong Airlines, the same voice!

review: 超越繼選擇！   沒錯！ 我不得不再一次一天,就是爲了讓我備兌都要看看是否有什麼新！ 我第一次來這裏的時候我的朋友,我們看到了一些很不錯的東西。 不僅有很多漂亮的運動鞋去退房的,還有一些很不錯的街邊小吃也！ 這樣一個地方是另一家韓國的小吃就是街snacker”聯合從那裏往下走。 及是的！ 還有一大堆的耐克,阿迪達斯,新的平衡,美洲獅,銳步和更多退房！ 從價格合理的一度到一些很貴的,他們這裏什麼都有！ 如果你喜歡運動鞋！ 一定要試試這個地方！ 哦和穿一雙好鞋步行！
Eng: Go beyond the choice! That's right! I had to do it again one day, just to get me to check whether there is anything new! The first time I came here, my friend, we saw something very nice. Not only are there many beautiful sneakers to check out, but also some very good street food! Such a place is another Korean snack that is a street snacker "Union walks down from there. And yes! There are a whole lot of Nike, Adidas, New Balance, Cougar, Reebok and more check out! From the price Once reasonable, some expensive, they have everything here! If you like sneakers! Be sure to try this place! Oh and walk with a good pair of shoes!

review: 很有趣,但是會有更好的  這裏混合有很多攤位。有算命的,有食品大排檔,妓女,拼寫錯誤的T恤,大多數都在重複自己。 如果你在香港旺角,而且有一晚的時間,來這個市場掃一下還挺值的。 還有類似於斯坦利那樣的比較好的市場,不過取決於你的追求。
Eng: It's fun, but there will be better ones. There are many stalls here. There are fortune tellers, food stalls, prostitutes, misspelled T-shirts, and most of them repeat themselves. If you are in Mong Kok, Hong Kong, and have a night, it is worthwhile to visit this market. There is a better market like Stanley, but it depends on your pursuit.

review: 價格高
Eng: High price

review: 暫時沒有
Eng: Not yet

review: 在各方面都很出色  我們帶着我們的孩子去ikos olivia 2我們很幸運的被升級到了豪華這是非常特別的。 我們去過世界各地的高級度假村周圍的各個地方也住過但是從來沒有體驗過這樣好的地方。 標準的設施都非常的出色。 員工總是很熱情的幫助,這是特別指出有一些殘疾的客人來這家酒店。 女僕服務和客房服務都是不會錯的,而且接待處的工作人員和酒吧員工很優秀。 演示文稿的質量和提供的食物的自助餐和點菜的餐廳是我們吃過的最好的。 每個人都會竭盡全力讓你的假期難忘,我們希望明年再來。
Eng: Excellent in every way. We took our children to ikos olivia 2. We were lucky to be upgraded to luxury. This is very special. We've been to various places around high-end resorts around the world but have never experienced such a good place. Standard facilities are excellent. The staff are always very helpful and it is especially pointed out that guests with some disabilities come to this hotel. The maid service and room service are not wrong, and the reception staff and bar staff are excellent. The quality of the presentation and the food buffet and a la carte restaurants are the best we have ever had. Everyone will do their best to make your holiday memorable, and we hope to come again next year.

review: 糟糕的服務  最近我去香港國泰航空cx 105我們訂了豪華經濟艙座位和預期的一些服務。 這架飛機是一個330巴士裏,這裏的服務真是差極了船上的工作人員不是很樂於助人的態度在所有的一切都很讓人失望的是很麻煩的。  第一類和商業都很充足但其餘的四人機票飛機參加條樣的背面的平面。 他們提供給我們先但是等了有1 12小時到托盤清除和你所需要的東西在這段時間內沒有服務  我是如此失望過的飛機和服務將會是一個很長的時間直到我預訂的這家公司  在辦理入住手續的服務都很友好和樂於助人和行李委託表很快很有效率。  他們真的需要看看在空氣中的服務。
Eng: Terrible service Recently I went to Hong Kong Cathay Pacific cx 105 and we booked a premium economy class seat and expected services. This plane is a 330 bus, the service here is really poor, the staff on board is not very helpful and the attitude is disappointing at all, it is very troublesome. Both the first category and the business are adequate but the remaining four-person ticket planes participate in the flat back plane. They provided us first but waited for 12 hours until the tray was cleared and what you need was not served during this time I was so disappointed that the aircraft and service will be a long time until I booked this The company's check-in service is very friendly and helpful and the baggage order form is very efficient very quickly. They really need to look at the services in the air.

review: 人品爆發！！！  感謝國泰航空的服務，當時持著信用卡贈送的國泰綠卡登機～專員告知跟太太兩人升等商務艙太令人吃驚了！！還有貴賓室真的一流不得不說是一個好的航空公司～～
Eng: The character broke out! ! ! Thanks to Cathay Pacific’s service, the Cathay Green Card presented with a credit card at the time ~ The Commissioner informed that it was amazing to upgrade to Business Class with the wife! ! And the VIP room is really first-class. I have to say that it is a good airline.

review: 離海港城有遠一些
Eng: Farther away from Harbour City

review: 千萬不要錯過這裏,甚至如果你之前來過  我去過幾次這些市場很樂意再來。 氛圍非常充分的能源。 如果你不會騷擾你不太久在某一特定的立場和即使你搞一些價格討價還價,他們都很友好呢。 在該地區的一些很棒的餐館,所以不要害怕停下來買點吃的。
Eng: Don't miss it, even if you have been here before, I have been to these markets a few times and would be happy to come back. The atmosphere is very full of energy. If you will not harass you for a long time at a particular position and even if you engage in some price bargaining, they are very friendly. There are some great restaurants in the area, so don't be afraid to stop and buy some food.

review: 園區不大，但香港迪士尼也不過才十年，卻有許多設備已經斑駁，服務態度也不好，如果不是去過日本迪士尼樂園，我真不曉得為何要瘋這個刺激度不高的娛樂場所，價格也比上海、東京還要貴！建議第一次到亞洲迪士尼的旅客，強烈建議先去東京迪士尼，頂級的服務，維護非常完善的園區，便宜的門票，香港絕不推薦！
Eng: The park is not big, but Hong Kong Disneyland is only ten years old, but many devices have been mottled, and the service attitude is not good. If I haven’t been to Disneyland Japan, I really don’t know why I’m crazy about this less exciting entertainment place. The price is also more expensive than Shanghai and Tokyo! It is recommended that passengers going to Disneyland Asia for the first time, it is strongly recommended to go to Tokyo Disneyland first, top service, very well-maintained park, cheap tickets, Hong Kong is never recommended!

review: 我們住了三晚，不知道為何我們住的房間每天早上都有敲打聲敲醒了我們.......我們不想那麼早起床呀！！！
Eng: We stayed for three nights, and I don’t know why the room we stayed in had a knocking sound every morning to wake us up... We don’t want to get up so early! ! !

review: 非常深刻的印象。 強烈推薦。  因工作旅行在這裏住只待幾天。 我第一次來香港,所以不是很確定住在哪裡，但是想要嘗試一下，因為它是一個新的酒店在香港。  這裏的獨特的設計是相當明顯的，當你進入大堂。 這裏非常賞心悅目。 這裏的房間都設計得很好，很舒服。 這裡有很多很有創意的元素的設計，我還沒有找到很多豪華的城市酒店。 這裏的設施都是一流的，精心設計的，正是你所想要的一切。  這裏的食物很出色。 通常酒店的食物，即使是在高端的城市酒店（除非用一個在房子的名人餐廳——總是很一般。 但我給我留下非常深刻的印象，質量和擺盤甚至是客房服務的餐點。 這裏的早餐是半自助式的——也很出色。 我通常跳過自助早餐，當我住這裡是為了工作，但是讓我覺得這裏的每一天的時間在這裏。  有一個小小的溝通有點困難，有一些客房部的工作人員，但並不影響我的體驗。  此外，要注意這裏的個性化但又非侵擾和周到的服務，他是 GRO Phyllis 張絕對是一大優勢在 GR 團隊。  一定會再來住的，強烈推薦給每一個人，不管你是出差還是度假。
Eng: Very impressed. highly recommended. Staying here only a few days because of work travel. I am in Hong Kong for the first time, so I am not sure where to stay, but want to try it because it is a new hotel in Hong Kong. The unique design here is quite obvious when you enter the lobby. It is very pleasing here. The rooms here are very well designed and very comfortable. There are many creative elements in the design, I have not found many luxury city hotels. The facilities here are first-rate and well-designed, just what you want. The food here is excellent. Usually hotel food, even in high-end city hotels (unless you use a celebrity restaurant in the house-it's always average. But I was very impressed by the quality, presentation and even room service meals The breakfast here is semi-buffet style-also excellent. review: 總體上感覺很好.....  我們之所以選擇這家酒店純粹是因爲到到網上以前的評論所以我不會大書特書的部件和很多其他客人所說的。  總之這是一家非常好的酒店有精緻的傳送多個級別的。 毫無疑問是最大的資產是這裏的員工無一例外都非常令人愉快和樂於助人。 全包服務非常細緻而且葡萄酒烈酒是一定要嘗試的一些國際雖然希臘葡萄酒（墨爾樂紅葡萄酒中的茴香餐廳除外！ ！ ）。 值得給酒店發郵件提前一週預訂3晚1街餐廳預訂和登記入住的時候就預訂的剩餘部分即使是十月的酒店都訂滿了還有一個號碼的客人不能進入他們的選擇餐飲。 1有午餐'味道',這不是我們做的事也就不再重複了。 整體的食物非常好不是真的'餐廳'但是很新鮮,味道很好。  整個站點很寬敞而且維護得很好。 所以我很適合年輕的孩子們能馬車或者更少。  這家酒店晚上有娛樂設施但是我們並沒有而是選擇了一個咖啡利口酒和優雅的主休息室,他們每天晚上都有鋼琴會話四星所以很不錯。  我們選擇的是1街十月周希望天氣好的時候和避免學齡孩子幸運的是我們在這兩個地方成功！ ！ 。 幾個很乖的孩子周邊大部分的客人（主要是德國&英文）是一個平均年齡55的優點和雖然有幾個子35夫婦在那裏,我不知道一般的25歲的興趣就會因爲沒有聚會應有的氛圍。 在旺季的時候這可能是不同的？ ？  我們去了一個小鎮叫1旅行安排去參觀一個市場沒什麼特別但是很漂亮就要走出酒店住了一個早上。  我們吃了2小酒館的沿路的部分'出去吃'包。 最好吃的是二層一定要問問點菜的菜單你可以交換ikos菜單看了一個很小的費用這是非常值得的。  我們不是因爲這個世界需要探索上任的但是如果有普瑞米爾約維爾交易和我們一週免費的然後我們還會再來的下次還會租一輛車去探索了一天。

review: 當日孩子生病了，請台籍空姐給我一個毯子，卻遭到無情的對待。但差不多時間，卻有一位日籍空姐，只用目測判斷我的孩子似乎不舒服，即主動過來問我需要何種協助。親愛的台灣空姐，面對妳們的同胞有難，是否該不吝給予幫助啊！
Eng: The child was sick that day. I asked the Taiwanese flight attendant to give me a blanket, but it was treated ruthlessly. But about the same time, there was a Japanese flight attendant who judged my child seemed uncomfortable only by visual inspection, that is, took the initiative to ask me what kind of assistance I needed. Dear Taiwanese flight attendants, if you have any difficulties with your countrymen, should you not help me!

review: 豪華經濟艙  我和我老婆第一次乘坐國泰航空公司今年早些時候我們都很喜歡這裏。 我們被允許去悉尼的路上停留並選擇了香港,我們在那裏住了三天。 這趟航班的兩隻腿都很長這就是爲什麼我們選擇了豪華經濟艙。 有點貴但值得這麼長時間的航班上。 更大的座位,食物和飲料都包含在房費裏的。 還有一個包裏面有牙刷,睡眠面膜,耳塞和襪子。 很棒的服務。 對我們來說,任何超過5或6小時飛行時間是值得多花錢。
Eng: Premium Economy Class My wife and I first flew on Cathay Pacific Airways earlier this year. We all enjoyed it. We were allowed to stop on the way to Sydney and chose Hong Kong, where we stayed for three days. Both legs of this flight are very long, which is why we chose the deluxe economy class. A bit expensive but worth the flight for so long. Larger seats, food and drinks are included in the room rate. There is also a bag with toothbrush, sleep mask, earplugs and socks. Great service. For us, any flight time longer than 5 or 6 hours is worth the extra cost.

review: 準時，服務人員親切  航班只要準時我就會很滿意，這次搭乘國泰航空從台北經香港專機至暹粒的搭機體驗很愉快。一些小缺點：國泰港龍航空的航班在香港搭乘時需要轉搭接駁車，稍有不便。另外就是短程航班的餐點較不合我的口味。
Eng: On time, friendly staff The flight will be very satisfying as long as it is on time. This time, the flight experience of taking Cathay Pacific from Taipei to Siem Reap via Hong Kong is very pleasant. Some shortcomings: Cathay Dragon's flight needs to be transferred to a shuttle bus when it is taken in Hong Kong, which is slightly inconvenient. The other is that the meals on short-haul flights are less to my taste.

review: 棒極了   我們訂了6晚2017年4月ikos olivia。 我們之前就預訂了1周就在復活節之前我們看到了一個很優惠的價格。 我們通常都很懷疑所有都包的但是有tripadvisor的點評和與朋友相處的所以決定給它一個機會。 一價全包的點菜和7個月大的兒子在溫水游泳池我也給這家在忙。   到達的時候  這是他們第一次打開服務和服務絕對是無可挑剔的一天。 這家酒店和住宿期間一直都是如此。 服務周到和友好的員工（比他們需要做更多的事情）。   游泳池  一個7個月大的寶寶適合室外加熱時仍然可以寒冷的天氣。 非常乾淨的游泳池周圍有很多日光浴牀。 先到先得和日光浴牀都很高興地看到他們不是用毛巾佔着客人在破曉的時候。 一個小缺點  泳池邊的服務員需要更多。 值班的工作人員延長距離太遠。   自助  不錯的選擇,乾淨清新。 可以重複。 他們真的是最棒的嬰兒食品和高級混合餐中的一餐。   點菜  很好。 有一家希臘餐廳是最好的。   很棒的酒店的客戶服務是出奇的驚人的每一位員工的女服務員,到泳池的工作人員到管理。 Ikos的內部員工培訓策略都是準確的。
Eng: Awesome We booked 6 nights ikos olivia in April 2017. We booked a week before and just before Easter we saw a very good price. We usually doubt everything is included but there are reviews from tripadvisor and get along with friends so we decided to give it a chance. All-inclusive a la carte and 7-month-old son in the heated swimming pool I am also busy with this. When they arrived, it was the first time they opened the service and the service was absolutely impeccable. This has always been the case during this hotel and during your stay. Attentive and friendly staff (more than they need to do). Swimming pool A 7-month-old baby is suitable for cold weather when heated outdoors. There are many sunbeds around the very clean swimming pool. The first-come-first-served and sunbeds are very happy to see that they are not using towels to occupy guests at dawn. A small disadvantage The waiter by the pool needs more. The staff on duty extended the distance too far. Buffet Good choice, clean and fresh. Can be repeated. They are really one of the best baby food and premium mixed meals. Ordering food is good. A Greek restaurant is the best. The great hotel customer service is surprisingly amazing with the waitress of every employee, the staff to the pool to the management. Ikos’ internal employee training strategies are accurate.

Eng: Great value! This is a great value for money in the market. You still need to be prepared, although you can also buy more!

review: 出色的  雖然我是一個大風扇的加拿大航空,國泰航空是一個檔次。 我們發現整個機組人員是非常樂於助人,有禮貌和友好。 他們讓我們在  優異的飛行體驗。 有兩件事我覺得特別mentionable。 洗手間裏每隔一小時都會有人打掃。 他們有賣新鮮的蘋果。 棒極了。 這是一個航空公司的我會想盡各種辦法重新  預訂。
Eng: Outstanding Although I am a big fan of Air Canada, Cathay Pacific is a class. We found the entire crew to be very helpful, polite and friendly. They give us an excellent flying experience. There are two things that I think are particularly mentionable. Every hour in the bathroom is cleaned. They sell fresh apples. Excellent. This is an airline. I will try my best to rebook.

review: 非常舒適的旅行  我們乘坐的從澳大利亞到英國經濟最近通過香港。 我們都是70和擁擠的經濟艙提供的不是我們這些天。   讓我印象深刻的是有舒適的椅子和額外的伸腿空間可以讓我們伸展了,而且真的很放鬆的腿睡了很長時間。 有很多小的額外讓我們很是感激但是舒適度級別的時候就是最重要的。   豪華經濟艙是值得多花些錢？ 你Betcha。 我也有機會去散步回來的通過經濟和一眼疲憊的乘客在他們後面擠在一張座位讓我毫不懷疑我們是做出了正確的選擇。   當然,這不是我們住過的這類一樣舒適商務頭等艙是過幾次但是對我們來說足夠了。
Eng: Very comfortable travel The economy we traveled from Australia to the UK recently passed through Hong Kong. We are all 70 and the crowded economy class does not provide us these days. What impressed me is that there are comfortable chairs and extra legroom to allow us to stretch, and the really relaxed legs sleep for a long time. There are a lot of small extras that we are very grateful for, but it is the most important at the comfort level. Is Premium Economy Class worth the extra money? You Betcha. I also had the opportunity to go back for a walk through the economy and a tired passenger squeezed into a seat behind them made me have no doubt that we made the right choice. Of course, this is not as comfortable as the first class business we have stayed in. It was a few times but it was enough for us.

review: 可能是香港最大的購物中心  我在1983年首次參觀這個購物中心。從那時起，它經歷了許多翻新和改造。今天，它有大約450到500家商店，餐飲店  可能是香港最大的購物中心了。這些店都分佈在5至6個購物區域。雖然這個購物中心非常全面，但我比較喜歡常去的某些商店：160多年曆史的專賣零售百貨商店，精品超市和某些美容個人護理商店。儘管我對這個購物中心比較有興趣，我卻討厭人群  大量遊客漫無目的地鑽，有些人甚麼都不買，但大聲說話， 亂丟垃圾。為了避開人群，我會很早來，或好好計劃到要尋找商店的路線。
Eng: Probably the largest shopping mall in Hong Kong. I first visited this shopping mall in 1983. Since then, it has undergone many renovations and renovations. Today, it has about 450 to 500 stores, and the restaurant is probably the largest shopping mall in Hong Kong. These stores are distributed in 5 to 6 shopping areas. Although this shopping mall is very comprehensive, I prefer certain shops that I often visit: 160-year-old specialty retail department stores, boutique supermarkets, and certain beauty and personal care stores. Although I am more interested in this shopping mall, I hate the crowd. A large number of tourists are aimlessly drilling, some people do not buy anything, but they speak loudly and litter. In order to avoid the crowd, I will come early or plan well to find the route to the store.

review: 不會再搭  期望越大，失望越大，對這航空不再給予任何希望。以往不時都選擇乘搭國泰航空，最近給我的經驗使我完全失望。
Eng: No longer will it take more expectations, greater disappointment, no more hope for this aviation. I used to fly Cathay Pacific from time to time, and the experience I have given me recently completely disappointed me.

review: 服務好  第一次搭乘國泰航空，搭成經濟艙，機上餐好吃，有冰淇淋、細麵、主餐等，服務人員親切，但講話人多有點吵，位置比較小，報到時把護照與機票給服務人員會迅速處理，
Eng: Good service The first time I took Cathay Pacific to take the economy class, the meal on board was delicious, ice cream, vermicelli, main meals, etc. The service staff were kind but the talkers were a bit noisy and the location was relatively small. The ticket will be processed quickly by the service staff,

review: 標準港式服務  77W經濟艙都是標準的333布局，但是對比其他航司，國泰的座位會多出1cm左右，不要小看這一點，在長途航線會讓乘坐舒適度提高不少，尤其在抵達目的地的最後2小時，這也是我長途旅行都會首選國泰的原因之一。機艙不算新但也沒有讓人不覺得舒服的地方，整體保養和清潔度算比較高。
Eng: The standard Hong Kong-style service 77W economy class is the standard 333 layout, but compared with other airlines, Cathay Pacific will have about 1cm more seats. Don’t underestimate this. On long-haul routes, it will improve the comfort of the ride, especially on arrival. The last 2 hours of the destination is one of the reasons why I will always choose Cathay for long-distance travel. The cabin is not new but there is no uncomfortable place, the overall maintenance and cleanliness is relatively high.

review: 很棒的服務,美味的食物  物有所值  這是我去過的最物有所值的地方航空公司。 食物非常好。 服務上。 唯一的缺點就是沒有經過訓練的員工在登機的時間。 他們的慢也不上心。
Eng: Great service, delicious food Value for money This is the best value local airline I have visited. The food is very good. Service. The only drawback is that there is no time for trained employees to board the plane. Their slowness doesn't matter.

review: 2）客服打掃人員服務務態度很差，臨時來敲門，臨時就要進來打掃。請她等我們五分鐘，回我們她很忙

review: 房間拖鞋質素頗高

review: 房間有潮濕味

review: 購物的好地方  你可以找到很多東西都能夠輕鬆訪問和價格合理的有許多街頭食品吃的方面是你可以嚐到很多的經歷
Eng: Great place to shop You can find a lot of things that are easily accessible and reasonably priced There are many street food eating aspects that you can taste a lot of experience

review: 前台職員態度甚差

review: 飛機延誤五小時,

review: 非常糟糕的一趟旅程連一杯水也沒喝到餐點還沒吃完就收走了無言以對這樣的服務我也是笑笑的要不是訂不到票也不會選擇這家差勁
Eng: A very bad trip. I didn’t even drink a glass of water before I finished the meal, so I took it speechless. I was also smiling at this service. I wouldn’t choose this if I couldn’t book a ticket.

review: 能夠感受到地勤與空勤組員用心的服務  一直以來長途旅行只選擇國泰，因為本身也是馬可波羅會員，很感謝國泰對會員的重視，不管是報到或登機都能省去許多等待時間，機上空服員的照顧也能感覺到國泰的服務真的很棒

I am grateful to Cathay for the importance of the members. Whether it is check-in or boarding, you can save a lot of waiting time. Can also feel that Cathay Pacific’s service is really great

review: 不錯  我們之前國泰的飛機去羅馬的時候,我們的座位上飛機很糟糕因爲他們實際上並沒有躺在這種情況下。 這次在倚靠在座位通常和我可以說是非常好的經驗

review: 網紅設計，歷史改造。  一間網紅飯店，本港新開，最近因為香港旅遊淡季，2000一晚還算價格OK。位置非常便利，基本可以步行10分鐘內到中環購物中心、太古廣場等，離太平山都很近。

The location is very convenient, you can basically walk to Central Shopping Mall and Pacific Place within 10 minutes, very close to Taiping Mountain.

review: 服务很好  上个月刚七月。 我和我老婆飞往香港的国泰航空公司和我们预定的是豪华经济舱座位。 空间中的12个月的,我们尝试了国泰航空公司商务舱（曼谷）以及他们的经济座位（高雄）。 因此。 我相信我会做一个很准确的评估和座位国泰航空公司的班机服务。  在前面的座位上而言,你所付的就是你得到的是一个实际存在的问题。 至于服务,在个人层面上。 我觉得这里的服务有点像高级经济和经济（例如.. 他们不为你提供气泡酒的钱,只是为了商务级别的,我觉得这是令人费解的）。  我的建议是：
Eng: The service was good last July. My wife and I flew to Hong Kong's Cathay Pacific and we booked a premium economy seat. For 12 months in space, we tried Cathay Pacific Business Class (Bangkok) and their economy seats (Kaohsiung). therefore. I believe I will do a very accurate assessment and seat service for Cathay Pacific flights. As far as the front seat is concerned, what you pay is what you get is a real problem. As for services, on a personal level. I think the service here is a bit like high-end economy and economy (for example... they don't provide you with sparkling wine money, just for business level, I think it is puzzling). my suggestion is:

review: 舒適的飛行體驗  舒適的飛行體驗，其實在你上機之前已經開始；今次幸運的坐上商務艙就能夠享用他的貴賓室，我來到他們最大的貴賓室THE PIER，這裏相當大，有閱讀區，工作間，茶室，麵坊，酒吧，熱食吧枱，咖啡車。 麵坊的名物擔擔麵，在湯底裏下了功夫，好吃；熱食水準一般，但咖啡很不錯，能夠有舒適的環境工作或放鬆太好了；還可以使用淋浴間洗澡，飲杯茶再上機。 上機了，空中服務員便親切的服務我們，每次上菜都會稱呼我的姓氏，還會不時遞上飲品，晚上可以平躺睡覺，睡覺醒來吃過早餐便到目的地了。
Eng: Comfortable flight experience The comfortable flight experience actually started before you got on the plane; this time, if you were lucky to sit in the business class, you can enjoy his VIP room. I came to their largest VIP room, THE PIER, which is quite large. Reading area, workshop, tea room, noodle shop, bar, hot bar, coffee cart. The noodle shop's famous thing, Dandan noodles, has worked hard in the soup and it is delicious; the hot food is average, but the coffee is very good, and it is great to work or relax in a comfortable environment; you can also use the shower to take a shower and drink a cup Tea again on the machine. When I got on the plane, the flight attendant served us kindly. Every time I served, my surname would be called, and I would also hand over drinks from time to time. I could lie down and sleep at night. When I woke up, I ate breakfast and arrived at my destination.

review: 環境舒適
Eng: Comfortable environment

review: 沒有訂房時說的浴缸
Eng: No bathtub when booking

review: 國泰航空  反面意見： 通宵航班提供的飱盒只有一盒250毫升的檸檬茶及曲奇並之類的小食，瓶裝水及汽水等一律欠奉。請提醒國泰它們不是亷航，機票價錢亦不亷宜，但服務卻一直倒退......
Eng: Cathay Pacific’s negative opinion: The overnight box provides only a box of 250ml lemon tea and snacks such as cookies, bottled water and soda. Please remind Cathay Pacific that they are not low-cost airlines and the airfare is not cheap, but the service has been going backwards...

review: 很棒的經歷的是經濟類  我總是選擇了國泰航空迪拜國際機場  馬尼拉  迪拜國際機場的航班因爲我剛剛已經很舒適。   我從來沒有經歷過任何延誤或行李索賠時遇到的任何問題。   他們的員工總是會準備好滿足你的需求。   選擇在過道的座位能享受到更多的空間。
Eng: The great experience is the economic class. I always choose Cathay Pacific Dubai International Airport Manila Dubai International Airport because I have just been comfortable. I have never experienced any delays or any problems with baggage claims. Their employees will always be ready to meet your needs. Choose a seat in the aisle to enjoy more space.

review: 感覺越來越好的航空公司  本班航班是與馬來西亞航空聯營的班機，空姐空少亦非常熱心協助我們，由於我們一行有十四人，地勤人員協助我們盡量坐在一起。是次航班使用A343飛行，艙內設備較舊，有幾個坐位都未能差電。空中服務員得知後亦貼心的協助我們使用他們的差電位置。  除此以外，座位間距亦十分理想，四小時的行程很快便到達。
Eng: Airlines that feel better and better This flight is a joint flight with Malaysia Airlines. The flight attendant and the flight attendant are also very enthusiastic to assist us. Since we have 14 people in the party, the ground crew assist us to sit together as much as possible. This flight uses A343 flight, the equipment in the cabin is relatively old, and several seats have failed to make a difference. The flight attendant, when informed, also assisted us to use their differential location. In addition, the seat spacing is also very ideal, and the four-hour trip will soon arrive.

review: 亞洲素食好吃😋  以往訂素食餐都要特地打電話，這次我下載了國泰航空的app , 不但可以輕鬆預辦登機，更方便的是選擇座位及特別餐！  亞洲素食餐超好吃的！
Eng: Asian vegetarian food is delicious 😋 In the past, when ordering vegetarian meals, I had to make a special call. This time I downloaded the Cathay Pacific app. Not only can I easily pre-board, but it is more convenient to choose seats and special meals! Asian vegetarian meal is super delicious!

review: 1燈光昏暗，設施老舊
Eng: 1 The lights are dim and the facilities are old

review: 價錢貴得離地，可能假日吧！

review: 服務人員貼心、到位  國泰航空長程線航班HKGORD空服人員的服務很不錯，不會太過殷切、反而是剛剛好。長程航班經濟艙餐點也在水準之上，熄燈後也會在galley備有許多好吃的小點心、水果可以恣意拿取。
Eng: The service staff are attentive and in place Cathay Pacific's long-haul flight HKGORD flight attendant service is very good, not too eager, but just right. Meals in economy class on long-haul flights are also above the standard. After turning off the lights, there will also be many delicious snacks and fruits available in galley.

review: 旅客很喜歡  女人街是不小旅客如果來到香港的話，必要經過和來看看的地方。女人街有不同類型的商品，如衣服﹑飾物等。不過個人值得一提的是女人街附近和旁邊都有很多很便宜又好吃的餐廳，如果來到以街除了逛街之外，不如也來到吃一餐平價的地道的東西吧！
Eng: Travelers love Ladies' Street is a place where small travellers must go and see if they come to Hong Kong. Ladies Market has different types of goods, such as clothes and accessories. However, it is worth mentioning that there are many cheap and delicious restaurants near and near Ladies Street. If you come to Yijie, in addition to shopping, it is better to come to eat a cheap authentic thing!

review: 完全的放鬆  我們剛從一個美妙的假期在Olivia。 我們沒有任何期待,其他比我們的親密的朋友體驗了它的姐妹酒店大洋洲。 當我們到達時,我們被帶到了在美麗,新的,這家酒店很寬敞而且很受歡迎  真的太美了。   從我們到達的那一刻開始的時候照顧和周到的工作人員會儘力滿足你的爭議性。 通過從行李搬運工到窗臺的服務和在漂亮的餐廳裏的女服務員。 這裏的工作人員竭盡全力讓我們感覺managarial VIP； 尤其是Timos和George。   我們家有兩個房間； 一間小屋（配有一個陽臺,有桌子和椅子兩個太陽躺椅）和一個最高的雙人間在酒店本身。 這兩個房間設備齊全,舒適和豪華  最重要的是我在我們的房間裏空調都特別棒！ 此外,我們的房間有一個很大的迷你酒吧的軟飲料和含酒精飲料每天都補充選擇不收費。   泳池很漂亮而且有充足的躺椅。 最好的一點是酒店的私人海灘最多10米之遙的主泳池。 在海灘上我們享受了一個明智的服務從海灘的工作人員讓我們在食物和飲料全天不知疲倦地確保我們度過了美好的時光。  這個假期真是一次難忘的體驗和我們有很多美好的回憶和我們一定會再回來！  家庭Sosna
Eng: Total relaxation We just started from a wonderful holiday in Olivia. We had no expectations, other than our close friends experienced its sister hotel Oceania. When we arrived, we were taken in the beautiful, new, this hotel is spacious and very popular It is really beautiful. From the moment we arrived, the caring and attentive staff will do their best to satisfy your controversy. review: 亮點： 加熱的室外泳池和專門餐廳  提供的許多的正面的評論ikos olivia是足夠了。 但房間還有優化以及希望酒店管理會作出一些改善以下提到的缺點。  這完全翻新酒店（根據谷歌地球這是以前稱爲Gerakina海灘）由一個主樓4層3和雞翅和相當數量的平房,延伸出一個巨大的地形。 根據預訂的。 com, 295間客房均可用。 有一個小的停車場在附近的主建築。 不幸的是它缺乏的是合適的掉頭。 它值得指出的是您不需要一定要穿ai手鐲也在這家酒店和毛巾可用但不顯示某種形式的授權的信用卡都是非常方便的功能。 但是走的時候要小心酒店和它的周圍的環境有很大一部分不是很突出的一小步一小步地標記並因此構成一定的安全風險。  大約45分鐘車程的ikos olivia馬其頓馬其頓機場。 旅行時間到市中心的兩倍長的時間可能是因爲有很多的交通擁堵。 訪問ikos olivia應通過格拉克尼路標的主幹道上。  員工的友好是大家有目共睹的。 四個專門的服務是很棒的餐廳,雖然味道落後於。 等待的時間可能會很長的飲料,在一個案例中我們的桌子不是提供所有。 不能將其評估結果如果這些問題從一個無精打采的少數員工或從組織的缺點。 但是這個問題似乎一個永久因爲已經有一個類似去年的客人的投訴。 我們的客房服務也不是很滿意的時候接待處的工作人員及時的服務承諾的現實是不同的。 響應時間報告問題時的電視或要求更換擴展電池很弱很慢。 還補充化妝品有時被人遺忘。  飯都是在專門的餐廳都很棒（不會額外增加費用）和最大的主餐廳提供的食物非常不錯,太。 預訂的時候有點困難被證明是在專門的餐廳因爲很顯然他們很搶手。 當試圖預訂在我們到的第二天應該是一切都預訂滿了,但是我們最終還是會鍥而不捨的每個4餐廳裏吃晚餐。 你也可以預訂兩個餐廳裏的晚餐提供傳統的希臘美食格拉克尼。 在這種情況下他們會給你一張酒店的。 我們去了Mouragio可以推薦。

However, there are room optimizations and hope that the hotel management will make some improvements to the disadvantages mentioned below. This completely renovated hotel (according to Google Earth which was formerly known as Gerakina Beach) consists of a main building with 4 floors 3 and chicken wings and a considerable number of bungalows, extending a huge terrain. According to the reservation. com, 295 rooms are available. There is a small parking lot in the main building nearby. Unfortunately, what it lacks is a proper U-turn. review: 很棒的家庭酒店房間有一些小小的改進   剛從一個美妙的家庭假期ikos olivia得很開心的在我們一行人中的所有成員。 事實上我們的祖父母以至於留在幸福的淚水。   這家酒店的裝修風格和周圍環繞着蔥鬱的修剪整齊的花園和一個比例的感覺寬敞又都在短暫步行距離內。 工作人員非常友好和開朗的擔心您的住宿。 無限的生活方式的強制性的全包套餐是非常划算的了這裏的高質量和美味的餐點,飲料和提供的服務一點也不像一個假日套餐您可能其它地方的體驗地中海。   自助和四個按菜單點菜的餐廳都提供了非常棒的新鮮的食物和葡萄酒的一個很好的標準。 泳池和海灘都非常漂亮而且維護得很好,是很棒的兒童俱樂部和保姆服務包括天氣的一切幾乎都是完美的從開始到結束。   住在議事廳（姐妹度假村顯然）兩年前我會說ikos olivia提供性價比更高的邊緣和海灘俱樂部爲我多個方麵包括房間的質量。   很少的有時會出現故障或餐館裏有一個游泳池附近的飲料在這樣的環境中會不缺少或只去。   自助的座位有點混亂了半個學期,那裏有一羣人就選擇他們自己的座位。 更強的房子前的需要和可能是一個額外的成員在這裏和那裏的工作人員等。   晚上的娛樂活動應該可以改善和協調。 不顯示晚上帶着孩子跑來跑去就缺乏氣氛下了一個黑暗的舞臺上的標籤和邁克爾傑克遜致敬的dj晚上表演節目的流行用他自己的噩夢般的驚險刺激他的嚴重。 我們選擇了態度真是太糟糕了真的很不錯雖然！   如果我們是非常挑剔的一個音樂基座會很好但是房間裏的插頭和英語usb插座是個不錯的做法。   強烈推薦給家庭,因爲這確實是一個適合情侶和慎重的家庭度假勝地。 建議爲所有客人可能會嘗試和預訂餐館在你去之前,它幾乎是在到達的時候已經太晚了。   總之度假村的一顆明珠和很可能會再來這裏或者到新長大了當它將在2018。

review: 國泰航空公司退步了  長榮航空商務䱽，比國泰航空好得多多。二天前剛剛搭乘國泰航空，從香港到紐約，商務艙的座位，和20 年前一樣，沒有變化、服務品質差，沒有睡衣拖鞋。餐飲也不不盡理想。

review: 好的,不會說很好的  這是一家漂亮的酒店有可愛的花園和加熱的游泳池。  我們很喜歡住在這裏,但不是因爲它將是我們想的那麼好。 也許是因爲我們看了評論後期待的太多了。  我們直接與酒店進行預訂並支付了13路ikos進一步加強。 在辦理入住手續的工作人員要求全額付款的平衡。 通常你得付錢住在退房的時候,所以有點小失望的開端。   工作人員都很友好,樂於助人但有時一些工作人員不是很周到尤其是餐廳在早餐和午餐時間左右。 可能是因爲我們去的時候酒店非常繁忙。  主自助餐廳的食物很不錯。 在我們最喜歡的是亞洲餐廳點菜,食物棒極了。 法國餐廳也很好。 意大利和希臘最多算是一般。  海灘的沙灘不是因爲照片。  內陸景觀的房間可以俯瞰到下面的停車場和主要道路。 所以儘量不要在房間的土地如果可能的話。  總的來說這是一個非常不錯的住宿和值得我們所付的價格在這個季節的開始。 我不知道這是否是物超所值的價格雖然盛夏。
Eng: Okay, won't say very good. This is a beautiful hotel with lovely gardens and heated swimming pool. We love staying here, but not because it will be as good as we think. Maybe it's because we looked too much after reading the comments. We made a reservation directly with the hotel and paid 13 road ikos to further strengthen. The staff at check-in requires a balance of full payment. Usually you have to pay to stay at check-out, so a little disappointment starts. The staff are very friendly and helpful but sometimes some staff are not very attentive especially the restaurant around breakfast and lunch time. Probably because the hotel was very busy when we went. The food in the main cafeteria is very good. The food we order in our favorite restaurant in Asia is awesome. The French restaurant is also very good. Italy and Greece are at best average. The beach is not because of photos. Inland view rooms overlook the parking lot and main road below. So try not to land in the room if possible. Overall it was a very good stay and the price we paid was at the beginning of this season. I don't know if this is a good value for money though midsummer.

review: 大大的驚喜  我們不喜歡常規全包的酒店,但是在讀了關於這家酒店的一篇文章在一本雜誌去年四月4我們預訂了一個帶着我們的兒子。   我們都很驚訝,但是我們也不只我們作爲父母孩子都非常喜歡。 雖然全包的酒店,這裏不是那種在任何方面都是這樣的,食物的質量和服務水平都很棒。 即便是我們這裏一切都非常乾淨,因爲很難應付的客人,沒有任何意見的！   我們去了水療中心還是會很驚訝我們的待遇和高水平的接觸包括非常友好的員工。 （感覺就像是我們在希臘的神）   當我們到達的時候,我們就馬上開始當我們遇到simona完美的旅程。 我們幾乎都有這種感覺是有人惡作劇是因爲它與我們真是太好了！   最後但並非最不重要,注意到酒店的經理幫助我們做了一個關於dirk吃新鮮鱸魚。 令我們驚訝的是我們預訂的那個晚上在一家意大利餐廳點菜被重新安排在海灘上的餐廳供應自制的dirk的整個鱸魚6人信手拈來。   回家後我們馬上就預訂了這個假期我們秋天的假期和現在我們甚至會帶我們的朋友！

Although it is an all-inclusive hotel, it is not the kind in all respects, the quality of food and service level are excellent. Even if we are here, everything is very clean, because it is difficult to cope with the guests, there is no opinion! We went to the spa and would still be surprised that our treatment and high level of contact included very friendly staff. (It feels like our God in Greece) When we arrived, we immediately started the perfect journey when we met Simona. We almost all have the feeling that someone is a prank because it is so good with us! Last but not least, noticed that the hotel manager helped us make a dirk about eating fresh sea bass. To our surprise, the order we ordered in an Italian restaurant was rearranged at the restaurant on the beach. The whole perch served with homemade dirk was served by 6 people. We booked this holiday immediately after we returned home and now we will even bring our friends!

The typical method is that each team sends a representative to help everyone queue up. When the team arrives, the entire group will pass by. I didn't even bother to play, it was really terrible.

review: 非常友好的工作人員  這趟航班是非常有幫助和友好的工作人員。 他們經常停下來問我們是否需要任何東西在飛行的過程中。   這裏的食物是一種很高的標準和經過的飛機很快還要因爲不錯的電影都有。   我確實覺得這裏的音樂也是一個小的可以有更多的當前日期和音樂。   所有的員工都會在所有可能意味着我們還會選擇這家航空公司的話我們會有空房。

review: 大部分機型新、電影選擇多、航班選擇多  台港航段雖然飛行時間很短（大約一小時2040分左右），但是座椅舒適程度還有機型新舊感受還是有差的，雖然CX台港航段的餐食真的不怎麼樣，但是也就一個多小時的飛行時間，其實有沒有吃，對我來說是真的沒有什麼太大差別，主要座椅舒適程度夠，能在短暫飛行時間有辦法適度的入眠休息倒是很重要的，每搭國泰航空的航班都可以讓我安心舒適的入眠，所以經常選擇過太搭乘的，若不想睡覺，機上的娛樂系統譬如電影，也都是很新的，搭乘了很多國泰的航班，還沒遇到過一台飛機沒有娛樂系統的，此外，國泰的航點也是遍及全世界各地，這也是我愛搭國泰航空的原因。

Although the flight time is very short (about one hour and 2040 minutes), the seat comfort and the old and new models are still poor, although the CX station The meals in the Hong Kong flight segment are really not good, but in terms of more than an hour of flight time, whether it is actually eaten or not is really not much different for me. The main seat is comfortable enough to be short-lived. It is very important to have a way to sleep properly during the flight time. Every Cathay Pacific flight can let me sleep comfortably, so I often choose to travel too much. If I don’t want to sleep, the entertainment system on board, such as movies, is also all It's very new. I've taken many Cathay Pacific flights. I haven't encountered a plane without an entertainment system. In addition, Cathay Pacific's destinations are also all over the world, which is why I love Cathay Pacific.

review: 今次浴室清潔度麻麻，見到有毛髮；和我覺得雪櫃太細，放枝500ml樽裝飲品放不下，要橫放在上格

review: 豪華的假期  我和我的妻子剛剛從一個很棒的周假期的完美在Olivia。 我們可以看到它會很好因爲我們一進去就前臺,迎接我們的是一瓶香檳和一個微笑,辦理入住手續很快,然後我們被帶到我們的房間在一個高爾夫球車,哇,是一個可愛的房間,有品位的裝修和一塵不染的乾淨而且很大。 房間裏的迷你酒吧每天都會加滿,包括小瓶葡萄酒和烈酒。 這裏的溫泉也非常漂亮,所以安靜和讓人放鬆的好,它有一個室內游泳池還去外面,一個桑拿浴室,蒸汽浴室的熱帶雨林式淋浴。 我們做了一個按摩真是太令人振奮的,而且物有所值。 有一個很棒的吃東西的地方包括4個La '店。 所有餐廳都有一個廣泛的美酒和美味的食物,我們主要是吃的口味,但是也有早餐都在普羅旺斯,亞洲是我們最喜歡的一個La '點。 24小時客房服務也可以新秩序都是在包的如果你覺得懶,但是我們並不擔心。  泳池佈局很好和1有一個泳池酒吧,那裏有很多太陽浴牀供人們使用,和飲料都買下了你的太陽躺椅不必移動,酒店有一個可愛的海灘和海灘酒吧,但是我們只去過那裏好幾次因爲我們是在一個慵懶的週末主要是在泳池邊。  祝賀經理, Timo先生和他的團隊操作這樣一個很棒的酒店,我們希望明年還能再來
Eng: Luxurious holiday My wife and I have just perfected from a great weekly holiday in Olivia. We could see it would be good as we went to the front desk as soon as we entered, we were greeted with a bottle of champagne and a smile, the check-in was quick, then we were taken to our room in a golf cart, wow, it was Lovely room, tastefully decorated and spotlessly clean and large. The mini bar in the room fills up every day and includes small bottles of wine and spirits. The hot springs here are also very beautiful, so it is quiet and relaxing, it has an indoor swimming pool to go outside, a sauna, a rainforest shower with steam bath. We did a massage and it was so exciting, and the value for money. There is a great eating place including 4 La' shops. All restaurants have a wide range of fine wines and delicious food, we mainly eat the taste, but there are breakfasts in Provence, Asia is one of our favorite La's. 24 hours room service can also be included in the new order if you feel lazy, but we are not worried. The pool layout is very good and 1 has a pool bar, there are many sun beds for people to use, and drinks are bought. Your sun loungers do not have to move, the hotel has a lovely beach and beach bar, but we have only been there Several times because we were on a lazy weekend mainly by the pool. Congratulations to the manager, Mr. Timo and his team operate such a great hotel, we hope to come again next year

review: 沒什麼好擔心的  讀了一些負面的評論前國泰航空的飛機但是我們的航班從香港和悉尼從平靜的。 我是帶着我的女兒和孫子。 這裏的服務也是很好的（員工和食物）,獲取經濟舒適的座位,是世界一流的娛樂系統和我們的時間。 沒有什麼可抱怨的。  對我們來說很棒的前臺辦理入住登記在九龍車站發現航空公司在香港中心地帶的旅行之前去機場,手裏拿着的登機卡,沒有我們的大行李。 很棒的系統。

The service here is also very good (staff and food), access to economical and comfortable seats, a world-class entertainment system and our time. There is nothing to complain about. It was a great front desk for us to check in at the Kowloon Station and found the airline went to the airport before traveling in the heart of Hong Kong. The boarding card I had in my hand did not have our big luggage. Great system.

review: 地勤人员对客人的態度要多加訓练  我是馬可波羅綠卡會員，我10月14日帶著女兒和母親去東京，當時我們排隊預備登机時一位女士 E.李（忘了她的名字）來找我們檢查我們的護照,她說馬可波羅綠卡會員不能带同任何非會員登機，我向她解釋我和7歲的孩子以及80歲的母親一起旅行，請問我是否要我的女兒自己排隊, 還是讓媽媽去自己排队？她以一種非常不愉快的方式回答（沒有目光接觸，沒有笑容）這次她給我一個例外.....哇!非常感謝你的善意...... !!!!!!! ！我當時不想和她爭論，因為以前已经聽到過很多關於CX員工態度的負面評論。
Eng: Ground crews have to train their attitude towards guests more. I am a Marco Polo Green Card member. I took my daughter and mother to Tokyo on October 14th, when we lined up to prepare for boarding a lady E. Li (forgot her name) came Looking for us to check our passport, she said that Marco Polo Green Card members cannot take any non-members on board. I explained to her that I was traveling with a 7-year-old child and an 80-year-old mother. May I ask my daughter to line up, or Let mom go in line? She answered in a very unpleasant way (no eye contact, no smile) This time she gave me an exception... Wow! Thank you very much for your kindness...!!!!!!!!! I didn't want to argue with her at that time because I had heard many negative comments about the attitude of CX employees before.

review: book左一張特大雙人大床，比左2張床，話冇大床
Eng: Book a king-size double bed on the left, 2 beds more than the left, then no big bed

review: 景色是真的真的非常美，但交通太過於不便利，就算搭計程車上山還要慎防司機哄抬價格。下山即便要搭計程車也是得排隊等候，非常耗時。也因遊客非常多，上山後觀景台也是很擁擠。
Eng: The scenery is really really beautiful, but the traffic is too inconvenient, even if you take a taxi up the mountain, you must be careful to prevent drivers from driving up the price. Even if you want to take a taxi down the mountain, you have to wait in line, which is very time-consuming. Due to the large number of tourists, the observation deck after the mountain is also crowded.

review: 香港最大的購物中心  根據門房,這是香港最大的購物中心有700商店差不多。 它是非常好的,乾淨整潔的購物中心。 它坐落在晨練的市場和購物中心（海洋購物中心）是連接到另一個。
Eng: The largest shopping mall in Hong Kong According to the concierge, this is the largest shopping mall in Hong Kong with almost 700 shops. It is very nice, clean and tidy shopping center. It is located in the morning exercise market and the shopping center (Ocean Mall) is connected to another.

review: 血拼熱點  海港城名店林立, 在香港會出現的國際名牌店也會在這兒見到 如果你的購物慾望很強, 不妨在這逛逛, 很容易便會花上一整天
Eng: Shopping hotspots There are many famous shops in Harbour City, and international famous brand shops that will appear in Hong Kong will also be seen here. If you have a strong shopping desire, you may wish to shop here, it will be easy to spend a whole day

review: 這間酒店對待顧客非常冷漠，房間老舊不是3星級酒店該有的水準，這家酒店以後絕不會再入住

review: 不能睡覺  這些人是不是從中國來的（PRC）播放的打牌的時候半夜在作鬥爭的打擊一個惱人的噪音。   那些站在我後面的人不停地在中國播放的卡雖然發出扣上安全帶的標誌。 沒有要求他們坐下來等候打架！ ！ ！ ！ ！ ！
Eng: Can't sleep. Are these people from China (PRC) playing cards to fight an annoying noise in the middle of the night? Those who stood behind me kept playing cards in China, although they issued a sign to fasten their seat belts. They are not required to sit down and wait for a fight! ! ! ! ! !

review: 不知道這有什麼好大驚小怪的  這是一個非常一般的市場有太多的不買其它的比便宜的紀念品和拷貝的dvd。 晚上我去的時候也是很清楚這是一個紅燈區。 避免去這家市場和其他的一個市場更好在香港島。

review: 床單 浴室不整潔

review: 一切都在一個地方  這種規格的商場就真的很令人印象深刻。 即使你不是購物的那種人,你一定要來這個地方與你的旅伴（s）。 你可以選擇坐在一個很漂亮的海港景色的同時享受露臺和其他的購物。
Eng: Everything is in one place. Shopping malls of this size are really impressive. Even if you are not the kind of person shopping, you must come to this place with your travel companion(s). You can choose to sit on a beautiful harbour view while enjoying the terrace and other shopping.

review: 幫助我餓了！  9小時想象了很少的食物,沒有咖啡或茶還有問他們要水。 這就是像國泰。 哦我忘了... 3我的家人在音頻輸出 6有缺陷的視覺系統和不得不要求重置系統兩次在飛行途中。
