review: 就是最棒的!！  我們住在一個小別墅可以欣賞美麗的海灘和一個華麗的五星級酒店,房間的裝飾還是比較平靜的attrracive和溫水泳池。 牀是一定要吃的和毛巾和洗漱用品的質量很好。 我們到達的時候發現了一瓶冰鎮香檳和菜的新鮮水果。 迷你酒吧和一個可愛的品牌會不斷有咖啡機。 周圍是一個大容量的顏色從灌木叢和植物,目前,大衆着橄欖橄欖樹。 這一切都是如此的翠綠而且維持得很好。 有很多活動在陸地和海灘和溫泉很安靜也很專業。 電動車始終可用如果你懶得走路和那裏的自行車對於那些精力更充沛。 這是一個適合小孩子可愛。 有很多事情要做,安全的海灘和希臘人喜歡孩子。  酒店的餐飲很棒。 主要的自助餐是我見過最大的種類。 我們才需要去看了纔會相信。 有四個餐廳提供按菜單點菜的餐廳都很好。 法國,亞洲,意大利和希臘。 很大和很棒的葡萄酒菜單。 總是有選擇的戶外和禮賓部都很冷靜文明。  我把最好的'直到最後。 這裏的工作人員。 從高級管理人員到客房服務。 他們都是一流的。 都是在做着他們最大的努力讓您的住宿特別。 這真是。 我們還會回來？ 哦。 謝謝你特地。
Eng: It's the best! We stayed in a small villa that can admire the beautiful beach and a gorgeous five-star hotel, the decoration of the room is still relatively calm attrracive and heated swimming pool. The bed is a must eat and the quality of towels and toiletries is very good. When we arrived we found a bottle of chilled champagne and fresh fruit from the dishes. Mini bars and a cute brand will always have coffee machines. Surrounded by a large volume of colors from bushes and plants, currently, olive trees are popular. All this is so green and well maintained. There are many activities on land and beaches and hot springs that are quiet and professional. Electric cars are always available if you are too lazy to walk and bikes there are more energetic for those. This is a cute for kids. There are many things to do, safe beaches and Greeks love children. The dining at the hotel is great. The main buffet is the largest variety I have ever seen. We only need to see to believe. There are four restaurants that offer a la carte menus. France, Asia, Italy and Greece. Very large and great wine menu. There are always choices outdoors and the concierge is very calm and civilized. I put the best' till the end. The staff here. From senior management to room service. They are all top-notch. They are doing their best to make your stay special. This is really. Will we come back? Oh. Thank you specifically.

review: 床睡覺舒适
Eng: Comfortable bed

review: 大,現代和乾淨的酒店適合所有的  這是我的購物中心一定要去當我去尖沙咀。 它的位置很便利,位於城市的心臟地帶。 你可以很容易地到達那裏乘坐地鐵,巴士或者天星小輪。 這裏很大,可能在香港最大的購物中心。 如果你是第一次去那的,但不要擔心你會很容易迷路,客戶服務團隊在商場裏都非常親切友好。 他們都很樂意幫助你找到您的目標位置存儲或顯示正確的方向。  這也是適合所有的人去參觀。 您可以從任何奢侈品名兒童玩具,你可以找到一切基本所商場裏。 您正在尋找某種時尚lcx嘗試的當地特產。 它的盡頭就是大海的大樓。 您自己或朋友買了一些紀念品。
Eng: Big, modern and clean hotel suitable for all This is my shopping center must go when I go to Tsim Sha Tsui. It is conveniently located in the heart of the city. You can easily get there by subway, bus or Star Ferry. It's huge here, probably in Hong Kong's largest shopping mall. If you are there for the first time, but don't worry that you will get lost easily. The customer service team is very friendly and friendly in the mall. They are happy to help you find your target location to store or display the correct direction. This is also suitable for all people to visit. You can find any luxury children's toys, you can find everything in the basic shopping mall. You are looking for some local specialty that some fashionable lcx try. At the end of it is the building of the sea. You or your friend bought some souvenirs.

review: 服務態度好，台灣香港航班最多。  搭乘國泰航空兩次，一次去義大利香港轉機，一次去香港。 感受到對搭乘旅客的用心，飛機上附有提供充電的插座，非常跟得上時代的腳步，很棒。 座位旁提供杯座的設計也很滿意。 線上訂位系統尚可，但是機場報到系統卻差強人意，不論是在桃園機場，還是香港都非常的慢，服務人員或許因為工作量大而影響服務態度，非常可惜 尤其是在香港機場快捷預掛行李時，線上預掛系統壞掉，現場排隊等了1.5小時。浪費了很多時間。
Eng: Service attitude is good, Taiwan and Hong Kong have the most flights. Take Cathay Pacific twice, once to transfer to Italy and Hong Kong, and once to Hong Kong. Feeling attentive to the passengers on board, the plane is equipped with a socket for charging, which is very up to date and is great. The design of the cup holder next to the seat is also very satisfactory. The online reservation system is acceptable, but the airport check-in system is not satisfactory. Both at Taoyuan Airport and Hong Kong are very slow. The service staff may affect the service attitude due to the heavy workload. It is a pity that the luggage is pre-checked quickly at the Hong Kong Airport. At that time, the online pre-hanging system broke down, and the line waited for 1.5 hours. A lot of time wasted.

review: 酒店里的免费早餐餐能够改进就更好了
Eng: The free breakfast meal in the hotel could be improved

review: 繁忙的紀念品市場  由於各種各樣的攤位，我們更喜歡寺廟街市場，但這仍然主要是紀念品和假貨等袋子。它可能很忙，但如果喜歡討價還價可以討價還價。我們看到大多數東西的價格下降了4050％。這不僅僅是一種文化體驗，更值得一遊。  我們的孩子們在市場盡頭的時候確實與一些食品攤的氣味有點掙扎，這些都不適合膽小的人。
Eng: Busy souvenir market Due to the variety of stalls, we prefer Temple Street Market, but this is still mainly bags of souvenirs and fakes. It may be busy, but you can bargain if you like to bargain. We saw that the price of most things fell by 4050%. This is not just a cultural experience, but also worth a visit. Our kids did struggle with the smell of some food stalls at the end of the market, these are not suitable for the timid.

review: 一個很棒的酒店  Ikos的olivia是從開始到結束。 這裏的員工很細心和樂於助人從開始的假期和總是隨時準備回答任何問題。 酒店本身非常舒適和房間都保持得很乾淨。 我肯定會推薦一個大海  房間能看到的風景真是美極了。   這裏的餐廳很棒  自助早餐是我最不喜歡的但是這是可以預期的。 我不會在室外用餐選擇食物很一般到過希臘和塞浦路斯最重要的是,他們是沒法比的。   海灘保持得很乾淨而且酒吧的工作人員很細心。 有一個僅供成人使用的區域也是非常不錯的酒店裏也有很多孩子  一個原因是我們不會再來這家酒店的。 什麼也不能做真正的酒店,我們喜歡大人  唯一的度假村。
Eng: A great hotel Ikos olivia is from start to finish. The staff here are very attentive and helpful from the beginning of the holiday and are always ready to answer any questions. The hotel itself is very comfortable and the rooms are kept very clean. I would definitely recommend a sea. The view from the room is really beautiful. The restaurant here is great. The buffet breakfast is my least favorite but this is to be expected. I don't choose to dine outdoors. Food is generally in Greece and Cyprus. The most important thing is that they are incomparable. The beach is kept clean and the bar staff is attentive. There is an area for adults only which is also very nice. There are also many children in the hotel. One reason is that we will not come to this hotel again. Nothing can be a real hotel, we like the only resort for adults.

review: 我同女兒睡大床起身後，發覺周身痕
Eng: After I got up in bed with my daughter, I noticed my body marks

review: 軟硬件都不錯，但細節還不夠完美！  第一次入住這家酒店，網上預定的，看了下是新開業的，照片感覺很高檔，很現代化！初到酒店，剛下taxi，就有迎賓幫我們拿行李，進門兩排工作人員一齊向我們打招呼，着實第一感覺被驚到，不過第一印象不錯，隨後辦理入住手續也很順利。來到房間後房間裝修風格是現代化的，黑色金色為主，兩扇大窗正對滙豐銀行大廈！酒店的設施還是很全，免費的礦泉水是玻璃瓶裝的，起初還以為收費的沒敢喝，膠囊咖啡，twg的茶包也是免費的！馬桶是自動的，不過太靈敏，經常自動開啟，補水，久了會覺得有點厭倦！最不滿意的是淋浴房，洗澡時候淋浴房門總是關不嚴實，淋浴房內外溫差使得淋浴房門總是被壓力頂開，還有就是淋浴房的排水，只能用形同虛設來形容。第一天洗澡時候，水漫過淋浴房，直至馬桶邊上，洗澡出來每一腳都踏在水上。心想是不是門沒關好的緣故。第二天洗澡更誇張，我把門用手巾卡住，不會被頂開了，誰知道洗澡出來，水漫的更厲害，一直漫到床邊，橫穿整個房間。於是忍不了了，立即通知酒店前台來看一下，我要求換房，這實在一片汪洋，無法入住了。好在酒店客戶經理立即安排人來維修，並給我昇級房間到一個更大更好的房型。同時第二天又送給我們一份招牌的巧克力作為補償！心情好很多。 總體評價這家酒店還不錯，服務和設施都挺好，就是設計的細節處理上，例如淋浴房的門和排水實在對不起這麼高檔的酒店和這麼高的價格！也希望酒店能夠盡改進設計細節，做到完美入住體驗！
Eng: The hardware and software are good, but the details are not perfect! I stayed in this hotel for the first time, I booked it online, and it looked like it was newly opened. The photos felt very high-end and very modern! When I first arrived at the hotel, just after I got off taxi, there was a welcome to help us with our luggage. The two rows of staff greeted us at the door. I was shocked at first, but the first impression was good. Then the check-in process was also smooth. After coming to the room, the decoration style of the room is modern, mainly black gold, and two large windows are facing the HSBC Bank Building! The hotel's facilities are still very complete. The free mineral water is bottled. At first, I thought that I didn't dare to drink it. The capsule coffee and twg tea bags are also free! The toilet is automatic, but it is too sensitive. It is often turned on automatically. It will feel a little tired after a long time! The most dissatisfied is the shower room. The shower room door is always closed tightly when taking a bath. The temperature difference between the inside and outside of the shower room keeps the shower room door open under pressure, and the drainage of the shower room can only be described as a fake. When taking a shower on the first day, the water overflowed the shower room until the edge of the toilet. Every foot came out of the bath and stepped on the water. I wondered if the door was not closed properly. The next day the bath was more exaggerated. I stuck the door with a handkerchief and it won’t be pushed open. Who knows that the bath came out, the water was more powerful, and it reached the bed and traversed the whole room. I couldn't bear it anymore. I immediately notified the hotel reception desk to take a look. I asked to change rooms. Fortunately, the hotel account manager immediately arranged for someone to repair, and upgraded my room to a larger and better room type. At the same time the next day we were given a signature chocolate as compensation! I feel much better. Overall evaluation This hotel is not bad, services and facilities are very good, that is, the details of the design, such as the shower door and drainage, I am really sorry for such a high-end hotel and such a high price! I also hope that the hotel can do its best to improve the design details to achieve a perfect stay experience!

review: 一個很棒的飛行與國泰（12h30）  優質的服務。 很舒服。 一切都是完美的。 特別重要的一整晚的飛行12小時和30分鐘的使用時間。
Eng: A great flight with excellent service from Cathay Pacific (12h30). Very comfortable. Everything is perfect. It is particularly important to use 12 hours and 30 minutes of flight time throughout the night.

review: 我們不喜歡它在所有  我們要從國泰航空卡塔爾航空的飛機上因爲我們被取消了。 這架飛機很擁擠。 食物不是很好。 整個平面聞起來像一個古老的中國餐廳。 這不是令人愉快的航班10小時糟糕的娛樂內容。 我不認爲我會再考慮這家航空公司的飛機上。
Eng: We don't like it at all. We have to take the plane from Cathay Pacific Qatar Airways because we were cancelled. The plane is crowded. The food is not very good. The whole plane smells like an old Chinese restaurant. This is not a bad 10-hour entertainment content for a pleasant flight. I don't think I will consider this airline's plane again.

review: 各種各樣的,和各種有趣！  廟街夜市只有幾個街區從我住的酒店和我第一次去我只是偶然發現了他們,但是我最後去的每晚都是我的住宿。 他們有各種各樣的食物,和其周圍的生活令人陶醉。   記得要討價還價就還是壞  大部分東西都是合理的,但是他們還可以降低。 開始通過提供50％的價格,儘量不要支付超過70  75％的原來的價格。 如果持有者的攤位很結實,威脅說要走。 更多的時候他們會很溫和因爲至少應該有一個攤位更多架完全相同的產品在市場上銷售。   很棒的地方去拿禮物給愛的人回家。
Eng: All kinds, and all kinds of fun! The Temple Street Night Market is only a few blocks from the hotel I stayed in and the first time I went. I just stumbled upon them, but the last night I went was my stay. They have a variety of food, and the life around them is intoxicating. Remember that bargaining is still bad. Most things are reasonable, but they can be lowered. Start by offering a 50% price and try not to pay more than 70 75% of the original price. If the holder’s booth is strong, he threatens to leave. More often they will be gentle because at least one stall should have more identical products on the market. Great place to go home with gifts for loved ones.

review: 很棒的服務和很棒的拖了這麼長時間的飛機  我們乘坐的是經濟艙我們從巴厘島到香港我們然後繼續。 我和老公都覺得這次飛行是很棒的。 在飛機上的工作人員如此樂於助人和細心！ 食物很好吃而且我們選擇了兩個座位非常靠後的飛機所以我們的房間裏。 我是5 ' 6和我可以很舒服地站在我的位子上和我的腿伸展。
Eng: Great service and great towed aircraft for so long. We were in economy class. We went from Bali to Hong Kong and then we continued. My husband and I thought this flight was great. The staff on the plane are so helpful and attentive! The food was delicious and we chose two planes with very rear seats so our room. I am 5'6 and I can stand comfortably on my seat and stretch my legs.

review: 專業，精緻的飛行體驗  機艙空間令人滿意，餐食也豐富可口，還有哈根達斯冰淇淋提供。提供免費的洗漱包。作為馬可波羅會的會員，感覺非常榮幸可以搭乘國泰的班機。機艙的溫度以及噪音控制的都不錯，在用完餐食之後，可以很好的休息。起飛前還提供歡迎飲料，有香檳，果汁等選擇，熱毛巾服務也很滿意。菜單印刷精良，總之非常滿意的一次旅行。
Eng: Professional, exquisite flight experience The cabin space is satisfactory, the meals are also rich and delicious, and Haagen-Dazs ice cream is provided. Provide free toiletries. As a member of Marco Polo Club, I feel very honored to take the Cathay Pacific flight. The temperature and noise control of the cabin are good, and you can rest well after using the meal. We also provide welcome drinks before departure, with champagne, juice and other options, and the hot towel service is also very satisfactory. The menu is well-printed, in short, a very satisfying trip.

review: turbulant但是很好  服務很好很滿意的和令人愉快的辦理登記入住的員工都要手工藝品。 服務速度很快而且很令人滿意,寬敞的座位都退出了經濟和食物真的是非常不錯。 總之是非常好的。
Eng: turbulant but very good The service is very good and the satisfied and pleasant check-in staff all need handicrafts. The service is fast and satisfactory, the spacious seats are out of the economy and the food is really very good. In short it is very good.

review: 睡床舒適，房間整潔，員工有禮。

review: 真是太好了  這絕不是僅僅是一個全包的酒店,真是令人難忘的美食體驗。 在我們來這裏的時候我們還是離開了8天1嘗試的餐廳,但我確信我們會做到這一點在我們的下一次旅行！ 我們無法相信酒店的全包套餐菜單,葡萄酒和烈酒的選擇。 我們的第一頓晚餐是在福斯科的意大利餐廳,我們在那裏連續3最後的晚餐。 韃靼牛排,鵝肝... 甚至自制比薩,令人難以忘懷。 我不能說那裏的食物沒完沒了的。 它簡直是太完美了。   我們住在主樓的普通的房間,非常乾淨,很棒的電視系統,無綫網速超快的（每個房間裏的轉發器）... 和我們也了解了在第二天的時候... 全套迷你吧,那裏是地獄也鬆動了壞了我們倆醒來都是去機場的路上在假期結束的時候。 但值得一提的是,對我們來說這是一個真正獨特的假日體驗,至少對於歐洲目的地旅遊,這是無與倫比的。
Eng: It's so nice This is by no means just an all-inclusive hotel, it's an unforgettable culinary experience. When we came here we still left the restaurant for 8 days and 1 try, but I am sure we will do it on our next trip! We can't believe the hotel's all-inclusive set menu, wine and spirits selection. Our first dinner was at the Italian restaurant in Fosco, where we had 3 last dinners in a row. Steak tartare, foie gras... Even homemade pizza is unforgettable. I cannot say that the food there is endless. It is simply perfect. We stayed in the common room in the main building, very clean, great TV system, super fast wifi (transponder in each room)... and we also got to know the next day... Full set of mini bar, where hell is also loose and broken. Both of us woke up on the way to the airport at the end of the holiday. But it is worth mentioning that this is a truly unique holiday experience for us, at least for European destination travel, it is unparalleled.

review: 很棒  但我们是一个尼机场被接走的私人车乘坐英国航空公司安排的酒店  45分钟就到。 酒店很现代,干净和时尚。 办理入住手续很快很简单。 我们被升级到了一间卧室的公寓,这是令人惊叹。 泳池很大很漂亮,只有一个成人游泳池。 有很多酒吧都有自己的特色。 餐厅食物都很棒。 你还有两个当地的餐馆吃饭的选择在两者都很好和更有特色的希腊文化。 我尤其喜欢酒店里你有一个很好的红酒的选择是包含在你的全包套餐。 我丈夫甚至允许进入酒窖的葡萄酒选择由他选择的令人惊叹的。 品牌的烈酒都是皇亲国戚。 这家酒店在海滩上所以你可以选择在您的指尖海景或游泳池都很好。 还有一个海滩上的部分只对成年人开放所以知道摔倒桶和小铲。 我相信这家酒店一切都想到了和我强烈推荐这家酒店。
Eng: Great but we are a private car picked up from the airport in 45 minutes in a hotel arranged by British Airways. The hotel is modern, clean and stylish. Check-in is quick and easy. We were upgraded to a one-bedroom apartment, which is amazing. The swimming pool is large and beautiful with only one adult swimming pool. There are many bars with their own characteristics. The food in the restaurant is great. You also have two local restaurants to eat in. Both are very good and have more distinctive Greek culture. I especially like that you have a good wine selection in the hotel that is included in your all-inclusive package. My husband even allowed to enter the wine cellar to choose the amazing selection by him. Brand spirits are relatives of the imperial family. This hotel is on the beach so you can choose the sea view or swimming pool at your fingertips are very good. There is also a part on the beach that is only open to adults so knowing to fall buckets and spades. I believe everything in this hotel is thought of and I highly recommend this hotel.

review: 家庭度假   5月24日到達,我們喜歡我們的房間能看到花園的景色的小屋,有很大的空間對於一個家庭來說  很多存儲這始終是個問題在度假。 寬敞的大浴室。 一切都很乾淨,外面的區域是一個很好的大小和孩子們喜歡吃一些空間來踢一個球。 房間收拾得很乾淨我們住在那裏的整個時間,因爲整個度假村,包括任何的公共區域。   我們開始的幾天在哪我們喜歡吃的地方和泳池是我們最喜歡的,因爲一些個按菜單點菜的早餐和自助午餐提供。 我們提前預定了3個按菜單點菜的這是最大的你可以提前預訂。  遺憾的是我們有3天的雨,這是一場噩夢就沒什麼可做的孩子們一起在下雨。 這是痛苦的3天又冷又讓我們有了段很長很無聊！ 這也是加熱的游泳池很方便因爲我們只能讓孩子在雨中游泳！ 因爲下雨被取消了演出  我們只看到了幾個這樣的晚上的時候因爲我們更喜歡享有更長的餐點。 孩子們很喜歡這裏的2我們觀看了演出。 我覺得這是在繁忙的酒吧,跑來跑去的孩子,父母不知道他們在做什麼或者他們在哪裏和工作人員也要他們離開。 我們好不容易纔得到一杯飲料的任何一邊看着我們的表演  等了足足40分鐘但是沒有顯示在迪斯尼類型的飲料和當我們要求幾個時間坐在吧檯等着和自己坐他們告訴我們他們很忙沒有了需要等待！ 似乎有很多人和它的工作人員很少很混亂。   我們去之前聽說這裏的日光浴牀不成問題  我討厭去買張牀在假期  但是其實並不是這樣的,你需要到游泳池和安全通過最新8上午因爲牀很忙而且如果你想在這一天晚些時候他們任何4牀不可用。 我們很喜歡這裏的毛巾服務,能夠將它們交換多少次都可以從泳池孩子喜歡跳過去一切都溼的時候很樂於助人！   泳池周圍的服務非常好,他們努力工作了一整天,在泳池邊的零食很方便的孩子們非常喜歡這個如果他們只能買一個漢堡一頓清淡的午餐在這一天晚些時候。   我們喜歡在早餐或午餐在希臘或法語,更喜歡選擇更多的自助餐。
Eng: Family vacation Arrived on May 24th, we like our cabin with a view of the garden from our room, there is a lot of space for a family a lot of storage which is always a problem on vacation. Large spacious bathroom. Everything is very clean, the outside area is a good size and children like to eat some space to play a ball. The room was clean and tidy all the time we stayed there because of the entire resort, including any public areas. Our first few days were where we like to eat and the swimming pool is our favorite, because some a la carte breakfast and lunch buffets are provided. We booked 3 a la carte menus in advance, this is the largest you can book in advance. It's a pity that we have three days of rain, this is a nightmare and there is nothing to do. The children are raining together. It was a painful 3 days, it was cold and it made us have a long and boring section! This is also very convenient for the heated swimming pool because we can only let the children swim in the rain! The show was cancelled because of the rain. We only saw a few of these nights because we prefer to enjoy longer meals. The children loved the 2 here we watched the show. I think it's in a busy bar, children running around, parents don't know what they are doing or where they are and the staff wants them to leave. We finally got a drink on either side and watched our show and waited for a full 40 minutes but did not show a drink of the type in Disney and when we asked for some time to sit at the bar and waited to sit with ourselves they told us they were busy No need to wait! There seems to be a lot of people and its staff is rarely confused. We heard that the sunbeds are not a problem before we go. I hate to buy a bed during the holiday but it is not the case, you need to go to the swimming pool and pass safely by the latest 8 am because the bed is busy and if you want to be later in the day They are not available for any 4 beds. We love the towel service here, can exchange them as many times as we can from the pool and the kids like to jump in when everything is wet and helpful! The service around the pool was very good, they worked hard all day and the snacks by the pool were very convenient. The kids loved this very much if they could only buy a burger for a light lunch later in the day. We like to have breakfast or lunch in Greek or French and prefer to choose more buffets.

review: 讓我很失望  根據旅遊指導手冊,廟街夜市應該是那種窄窄的街道,有京劇表演,還有算命的之類的。當我去的時候,感覺街頭藝術家還有算命師都好像在晚上都關門了。大多數店都是賣些廉價的旅遊紀念品,像冰箱磁鐵,筷子什麼的。我印象當中那些店都賣些廉價的仿製品,看上去質量很差。廟街夜市值得快速逛一逛,但個人覺得沒什麼好玩的。
Eng: I am very disappointed. According to the travel guidebook, Temple Street Night Market should be the narrow street with Peking Opera performances, fortune telling and the like. When I went, it felt like street artists and fortune tellers were all closed at night. Most stores sell cheap tourist souvenirs, like refrigerator magnets, chopsticks or something. I remember those stores selling cheap imitations, which looked of poor quality. Temple Street Night Market is worth a quick stroll, but personally feel that there is nothing fun.

review: 出色的酒店  從我們到達的那一刻,這家酒店的服務很棒。 從酒吧工作人員,保安,服務人員和經理。 他們非常細心周到,友好和使得這一次很棒的經歷。 這是很難找到一家有如此強烈關注的服務。   這裏的食物真是令人吃驚的所有一個按菜單點菜的餐廳和美味的紅酒包括的列表。 演示文稿,質量和服務都是比大多數的餐館都在贊同我最近才住過。 自助餐還有一個很棒的選擇和佈置得很好。 這是一個值得提前預訂餐廳他們很快就訂滿了。   房間,泳池和酒店的地板非常非常乾淨而且你可以告訴他們一個獎狀都在這家酒店的外觀。 房間每天都打掃得很乾淨很舒服。 我們是在主樓的一間海景房。 我個人不會有海景的房間因爲我們幾乎看不到它從二樓我們的房間。   這不是抱怨因爲我們知道這是一個家庭式的度假村。 然而,一個建議是應該有一個正確的部分僅供成人使用的泳池。 他們提供了很好的滿足家庭但有時感覺這是代價的客人沒帶孩子。 但有時很難放鬆有這麼多不到處都是孩子們和特別浪漫的餐廳還是酒吧裏的即使是在深夜帶着孩子到處亂跑。   我覺得這家酒店在一個全包式酒店在歐洲設立了新的標準。 我們打算在未來的ikos酒店預訂另一個因爲我們真的很喜歡酒店的理念。
Eng: Excellent hotel The service from this hotel was great from the moment we arrived. From bar staff, security guards, service staff and managers. They are very attentive, friendly and make this a great experience. It is difficult to find a service with such strong attention. The food here is really amazing, the list of all the a la carte restaurants and the delicious wine included. The presentation, quality and service are more agreeable than most restaurants I have only stayed in recently. The buffet also has a great selection and is well set up. This is a restaurant worth booking in advance and they are fully booked soon. The rooms, pool and hotel floors are very, very clean and you can tell them that a certificate is all in the appearance of this hotel. The room is cleaned and comfortable every day. We are a sea-view room in the main building. I personally would not have a sea view room because we hardly see it from our room on the second floor. This is not a complaint because we know this is a family resort. However, one suggestion is that there should be a proper part of the swimming pool for adults only. They provide a very satisfying family but sometimes feel that this is the price for guests who do not bring children. But sometimes it is difficult to relax. There are so many children everywhere and particularly romantic restaurants or bars, even with children running around late at night. I think this hotel has set new standards in an all-inclusive hotel in Europe. We plan to book another one at the future ikos hotel because we really like the hotel concept.
